requirements: No prior knowledge of Counselling is required
courses.description:
Counselling presents a very needed area of therapy, especially in these challenging time and the majority of people will at some point in their lives feel uncertain or probably even overwhelmed by their problems, both physically and emotionally. As a result of this, they might struggle to find clear direction and need someone outside of their family and friend circle to talk to.
For every counsellor it is very important to fully develop active listening skills because this forms is the foundation for successful and proactive therapy sessions. This course provides you with a grounding in the theoretical aspects of counselling and has easy to learn lectures and exercises which you can work on at your own pace and the way it suits you the best. This course is very helpful for individuals that are already active within the field of Counselling and want to update and improve their skills. In this course you will learn how to become attuned to the verbal and non-verbal responses of your clients, noticing even the sligtest shifts in body language and the mood changes. You will also learn how to subtly explore all these changes, and fully recognize when to use your improved counselling skills and interventions.
target_audience: People interested in gaining an insight into understanding human behaviour and why people think and act the way they do.
People interested in Personal Development
Individuals interested in communicating effectively with other people

courses.description:
Many people go through life believing that "emotions are just part of life and you have to get over them" or "we don't talk about emotions." When that is the case, we experience emotions but feel defined by them, controlled by them, and overwhelmed by them. A correct understanding of your emotions will help you acknowledge and release them so you can live empowered.
In this course, you will learn how much power you actually have inside of yourself. You have the power to rewrite your memories and reprogram your brain. You have the power to manage your emotions – even ones like anxiety and anger.
Your emotions don’t define you. They are meant to be experienced and then let go.
Learn tools and strategies that you can use every day to manage your emotions and gain a more empowered perspective on life. Living in this way will free you from addictive or destructive behaviors, help you develop and deepen real relationships with others, and help you love the life you are living.
If you have believed that there is no hope for you but you desperately want that hope and are willing to do something about it, this course is for you.


Ben Eden, Mental Health Practitioner, has a Diploma in Mental Health and Wellness, certified through Achology, the Academy of Modern, Applied Psychology.

requirements: No requirements or prerequisites for taking your course.
courses.description:
What is self confidence ?
Self-confidence is an attitude about your skills and abilities. It means you accept and trust yourself and have a sense of control in your life. You know your strengths and weakness well, and have a positive view of yourself. You set realistic expectations and goals, communicate assertively, and can handle criticism.


On the other hand, low self-confidence might make you feel full of self-doubt, be passive or submissive, or have difficulty trusting others. You may feel inferior, unloved, or be sensitive to criticism.
What is a confident person?
Not everyone is born with an inbuilt sense of self-confidence. Sometimes it can be hard to develop confidence, either because personal experiences have caused you to lose confidence or because you suffer from low self-esteem.
A confident person:
does what they believe is right, even if it’s unpopular
is willing to take risks
admits their mistakes and learns from them
is able to accept a compliment
is optimistic.
How To Increase Your Self-Confidence
· Recognize and emphasize your strengths. Reward and praise yourself for your efforts and progress.
· When you stumble on an obstacle, treat yourself with kindness and compassion. Don't dwell on failure.
· Set realistic and achievable goals. Do not expect perfection; it is impossible to be perfect in every aspect of life.
· Slow down when you are feeling intense emotions and think logically about the situation.
· Challenge making assumptions about yourself, people and situations.
· Recognize that past negative life experiences do not dictate your future.
· Express your feelings, beliefs and needs directly and respectfully
· Learn to say no to unreasonable requests.
target_audience: Any one who needs to acquire self esteem or wants to appear more confident.

This course isn't just about theory; it's about tangible change. We're committed to guiding you in making deep-rooted changes, elevating your confidence, and transforming your identity. All we ask for is a flexible mindset and a commitment to becoming the best version of yourself.
Whether you're a novice to personal development or seeking to further refine your social skills, this course will provide value. As quoted by one of our students, "I've paid over 1k for lesser valued programs."
Don't just take our word for it, though. Join thousands of satisfied students who've experienced real change. Unleash your confidence, master your self-esteem, and overcome your fears today with 'Unleashing Confidence: The Fear 2.0.

What actually builds confidence and why most confidence-building “solutions” fail

Why your confidence seems to decrease and increases in life
[PLUS: Additional Advanced Videos designed to rapidly reprogram your Body and Mind for Confidence.]
Yo, what's up! Justin Quinton here! Let me ask you a question...
Are you someone who suffers from Fear or Anxiety?
When you go out, do you experience feelings of self-doubt, maybe even self-hatred, shyness…
What about other negative thoughts, such as nervousness or a lack of confidence?
Do you overthink social situations or filter yourself around people?
This is what I call “The Fear”, and these anxieties affect most of us daily.
They have a profound effect on your self-expression.
They have a profound effect on your ability to let go and have fun.
They make you afraid to put yourself out there, afraid of sticking out, of being judged, of being rejected…
We are afraid and that fear HURTS US DEEPLY
So, I made conquering this fear my mission.
I made alleviating you from anxiety my goal.
I became OBSESSED with how to do this.
I asked myself, “How can I be the spark to help you finally BREAKTHROUGH…”
So I dove in, head first and started to layout the most effective and powerful strategies to end Social Anxiety ONCE AND FOR ALL
I created this because I wish someone had for me when I was going through this fear growing up.
I want to help you achieve a level of confidence that allows you to be yourself in new environments.
To be able to confidently strike up conversations with people you find attractive.
To be fearless with all types of rejection.
To share your ideas and self with the world.
So after years of testing, fine-tuning, and countless success stories I am incredibly excited to introduce...
THE FEAR 2.0 Core Confidence Conditioning
You probably know by now that Confidence is required if you want to reach your potential and achieve happiness in life. This course is designed to help you make deep-rooted changes in the way you handle fear by teaching you how to condition your psychology and biology. I've built a step-by-step process that you can apply daily to help reprogram the way you respond to Fear and ultimately improve your Confidence.
Start Gaining Confidence & Feeling More Satisfaction In Life With This Step By Step Effective Course.
Develop A Real Core Confidence
Feel More Ease & Freedom In Life To Be Yourself
Start Conversations With People You Find Attractive
Be Fearless In The Face Of Rejection
Have The Ability To Share Your Ideas Or Creativity
Radiate Genuine Confidence & Self-Esteem To Others

This course was made for anyone that wishes to master their social inhibitions or anxieties and improve their levels of confidence and self-esteem. The only requirements are a flexible mindset and a commitment to changing yourself.
Students in this course will have access to this 7 Stage process that can be applied at their own pace. By following these step-by-step mental and physical exercises you will learn how to break out of the psychological barriers of fear that once controlled you.
The course also includes philosophies for improving all areas of life and strategies for maintaining confidence when anxiety slips back in. You will learn how to deal with stressful situations and rejection. While understanding the nature of your relationship to fear and how it affects yourself and others. Combined with some simple tricks that boost confidence and make you a more effective and attractive individual.
Students who complete this course will experience a transformative change in their confidence and identity. They will feel at ease and in control of life which allows them to feel prepared for the situations that count like wanting to talk to the person of their dreams or being able to confidently share their ideas in a meeting.
Stop letting anxiety prevent you from leading the life you deserve! Start gaining psychological strength with these tools and strategies and don't let the life you could have pass you by.

In your course, you will learn a special adaptation of Energy EFT (Emotional Freedom Techniques) Tapping, Classical EFT Tapping, and ideas from Reiki healing, in easy lessons and coursework that you can enjoy.
The biggest block to self-love, as given by genuine members of my Self-Confidence, Self-Love, and Self-Esteem Facebook group, is the effect of past trauma or negative life events. EFT Tapping has been proven to release the effect of past trauma. Moreover, the effect has been proven to last, such as in 6-month follow-ups, against other techniques commonly used in therapy and self-development.
EFT Tapping is a very versatile tool that every modern coach and self-developer is finding to be just right for moving forward.
EFT Tapping Practitioners can use this course to get ideas on how to help their clients grow their self-love. Self-helpers will find every step of their journey much easier after this course. This is because self-love is stronger than self-sabotage, and the more you love yourself, the more self-sabotage becomes a thing of the past for you. Self-love helps to release both self-sabotage and negative thinking.
This is not a theoretical or pen-and-paper course. This is where you get real actual results in your 5 easy lessons! Your course consists of:
An introductory section to lay down the foundation to your learning;
Easy lessons designed specifically to increase your self-love in a measurable way;
Your introduction section and your first main lesson purely concentrate on the positive of self-love, easing you into self-love in a way that can give you confidence in your learning and self-development.
Three further lessons do two things at once; releasing negative past traumas and limiting beliefs whilst at the same time increasing positive self-love. This combination helps you to increase self love easily and safely.
Your last lesson is a gentle Tapping Meditation, helping you cement all the positives that you have learned in a very pleasant and relaxing way.
Practical exercises - you learn and develop by doing;
Unlimited message support whenever you need it - I am there for you all the way.
Self-love is important in every aspect of your life - relationships, job, studies, self-confidence, self-worth, self-esteem, health, and happiness. Trauma and limiting beliefs stop anyone in their tracks, increasing negative thinking and self-sabotage. Give yourself a chance today. You will be glad you did!

courses.description:
It’s time for you to take control and find the confidence in YOU TODAY!

With our “Confidence Booster Course”, you can be a NEW You! In three parts - “Conquer Your Fear”, “Dealing With Difficult People” and “Building Self-Confidence” - you'll be guided through an approachable path to confidence through understanding.

Our “Confidence Booster Course” is a comprehensive three-part series on three core topics that will boost your confidence from day 1!

Here's how the course is built:

1. Conquer Your Fear
This 9 Part Video Course is a direct, thorough entrance into understanding what fear is, what types of fear there are, how self-fear develops, the crippling event of panic attacks, and the overall nature of the thing you face – as it relates to you. Information is power and you'll find it here, but don't expect a lecture: you're in the driver's seat from the start; given a call to action, along with a tool kit, to expose fear in your life. Confidence begins with understanding.

2. Dealing With Difficult People
Through this 10 Part Video Course, we take you through the categories of people that you'll encounter in life whose behavior patterns are discouraging, panic-breeding pools of difficulty. Giving you the initiative to not just outsmart, but help these individuals – you'll re-shape the way that you see friends, family, colleagues, and yourself. Helping you to categorize these people as you meet them you’ll know exactly when it’s best to take a stand or make your exit.


3. Building Self Confidence
In this 9 Part Video Course,it's all about YOU and building your self confidence. You know the territory. You've had an honest talk with yourself and exposed fears in your life. You're feeling clearer and more prepared now that you can categorize the people who can – knowingly or unknowingly – steer you towards panic. Now it's time to talk about what you bring to the table. Outlining key points of Emotional, Spiritual, and Behavioral self-confidence, this course is where your understanding of your environment empowers you to transform yourself.. Practical and enlightening, you'll learn that for every visible source of fear, there is an invisible well of calm, focus, and self-determination. It's all about access. Learn which muscles and habits you are yet to form and strenghten. Find out how to structure your day based on self-assessment, planning, peace. Get a broad perspective on your own life that emphasizes your emotional, spiritual, and behavior awareness and action.
Get Ready to Wake Up to a New YOU Through This Amazing Three Part Course!
Join Us Today!

"The Lifetime Confidence Formula" is a transformative course meticulously crafted to guide individuals on a journey towards profound self-assurance. Over two decades of dedicated research and personal experience, including challenging environments like military service and high-stakes entrepreneurial ventures, have culminated in the development of this comprehensive program. At its core, the course seeks to unravel two fundamental mysteries: the vast disparities in wealth creation among individuals and the divergent reactions of people to identical situations.


This program is not just about theoretical insights; it offers a practical, step-by-step approach to cultivating unshakeable confidence. Participants will start by crafting their own Strength Statement, a powerful affirmation that lays the foundation for the journey ahead. The course then introduces participants to advanced relaxation techniques, enabling them to achieve a state of deep mental and physical calm. This prepares the ground for the pivotal phase of subconscious reprogramming, where through repetition of their Strength Statement, participants work to embed a lasting belief in their own capabilities and worth.


"Empowered Self: Unlocking Total Confidence" is designed for anyone looking to enhance their self-confidence, whether for personal growth, professional advancement, or entrepreneurial success. By the end of this course, learners will not only have mastered techniques for building and sustaining confidence but also gained the ability to apply these techniques across various aspects of their lives. Ryan Smith, an entrepreneur with a passion for empowering others, shares his unique methodology for transforming self-doubt into self-dominance, inviting you to change your world with the profound power of true self-confidence.

courses.description:
Take back your power and be your authentic self again!


It’s time to set healthy boundaries so you can build self-confidence, form healthier relationships, and deeper connections.


Are you tired of saying yes when you really mean no?
Are you fed up with being walked all over?
Have you had enough of being taken advantage of?
If you answered yes to any of these questions, then this course is for you.


You want to experience healthy connections with others, so you can feel safe and secure.
You want to feel confident in communicating your boundaries.
You crave to feel empowered knowing that you can set your limits in a healthy and effective way.
You want to show up as your authentic self so you can live in peace and freedom.
You want others to respect you but most importantly you want to respect yourself.


But you don’t know where to start because on-one ever taught you how to set boundaries or how to say “No” to others. Perhaps you were taught it was caring to always tend to other people's needs before your own. Yet, it leaves you feeling exhausted and powerless or even irritable and empty.
When we learn how to set personal boundaries, we can establish healthy limits within our relationships, which allows us to feel safe and comfortable. Besides supporting your self-esteem, self-worth, and authentic self, setting personal boundaries is essential to good self-care as well as communicating your needs with others.


Let us imagine for a moment what it would be like to…


· Set your boundaries with confidence.
· Be able to say ‘no’ without feelings of shame or guilt.
· Respect your authentic self by prioritising your own needs.
· Feel safe and secure within your relationships.
· Feel amazing knowing that you're able to set your own limits


Setting healthy boundaries is crucial for your emotional wellbeing and self-esteem. And that is why I have created this course so you can gain the awareness, knowledge, and skills to set your boundaries with confidence and conviction!


What our students are saying about this course:


"The course is structured very well, and the exercise book and additional resources are great. I would recommend this course to anyone, especially if you find it difficult to say no and feel guilty doing so."


"The course is easy to follow and understand and is produced to a high standard, with resources and tips to help you along the way."


"This is a powerful course. It takes you in a very short time with clarity and concision, through the mental and emotional complexities that are the characteristics of the different limiting personal boundaries, and the steps to changing those boundaries."


If you are ready to take your power back, then sign up for this course today!

If you struggle with Self-Belief and Core Confidence, you are in the right place. In this course, you will learn how to cultivate Healthy Self-Esteem and how to build your Core Confidence.


Why choose Jimmy Naraine as your instructor:


Udemy Instructor Partner with 60,000+ TOP Reviews!
Course UPDATED in Oct 2022
Over 335,000 people from 194 countries enrolled in Jimmy's courses
Featured in Entrepreneur, Forbes, FoxNews, and Business Insider magazines
Delivered corporate training for Fortune 500 companies such as Chemours (6,500 employees) and Westpac (40,000 employees)
former Goldman Sachs and Allianz employee turned location independent entrepreneur (10 years of full-time travel)
Mindvalley Author, co-created an educational program with Mindvalley's CEO & NYT Bestselling Author - Vishen Lakhiani
Winner of the first Udemy Innovation Award
Top-rated Speaker at prestigious conferences such as DNX, Afest, Sharjah Entrepreneurship Festival, MindvalleyU, DNX Global, and Digital|K
Explored 78 countries while running entrepreneurial ventures

CONFIDENCE.
It's one of those things that everyone wants to have more of and there is a very good reason for it.

Without confidence, it's hard to accomplish anything meaningful in life. After all, if you don't believe in yourself, how can you expect other people to believe in you? You may want to build a business, improve your health, comfortably communicate with intimidating people, have the courage to ask for a pay rise, or to close an important deal. No matter what your situation is - everything starts with your CORE confidence.

Core confidence is the foundation for building a better life. The perceptions you have of yourself impacts your reality and determines your actions. This is why it's so important to constantly work on your self-esteem.

In this course, I'm about to share with you my best strategies, mindset shifts, tools, and exercises for building your CORE Confidence. My goal is that by the end of this course you will view yourself from a totally different perspective. I want to make you realize that you are already good enough.

Here's the thing... butterflies cannot see their own wings. If you watch all the videos in this course and apply the strategies and exercises I'm sharing with you, your level of core confidence will grow. Now it's your turn to jump on board and commit to doing some serious inner work. I hope to see you o the other side.

Here are some of the things you are about to learn:

What is confidence, and how to get more of it?
Why you are already better than you think you are and how to embrace your uniqueness?
How to build inner confidence and stop underestimating yourself and overestimating others?
How to boost your self-esteem with a powerful self-esteem exercise?
How I went from anxiety to creating my dream life, and what lessons can you implement?
A step-by-step strategy to stop worrying so much
What is vulnerability, and how embracing it will build your confidence and self-esteem?
What is identity, and how can you shape it to become a more confident person?
Lessons I've learned about fear and confidence after running away from a stage
How to improve your internal dialog to feel more positive and empowered on a daily basis?
How becoming self-aware will boost your confidence and the easiest way to gain self-awareness.
How to forgive yourself and fully accept who you are?
Best strategies for managing your emotions
How to stop over-reacting and maintain composure when everyone else is freaking out?
How to feel calm in the midst of a crisis?
How to use the power of words to increase self-confidence and self-esteem?
How will cultivating discipline impact your confidence and self-belief?

courses.description:
Learn the basics of Improv Comedy, the essential parts of a scene, definitions and examples of the most popular terminology, and even some warm-ups and games you can try with others!
If you've ever seen an Improv show and thought it looked difficult, that fear is going to be put to bed here and now. There is no magical upper echelon of comedian that can only perform Improv effectively, it's not as hard as you think and you're better than you think you are!
We feel more confident about concepts when we understand exactly how it works, so in this course learn about concepts such as:
"Yes, And" - The two most coveted words in Improv, I'm surprised I don't have it tattooed on me yet. Find out what it means to implement yes, and in your scenes, and what agreement looks like.
"No, But" - Not only can you say yes in an improv scene, but you can also say no. Some performers and instructors shy away from this phrase, but in this Improv course, we're burning away not only the illusion that Improv is difficult, but also the illusion that you can't make no or disagreement work.
"Game" Of A Scene - Every improv scene has a game, but what is that exactly? Understand the game of a scene will help you upgrade the quality your scenes and help you create stories that your scene partners and the audience will find memorable.
And more!
This course is highly recommended for beginners and those new to Improv Comedy, but it is also just as effective for those who already have some Improv experience under their belt.
target_audience: Anyone interested in exploring Improv Comedy and learning the basics

courses.description:
Addiction Recovery: Relapse Prevention Strategies That Work!
No one has to relapse. No one benefits from a relapse. It’s time to fortify your recovery plan. Consider these essential steps:
Attend Meetings: Regularly participate in support group meetings.
Schedule Your Time: Allocate time for self-care, reflection, and growth.
Therapy Sessions: Engage with your therapist to address underlying issues.
Utilize Recovery Tools: Leverage the tools that have aided your journey toward sobriety.
Addiction (Substance Use Disorder) carries far-reaching consequences. Families fracture, trust shatters, and lives unravel. Those struggling with substance use disorder impact not only themselves but also their loved ones. However, there’s hope beyond the darkness.
Relapse Prevention Strategies:
These evidence-based strategies have empowered countless individuals to maintain a life of recovery for years. They’ve also encouraged people to seek much-needed treatment. Let’s explore them together:
Craving Management: Learn effective techniques to manage cravings.
Trigger Awareness: Identify and navigate triggers that may lead to relapse.
Mood Regulation: Understand how emotions impact your recovery journey.
The Matrix Model:
Included in this course are simple worksheets from “T H E M A T R I X M O D E L.” These worksheets provide practical insights and actionable steps to reinforce your commitment to sobriety.
©2005 by Matrix Institute. All rights reserved. Published in 2005. Duplicating these handouts for personal or group use is permissible. The Matrix Model is a registered trademark of the Matrix Institute.
Remember, the worksheets provided here have been instrumental in maintaining my 15 years of Sobriety. I believe they can work for you too.
target_audience: We are seeking students who want to learn life skills, motivation, and productive living and recovery.
We are seeking students who want to learn how to maintain their sobriety.
We are seeking students who may not have a substance use disorder but want to learn about it.

courses.description:
Learn the fundamentals of Public Speaking and how it directly relates to communication through the process of Storytelling. This course teaches performance tools that can be applied throughout students' lives and careers. Designed for teens and young adults, this curriculum is widely accessible and intended for anyone looking to develop and strengthen their public speaking and communication skills, self-confidence and self-expression. We have taken great care to craft a course that upholds the highest standards, and we are excited to share our expertise with you!
At the heart of this course is the combined experience and training of our work as professional actors and media spokespersons. It includes many of the tools and techniques we use to prepare for live & filmed speaking engagements and performance at the highest level of the industry. This course dives into the following areas: getting present, working from a personal and authentic place, self-awareness, story comprehension, releasing physical and vocal tension and the rehearsal process. All of these areas of performance are directly translatable not only to public speaking but to communication more broadly.
By the end of this course, students will know what to do when called upon to speak in public. They will have what we like to call a "tool box" of skills to draw from. And perhaps most importantly, they will have a better understanding of who they are and what they have to say!


Why Public Speaking & Storytelling?
The ability to communicate clearly and confidently is essential for scholastic, professional and personal fulfillment. Studies have shown that students who engage in public speaking training experience an increase of self-confidence. This is no surprise, as we know that the impulse to communicate and tell a story successfully to a group of peers is an essential part of our humanity. In an increasingly digitized and virtual world, our capacities for communication are being strained. Our need for communication skills has never been more important.


Course Learning Objectives


Engage practices to achieve a state of Presence.
Utilize techniques to Personalize and Connect with text.
Discover and explore students’ own Stories.
Compose a story/speech based on fundamental Composition and Structure Concepts.
Practice techniques that promote optimal use of Body and Voice.

We will cover important topics in this course including:
DISCOVER YOUR UNIQUE QUALITIES
Recognize what makes you uniquely qualified in your career and the attributes you bring to the table. Within this course, you’ll begin to appreciate your true worth and defeat your own self-doubt.


REFRAME FEELINGS OF IMPOSTER SYNDROME
Challenge your current way of thinking and learn how Imposter Syndrome can be a good thing. Understand how to use it to guide you toward your success goals, and reduce the negative impact it has on you on a day-to-day basis.

courses.title: Mindfulness Self-defense

courses.description:
This course is designed to help you learn the art of self-defense where you do not need to go to a dojo or gym and defend yourself in three seconds or less. The course will teach you to think defensively and practice in the same fashion. Because violent situations are handled differently depending on the individuals involved. Like attacks due to emotions or done while involved in a crime, one may be out of control and the other is not. The laws, rules, and regulations that govern the use of force for police officers do not apply to the average citizen, especially those who become a victim of violence. A citizen may defend themselves by attacking their attackers' eyes, neck, or groin, strike the spine or the back of the head, or bite their attacker, but should an officer use any of these techniques, they may lose their job and even be arrested for excessive force. For this reason, all officers should be mentally prepared and situationally aware to survive a violent attack, it is important hthat you also are situationally aware.
The study and practice of martial arts are usually done to learn how to develop a disciplined mindset and enhance your physical fitness. But you must choose the right fighting sport for your lifestyle. You should have some self-defense training if you are a security guard, bodyguard, and even a schoolteacher.
It is hard to develop your self-defense style, which makes taking lessons important. Experts will tell you their system is the best, with the easiest learning techniques. The fact is it takes time and effort to master all self-defense systems. The best self-defense system is where you learn to make one move or technique to survive many attacks without thought. Regardless of the martial art or fighting system you practice; you should be able to defend against any weapon.
target_audience: The course is designed for anyone with the desire to improve their ability to develop self confidence and discipline.

courses.description:
Cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT) is a widely use therapy to manage problems such as anxiety and depression . CBT is an effective way in dealing such problems .
Although CBT is commonly carried out by professional such as counselling psychology and psychiatry , you could implement some of the theories and principles that are used in CBT for self healing , and this CBT for Dummies - Learn CBT in 7 Days course is all about showing you these .
We are stress out nearly everyday due to work , family and other commitments . CBT aims to help you deal with overwhelming problems in a more positive way by breaking them down into smaller parts. You're shown how to change these negative patterns to improve the way you feel.
Consider below example :
Your wake up late this morning , because your phone's alarm is not working out of a sudden . When you drive out from your house , you trapped in a jam . And you start thinking " OMG ! Why there is always traffic jam when im late to work ! Why my life is so unfortunate ? Im just hopeless"
With the CBT techniques you will be able to identified and turn this =>> " OMG ! Why there is always traffic jam when im late to work ! Why my life is so unfortunate ? Im just hopeless"  negative thought to a thought that is reasonable and positive one . CBT is really good at doing this !
CBT for Dummies - Learn CBT in 7 Days  Course aims to provide students with:
A sound knowledge of cognitive behavioral therapy models, concepts and methods.
b) The use of CBT with a variety of daily problems.
c) Identified dysfunctional thought and how to readjust out throught
d) Refocusing and retraining individual awareness
e) The knowledge of the basic treatment of behavioral therapy
and so much more......
See you inside :)

Master the International Stage is a comprehensive training program designed to help aspiring and experienced speakers shine at conferences around the world. This course takes participants step-by-step through the full journey of becoming a confident presenter — from selecting the right topic and writing a winning proposal to delivering powerful talks that captivate audiences. Participants will explore different conference formats, master the art of storytelling, and learn how to adapt their message to both online and face-to-face settings. Special focus is placed on overcoming fear, boosting confidence, and handling Q&A sessions with professionalism and ease. Through brainstorming activities, expert strategies, and a final capstone project, learners will develop not just the skills, but also the mindset needed to make a lasting impact.
Throughout the program, participants will also practice tailoring their talks to educational audiences, using creativity and strategic thinking to make their presentations unforgettable. The course is packed with real-world examples, practical exercises, and insider tips from seasoned international speakers. Whether you’re preparing for your first presentation or aiming to elevate your speaking career, Master the International Stage provides the tools, techniques, and knowledge you need to succeed. By the end of the course, you will be ready to step onto any stage — big or small — and deliver your message with clarity, confidence, and creativity.

Whether you are struggling with low, negative, and unhealthy self-esteem.
Or you are feeling lost or stuck and looking for help and clarity on how exactly to overcome low self-esteem and identity challenges.
They can all be changed in my brand new digital course Breakthrough to Healthy Self-esteem!
It is based on the successful and proven method for creating healthy self-esteem during my counselling, psychotherapy, hypnotherapy and coaching practice.
Take yourself on a journey of self-transformation and reprogram your mind to build healthy self-esteem.
This course comes in four parts and includes an effective hypnosis for self-esteem!


Part 1. Your Self-esteem.
A quiz “True or False about Self-esteem” will help you to get more clarity about what self-esteem is and what self-esteem is not.
You will look at the benefits of having healthy self-esteem for you.
You will discover the self-esteem circle and its parts, as well as explore and assess each part of your self-esteem.
You will identify barriers of your difficulties, and what areas you specifically need to focus on and do the most work.
You will get an interactive step-by-step workbook of part one to complete your tasks and study helpful examples.


Part 2. Your Story.
You will create your timeline to look into your past experiences to determine what contributed to your current level of your self-esteem.
You will rewrite your story to make positive changes and transform your present and future to enhance your healthy self-esteem.
You will create a blueprint card of your new story, so it is close to you to remind you daily about your journey to your positive transformation.
You will discover how to rewire your mind for a permanent change and your new way of being.
You will get an interactive step-by-step workbook of part two to complete your tasks and study insightful examples.


Part 3. Your Self-talk
You will discover why it is not that easy to get rid of negative self-talk, how to challenge it and what exact questions to ask.
You will challenge your negative self-talk, thoughts and limiting beliefs to make them lose their power over you.
You will learn how, and you will follow the process of reframing your negative self-talk to positive self-talk.
You will create and practise your new healthy self-esteem affirmations, which will make a breakthrough to your healthy self-esteem.
You will get an interactive step-by-step workbook of part three to complete your tasks and study inspiring examples.


Part 4. Your Subconscious Mind.
You will learn what the subconscious is and the power of your subconscious mind for building healthy self-esteem.
You will get 34-minute audio hypnosis, which will guide you to a dream-like state of deep relaxation with positive messages to access your subconscious mind to make changes about your self-esteem.
You will rewire your brain patterns and reprogram your subconscious mind for creating an improved and healthy level of your self-esteem.

| Clips from *Friends* © Warner Bros. Entertainment. Used for educational purposes under fair use.


What to Expect
In this course, you’ll dive into English conversation basics, pick up useful phrases, and practice English speaking in a relaxed, enjoyable way. Using scenes from *Friends*, you'll explore the natural flow of conversational English, mastering idioms, sentence patterns, and everyday expressions to make your English sound fluent and authentic.


Why *Friends*?
*Friends* is full of real-life English expressions and conversational patterns! By watching and practicing with these scenes, you’ll see how native speakers communicate naturally and learn how to incorporate these techniques into your own conversations. It’s like having your own personal spoken English course with humor and real-world examples!


The lessons include exercises and worksheets that cover everything from English tips to pronunciation, so you can apply what you learn in various situations, from daily interactions to professional settings.


Join Us!
Start your English journey today and see how enjoyable learning English can be! This course isn’t just about learning English—it’s about building your confidence and conversational skills, one phrase at a time.

courses.description:
Are you interested in advancing your career in Australia? Do you value building professional networks with respect and integrity? Enhance your knowledge of Australia and develop your First Nations Cultural awareness through this innovative professional development opportunity. This self-paced program provides comprehensive insights into the traditional histories and ongoing cultural practices of Australia’s First Nations peoples. Participants will learn approaches to delivering respectful Acknowledgements of Country and discover practical resources and strategies applicable to daily work tasks.
TRIBILA is a national digital learning platform offering the Australian workforce access to high-quality digital educational resources. Founded by an artist, writer, and educator with Wiradjuri and Celtic heritage, TRIBILA reflects a deep commitment to the Australian landscape and Aboriginal culture. Digital learning assets are aligned with key government policies and the Australian Curriculum.
The online program caters to all sectors of the Australian workforce and welcomes international participants seeking to deepen their cultural understanding for effective and respectful communication within Australian workplaces. This first of two cultural awareness programs offers opportunities for participants to connect with their local environment, explore traditional cultural practices, and study First Nations maps and family groups. It sets a strong foundation in understanding deep time, traditional beliefs and impacts of colonisation. Upon completion, participants will be awarded a certificate and a calendar featuring important Australian dates to support their continued learning.
target_audience: Australian or international workforce wishing to do buisness in Auistralia and/or with First Nations people.

Learn to feel good about yourself and unlock your authentic confidence with proven strategies and techniques
Now includes new 63 page downloadable ebook.

Discover How To Stand Your Ground Confidently Without Creating Conflict or Jeopardizing Relationships.

Let the real, authentic YOU step forward with confidence
This course is designed to lead you, step by step, to develop healthy self-esteem because lasting confidence comes from feeling good about yourself. In every step of the way, the focus is on easy, practical exercises you can do to become your own best friend and step forward with confidence.
You’ll learn how to say ‘no’ gracefully. In fact, you’ll get a FREE ebook on ways to say ‘no’ without causing conflict or offense. Most importantly, you’ll learn how to silence your harsh inner critic and, instead, treat yourself with love and kindness.
The lectures are designed to give you the maximum results in the minimum time without being overwhelmed. If you want to go into more depth, there are downloadable pdfs and a free 63 page ebook that provide real world examples. This way you choose how much time you want to commit and how deeply you want to go.

Overview
After the introductory lecture, Section 1 is all about how to be assertive without creating conflict. You’ll learn how to communicate what you want without feeling guilty. You’ll learn how to say ‘no’ skillfully at work or with friends and family.  Most importantly, you’ll learn a little-known technique to assert yourself calmly if someone is trying to bully or manipulate you.


The focus of Section 2 is on developing healthy self-esteem, the root of authentic confidence.
You’ll find out how healthy self-esteem and confidence depend on each other. And I’ll introduce you to the Goodlife Self-Esteem Quiz which will reveal to you exactly how to uncover your authentic confidence. I’ll guide you through the results so that you can use the quiz as a powerful self-development tool.
Section 3 is about is on how to feel good about yourself. You’ll learn how to deal with perfectionism if you feel you are never good enough. Two uplifting loving-kindness exercises will warm your heart and allow you to become your own best friend.
In Section 4, you’ll learn the secret of avoiding conflict. A key piece of this part is the Values Checklist which I'll help you to fill out. The results of your Values Checklist will immediately suggest ways of minimizing conflict.


Section 6 is about how to silence your inner critic. You’ll learn the Gremlin Technique to stop beating yourself up.
In Section 7, you’ll  find  your Confidence Toolbox. You’ll find out how to use confidence rituals, dynamic affirmations, and anchoring techniques. And you’ll also learn how to employ your Emotional First-Aid Kit.
At the end of every section, you’ll find a downloadable wrap-up lecture so that you can easily remember the key teachings and exercises.

courses.description:
Break Free from People-Pleasing and Build Unshakable Confidence
Do you struggle with self-confidence and social anxiety?
Are you constantly seeking approval, only to feel frustrated and unfulfilled in your relationships?
Do you feel stuck in the role of the "Nice Guy," always putting others first but never getting what you truly want?
If so, you may be suffering from Nice Guy Syndrome—a pattern of people-pleasing that leads to weak boundaries, low self-worth, and disappointing relationships.
This course will help you break free.


What is Nice Guy Syndrome?
Nice Guy Syndrome is more than just being "too nice." It’s a deep-seated habit of avoiding conflict, suppressing your true desires, and relying on external validation to feel good about yourself. This mindset kills confidence, weakens relationships, and prevents you from living authentically.
If you want to reclaim your power, this course will show you how.


What You’ll Learn
This course is a step-by-step blueprint to overcome Nice Guy Syndrome, build rock-solid confidence, and develop powerful social skills.
You’ll discover how to:
Eliminate the need for approval and stop seeking validation from others
Develop bulletproof confidence in any social situation
Set strong boundaries without guilt or fear
Attract and maintain healthy relationships—without manipulation or games
Handle conflict assertively without aggression or submission
Live with authenticity and integrity—and feel proud of who you are


Why This Course Works
Nice Guy Syndrome isn’t just about bad habits—it’s about deep psychological patterns rooted in childhood conditioning. To truly break free, you need more than just “confidence hacks.”
This course helps you address the real causes of Nice Guy Syndrome, giving you the tools to:
Heal the emotional wounds that made you a people-pleaser
Overcome the fears that hold you back in relationships and career
Become assertive, self-reliant, and emotionally strong


What Students Say
“This course is all steak. There's no fluff, no BS, and no time-wasting.”
— Robert Howie
“While Nice Guy Syndrome is the focus of this course, it’s really about standing up unapologetically in the world and becoming a force for good.”

courses.description:
“Of all the judgments we pass in life, none is more important than the judgment we pass on ourselves.” ~ Nathaniel Branden
Each of us has a sense of identity that we establish for ourselves over the years. It is the sum-total of our beliefs about us.
This sense of identity gives us our anchor in life and enables us to make all our decisions on what we like, what we do not like, who do we want to associate with and who do we want to avoid. As we mature, this sense of identity keeps becoming more rigid, as over the years, it gets verified again and again.
And the simple reason it gets verified is because we always act in ways that are consistent with that identity.
Our lives revolve around this concept of our ‘Self-image’, and note here, that I call it a concept as it can be changed! The core of all personal development and transformation begins from the self-image inside out. If we can make even smallest of changes at that level, we can experience big gains on the outside.
It is well-established that to live a life that is reasonably happy and satisfying, an adequate self-image is a key requirement. It is also well-established now that in case of a person with inadequate self-image, the world can seem to be a frightening place.
Let me list a few characteristics of people with inadequate self-image:
They get jealous quite easily
They get quite critical and angry when offered feedback
They tend to take everything personally
They lack social skills and self-confidence
They are often uncomfortable when they are alone
They dress poorly and do not take good care of their health
They blame something or someone else most of the time
They spread fear on how uncertain and unfair the world is
They don’t expect much out of life in general
A certain amount of discomfort is a necessity for growth. We cannot grow to new levels of perception or capability from our comfort zone. Do you have any people around you in whose company you feel uncomfortable say because they have something that you so badly wish to have or they know more than you do about something? I am sure you do! Think about those people and this time pose yourself a different question, which is this – Are these not the same people who push me to become bigger and better than what I am currently settling for? The answer to the above question mostly is a Yes!
There is a direct relationship between the words ‘self-image’, ‘self-esteem’ and ‘self-confidence’. In simplest terms, ‘self-esteem’ can be defined as the health of our mind. Dr. Nathaniel Branden, a leading authority on the subject of self-image, calls self-esteem to be ‘your reputation with yourself’. Self-confidence is typically defined as a feeling of trust in one's abilities, qualities, and judgement. These are all related to each other, and you can broadly say that someone with a healthy self-image will typically have a high self-esteem and also a higher level of self-confidence in general.
People with high self-esteem are usually strong and secure and can admit that they are wrong when they make mistakes, and high self-esteem does not certainly mean that these people will always win. It means that they will certainly give their best in everything they do.
Imagine how much more you would achieve for yourself and your loved ones, if you could enhance your self-image and see yourself as worth of much more. In fact, having a healthy self-image is one of the key abilities that has been observed among people who become extraordinarily successful.
The objective of designing this course is to enable you to get quick yet lasting results. In this course, you will learn the most key principles relating to self-image/ self-esteem/ self-confidence that I have gathered from my extensive reading and experience (300+ self-help/ personal development books over ~20 years).
Once you master these basic principles, you won’t really need to read up any more detailed literature on self-image/ self-esteem/ self-confidence. A number of custom-designed exercises have also been included, which have proven effective for myself and many others around me. Ensure that you complete the exercises even if they feel uncomfortable/ tedious at first. Real lasting impact will come from doing the exercises. Once you learn how to do one full iteration of the exercises and are able to take yourself to the next level, you can repeat the entire iteration from your new normal, and continue to be on that upward trajectory, of hitting higher and higher levels.
The course will cover the following topics:
Introduction to reinventing your self-image
Our lives revolve around our "self-image"
All personal development begins from self-image inside out
Maintaining a consistent identity is a primary need of our mind
How do you handle discomfort?
A healthy self-image is a requirement for happy life

We rarely achieve more than our self-image

How to handle people with high self-esteem?

Self-esteem can be enhanced
Self-esteem is like money in a bank
Self-esteem enhancement is an ongoing process

Physical (Health),

Spiritual (Soul),
thereby significantly enhancing the overall quality of your life.

In this course you will learn how to build your confidence and raise your self esteem.

Self esteem is critical if you want to achieve AND keep anything of major consequence;  whether that is a healthy relationship with the person of your dreams or achieving a specific career milestone or anything in between, self esteem is the foundation.

“We do not get what we want in life but we experience what we believe we deserve to have.”

Many of us struggle because fundamentally at our core we do not believe we are worthy to achieve or to keep the things we desire most.

we must understand fundamentally that self esteem is the way one feels about themselves at any given moment in time and this will fluctuate, however the aim is to build good systems and behaviours to ensure that we are always at an 8/10.

Self esteem is made up of two components :
1. Self efficacy.
2. Self respect.

we will explore what both of these mean and how to build both of these components up.

courses.description:
Making friends as an introvert can be a pickle. We are not naturally wired to be good with people but there is definitely a way how to improve that.
Social skills are extremely important not only in personal life but also the business. This course will help you to improve your communication skill and will show you how to make friends.
Knowing how to make friends is a skill that can be learned by everybody. We will work under the assumption that you can work on every bit of the conversation separately so in the course, I speak about 5 main areas that we must master if we want to know how to make friends in a new city, how to make friends in a school or generally how to make friends as an introvert.


The first area, we will discuss is our mindset. Every bit of communication comes from within and that is usually the biggest pain point. So I will talk about some mindsets that you can adapt as well so it is easier for you to start a conversation with people.


The second part we need to master is how to talk to people. That is probably the hardest problem. So in this section, I will teach you a technique that will allow you to be quiet most of the time, and yet the people you are talking to will totally love you. It works surprisingly well for me, so it will for you as well. We will talk about the proper art of asking the right questions and active listening skills.


In the following part, we will build upon talking. We will discuss reading body language. You will know what the other person feels like. Do they enjoy the talk? Don’t they enjoy that? You will know how to find this out. Also, I will tell you how to practice reading body language.


In the fourth lesson, we will speak about time and proactivity. We, introverts, tend to be more reactive than proactive meaning that we usually let other drag us around, ask us out, etc. That is nice but if you want to actively build friendships, you can change the strategy a bit and get a much higher return on that.


And in the last section, we will speak about where to find friends and how to widen your friends' circles. There are places where you can generally find and get more friends than others. So let’s explore that together.


To sum this up, we will talk about how to make friends.
How to make friends as an adult.
How to make friends as an introvert.
How to make friends as an introvert with social anxiety.
How to make friends in a new city.
How to make friends in a new job.
How to make friends in a new country.
How to make new friends in an old country.
How to make new friends easy.

It is a way to go free of the world, to face all fears, and also, to find tranquility and success. This practice can be done anywhere in setting: during a speech, before a performance, in the middle of a life crisis, or simply when someone cuts you traffic. I hold a degree in Psychology and am nearly finished with my masters in Neuroscience - I anticipate my thesis being in part on looking at emotion, and to see what neuroscience has to say about repressed emotion. I am also interested in consciousness (which comes up in this program). courses.description:
Everyone has been hurt in one way or another. Few people are able to let that pain go so they can move on with their lives without the past interfering with their joy.
People have a tendency to get caught in their anger and pain after they've been hurt. There are mental, emotional, and physical reasons why it is difficult to release this pain.
One area that can make it difficult to release the past is the misunderstanding of what forgiveness is. People often think forgiveness absolves the other person of anything that happened. You’ll discover this is incorrect.
Strategies and exercises to release the past range from recognizing your personal power, nurturing yourself, changing your thoughts, and discovering how to manage your feelings.

objectives: What is Internal Family Systems Therapy

Introduction: What is Internal Family Systems Therapy?

Fire-fighters - Managing Parts that stop difficult emotions instantly
Self Energy = Funcional Adult = You at the Core
Unbending from Parts = Going Back to Your Funcional Adult
Parts That Don't Seem Like Parts
Unattached Burdens = Not Parts but Clingly Outside Forces
Legacy Burdens = Parts Passed on Throughout the Generations
Initial Phase of Treatment and Using Parts Language
Unburdening the Parts and Building Trust in Your Internal System
Working with Anxious and Concerned About Safety Parts
Working with Angry and Aggressive Parts
Working with Doubtful and Confusing Parts
Extra Tips on Working with Exiles
Recognise Your Unattended Burdens, Legacy Burdens or Not Burdened Parts
Create an Artistic Map of Your Parts

requirements: No experience needed.
courses.description: In this course, I'll explain to you the Internal Family Systems Therapy created by Richard Schwartz. It's a psychotherapeutic modality that assumes that we all have "Parts". Parts are explained as emotions and behavioral mechanisms that we use on a regular basis. They are usually causing dysfunctional patterns of behaviors that we want to change. With the help of this modality, you can help your clients, patients, and yourself to recognize where those patterns came from and what you need to do to change them to healthy mechanisms. It's a type of a inner child work that can be compared to Schema Therapy in some ways. You use structured questions that you ask your Parts to be able to get to know them, appreciate them for their good intentions and ultimately take over for them and create new functional behavioral patterns. It's an amazing therapy that you can practice on yourself and use in daily life to create good habits, and appropriate boundaries,  promote healthy self-esteem, and practice self-compassion. Your Parts think they need to keep working for you, but with Internal Family Systems Therapy you can make them realize that they don't have to be active anymore because you are the "Functional Adult" now taking over for them. I'll provide you with my personal take on this therapy and with some advice when it comes to the use of this modality. It's my main modality that I use with clients, even though I have studied multiple common therapies like Cognitive Behavioural Therapy, Schema Therapy, Dialectical Behavioural Therapy, and Art Therapy. Internal Family Systems Therapy is by far the most successful for treating my clients and to use on myself to deal with emotions and difficult situations.
target_audience: For anyone that is interested in psychotherapy or is a therapist or a counsellor

courses.description:
"This course is absolutely fantastic and has really helped me to boost my personal self esteem" Jules Labrecque (Udemy, student)
Many courses aimed at building self esteem and self confidence use quick-fix exercises, such as NLP visualisations or affirmations - these might boost self confidence temporarily but they provide no long-term change that builds self esteem.
So, this self confidence course - How to Build Unbreakable Self Confidence & Self Esteem - seeks to unearth your unconscious and deep-rooted causes of low self esteem, and provide you with the knowledge and skills to become more self-directing and self-accepting - key to lasting change and building greater self confidence. And you'll learn to talk to yourself with compassion, and to identify what you're good at and what you truly need to be motivated - all key to building self esteem and self confidence.
On this self confidence and self esteem self development online course, you'll:


Uncover your negative automatic thoughts and learn to tackle your inner critic
Assess your strengths using an online strengths-finder tool
Identify your intrinsic values so you can start making decisions that take your own needs into consideration - rather than continually putting others' needs first
Uncover your shadow persona, so you can begin to fully accept yourself, warts and all
Learn how to treat yourself with compassion - to learn self care and self compassion - key to building self confidence and self esteem
Become aware of the conscious and unconscious barriers - self sabotaging behaviours - that you’re placing in front of yourself and why. And in their place, you'll learn how to build new attitudes and beliefs to gain a more empowering mindset and build self confidence.
Increase your emotional intelligence and personality development leading to new social skills
Become more self accepting and self compassionate by better understanding yourself


Low self-esteem can create anger, despair and hopelessness. So tackling the root cause of your low self esteem is important and this personality development and self confidence course will look at this. And from here you can start to increase your inner confidence and unlock your true potential. When you have a good level of self confidence and in particular, self esteem, then you will see progress in every area of your life.
With practical tips and exercise, you’ll learn how to develop a positive mindset, to overcome self doubt and reframe negative thoughts. This self development course will help you in your career, your workplace, your personal life - to build richer, more fulfilling relationships and to start believing in yourself more.
This self confidence and self esteem online course uses personal case studies, research and exercises from the fields of positive psychology, cognitive therapy, person-centred therapy, and neuroscience. All taught by an expert in the field of self confidence and self esteem.
Note:
This self confidence and self esteem online course comes with a 49 page self esteem and self confidence workbook, so you can go through various exercises and you watch the online videos.
You will also get each video as a mp3 audio download - so you listen to this self development course while driving or commuting.


"This course is absolutely fantastic and has really helped me to boost my personal self esteem... As to why I'm the first to give it 5 stars will always be a mystery!" Jules Labrecque (Udemy, student)


Who is this course for?
Anybody who looking build a high level of self confidence and self esteem.
People who struggle with anxiety, low self-esteem, feeling of low self worth and not being good enough.
People who want to improve their career prospects by being more confident in the workplace.
A note about the trainer, Peter Willis
I've trained, coached and been a psychotherapist to individuals in a career spanning 30 years. And I specialise in helping people overcome crippling self doubt to become more self aware and self compassionate, and to build their self worth, their self esteem, so they can go into any situation with greater self confidence.
In addition to my coaching qualifications, I'm also a trained integrative psychotherapist. In my work, I draw on person-centred therapy, positive psychology, gestalt coaching, existential coaching, psychodynamic therapy, CBT, and Jungian therapy.
My philosophy is that to have a healthy level of self-esteem and emotional health, we need to find and be our real self – it’s from here that we can start to bring direction, clarity of thought, effective leadership and passion into our work and lives.
I am also the MD of both Lequin Leadership Development, which has worked with over 60 blue chip organizations since 2003, and the online course provider, Unchainyourbrain .org
My philosophy is that to be the best we can in our careers, then we need to have high levels of emotional and political intelligence - we need high levels of self awareness and awareness of others, together with the ability to manage our and others' emotions. On top of this we should have a healthy level of self-esteem and to do this we need to find and be our real self – it’s from here that we can start to bring direction, clarity of thought, effective leadership and passion into our work and lives.
"Loved this instructor. He presents the information in a clear way with engaging examples. I will be taking more of his courses." Jennifer Ripley, course student
"Good speaker. Relevant information" Betty Huntington, course student
"Trainer has a lot of knowledge, you can tell, and his approach is very professional, you can easily absorb what is talking about." Katarina Miklec, course student

Break free from self-doubt and unlock your true potential with this hands-on, eye-opening course. Designed for those ready to stop overthinking and start taking action, this course will help you shift your mindset, build self-awareness, and develop a fresh, empowering perspective on yourself and the world around you.

courses.description:
Law of Attraction: Power of Positive Mindset
By popular demand and years in the making, this course brings together everything you need to shift your mindset from negative to positive—and start attracting the life you truly want. It’s taken a lot of work and energy to build, so if you find value here, please pay it forward and spread the positivity.
Do You Feel Stuck?
Are you overwhelmed, frustrated, or convinced the world is against you? I used to feel exactly the same way. But once I began to change the way I thought, everything changed. Doors started opening. Opportunities appeared. And just like failure can follow failure, success starts to attract more success.
This course is designed to help you stop thinking like a victim and start thinking like a victor. When you stop wasting energy on resentment or negativity, you’ll free that energy to create real progress—and experience the incredible power of good karma in action.
Course Overview
In this course, you’ll discover how to transform your mindset using mental reprogramming techniques that shift your thoughts from defeat to empowerment. We’ll focus on viewing challenges through a new lens—because the difference between a full and empty glass is simply how you choose to see it.
You’ll learn how to:
Stop negative thinking patterns
Build a positive outlook on life, relationships, and money
Attract success using the Law of Attraction
Replace anger and resentment with energy, action, and forward momentum
Reprogram your mind for motivation, purpose, and abundance
Mindset Reprogramming: Get Motivated, Get Wealthy, Get Ahead
Mindset is everything. Most people only tap into a fraction of their mental power. But when you learn to focus, redirect your energy, and create new thought habits—you can accomplish far more than you ever imagined.
Are you stuck in a cycle of procrastination or self-doubt? Struggling to stay motivated in your career, business, or personal goals? This course is designed to help you break free.
You’ll learn how to:
Wake up inspired and stay productive
Train your brain to seek opportunities, not obstacles
Replace limiting beliefs with empowering thoughts
Tap into your inner drive and passion
Build a strong, success-driven mental foundation
Wealth Creation & Money Mindset
We don’t stop with personal growth. Once your mindset is aligned, we shift into wealth creation. You’ll discover how the most successful people in the world use mindset principles to attract wealth—and how you can too.
We’ll cover:
Why your beliefs about money determine your income
How to reframe wealth as opportunity, not scarcity
Tools for thinking rich (before you are)
The difference between surviving and thriving financially
This is a step-by-step mindset transformation that can help you succeed not just in life, but in your finances and future.
Meet Your Instructors
This course is co-taught by myself, Sergey—entrepreneur and success coach—and Clarity Coach Rachel, a digital nomad who has built her lifestyle and career around the power of mindset. While I’ve built multiple businesses by leaning into positive thinking and personal development, Rachel has traveled the world using the exact same tools we’ll teach you in this course.
Why This Course?
If you keep doing the same thing, expecting different results—you’re stuck in a cycle. This is your chance to try something new and finally move forward.
You don’t need a special background or degree—just the willingness to change. If you’re ready to improve your mindset, reprogram your thoughts, and create the life you’ve always wanted, this course is for you.
What You’ll Learn
How to stop thinking negatively
How to think positively and attract what you want
How to challenge and defeat self-sabotaging thoughts
The secrets of good karma and the Law of Attraction
Simple techniques to reprogram your mind
Make the Investment in Yourself
This course could be the spark that changes everything. It’s your time to stop surviving and start thriving. Join us inside and take the first step toward mastering your mindset—and transforming your life from the inside out.
We’ll see you inside,
Your Mindset Instructors,
Sergey & Rachel

courses.description:
"Basic Dance Moves for Guys - Completely beginner lessons" is a step-by-step system that helps guys go from being awkward and out-of-place on the dance floor, to becoming dance-floor-ready in 3 days time.
This system teaches you the dance style that's best described as "club dancing."
It's that casual, fun dancing people do at night-clubs, or parties! It's done to songs you hear on the radio -- you know, house, pop, R&B, hip hop and other up-beat dance-jams.
And the dance moves taught are JUST-FOR-GUYS.
In other words, this program does NOT teach you:
Ridiculous music video routines that you can never see yourself doing in public
Partner dancing stuff that's waaaay too formal. and not suitable for a casual night out
Goofy, silly dance moves that make you look like a clown
Super feminine dance moves that asks to go waaaay too far beyond your comfort zone


This program takes you step-by-step, through the process of:
gaining rhythm
moving to the beat
loosening up your body to stop looking stiff and tensed up
learning a set of the most versatile, best looking dance moves
connecting these moves together
practicing them the right way so you master them within the week


Here's the bottom line:
Watch -- and follow -- 1 set of video a day -- for 3 Days. Each set of videos runs for around 42 minutes. By the end of day 3, you'll possess the new ability to walk out onto any dance floor - start moving, stepping, grooving to the music, and join in on the fun.
Follow exactly as I do, and start seeing results! It's that simple!
3 Bonuses:
Footwork starter kit: 3 additional footwork-based dance moves to help you look AWESOMEl!
CLUB DANCE Best Practices: Answers to the most commonly asked club-dance questions
NEW Dancer's FAQ: Answers to most commonly asked questions by new dancers.
target_audience: Guys that feel uncomfortable and out of place at social functions, parties or weddings

requirements: Speaks English
courses.description:
Writing an effective speech involves careful planning, organization, and consideration of your audience. Whether you're giving a speech for a special occasion, a persuasive talk, or an informative presentation, here are some key steps to help you craft an impactful speech:


1. Know Your Audience:
Understand who your audience is, their interests, and their level of knowledge on the topic.
Tailor your message to resonate with your audience's values and expectations.
2. Define Your Purpose:
Clearly define the purpose of your speech. Are you informing, persuading, entertaining, or a combination of these?
Your purpose will guide the content and tone of your speech.
3. Craft a Strong Opening:
Grab your audience's attention from the start. Consider using a compelling story, a surprising fact, a quote, or a thought-provoking question.
Clearly state your main message or thesis.
4. Organize Your Content:
Use a clear and logical structure. Common structures include chronological, problem-solution, cause-effect, or topical.
Break your speech into introduction, body, and conclusion.
5. Develop Key Points:
Limit the number of main points to make your speech more manageable and memorable (usually 2-4 main points).
Provide evidence, examples, and anecdotes to support your key points.
6. Create a Compelling Narrative:
Tell a story to illustrate your points. People remember stories more than dry facts.
Use descriptive language to paint a vivid picture for your audience.
7. Engage Your Audience:
Encourage audience participation through questions, rhetorical devices, or interactive elements.
Maintain eye contact and vary your tone and pace to keep your audience interested.
8. Address Counterarguments:
If you're delivering a persuasive speech, acknowledge opposing views and explain why your perspective is valid.
Anticipate and answer potential questions or concerns.
9. Use Effective Transitions:
Smooth transitions between sections help your audience follow your speech.
Use signposts to signal key points and transitions.
10. Craft a Memorable Conclusion:
Summarize your key points and restate your main message.
End with a strong closing statement, call to action, or a memorable quote.
11. Practice, Practice, Practice:
Rehearse your speech multiple times to become comfortable with the content and delivery.
Practice in front of a mirror, record yourself, or present to a friend for feedback.
12. Consider Your Delivery:
Pay attention to your body language, facial expressions, and voice tone.
Speak clearly and at a pace that allows your audience to follow.
13. Seek Feedback:
Get feedback from others to refine your speech. Ask for constructive criticism on content, delivery, and overall impact.
14. Revise and Polish:
Review and revise your speech based on feedback and your own observations.
Ensure clarity, coherence, and conciseness in your language.
15. Adapt to the Setting:
Be prepared to adjust your speech based on the context, time constraints, and the needs of your audience.


Remember that an effective speech is not just about what you say but also about how you say it. Connecting with your audience emotionally and intellectually will make your speech more impactful and memorable.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn to effectively talk & communicate with people

courses.description:
If you have been through narcissistic abuse, you know how deeply it can affect your mind, body, soul, and spirit. In this course, we will use a holistic blend of evidence-based and intuitive healing techniques to help you regain your confidence, restore your emotional balance, and step into your power. You will learn how to release trauma from the body, reprogram limiting beliefs, protect your energy, and develop a strong sense of self. This course is for anyone who wants a gentle yet powerful healing journey that honors both the psychological and energetic aspects of recovery.


Living mindfully is a powerful tool that gives us a fundamental understanding of our inner selves and everything around us by being tuned into the present moment. Consciously healing helps us embrace all aspects of who we are, the light and the dark. Confronting our traumas, fears, limitations, and mistaken core beliefs helps us see how powerful we are. We become much more attuned to the interconnectedness of our mind, body, and soul. Love, kindness, compassion, and empathy are innate and natural expressions of our ultimate growth spiritually, mentally, emotionally, and physically. Not only do we heal ourselves in our journey, we also play a role in the healing of the greater cosmic web, contributing to a world living in harmony, balance, and compassion. This is the ultimate peace on Earth, when we are able to effortlessly contribute to this creation while immersing ourselves in our wholeness and authenticity for a more fulfilling and meaningful life.
