courses.description:
Hello Beautiful Goddess!


Do you feel like you’ve missed proper feminine education in your life? We all have!! Which is why I created an introductory program for women. This course offers feminine-based education you never received at school that gives you the tools you need to reclaim your womb health and body sovereignty.


Ever wonder how you can feel more connected and aligned on your spiritual path?! Well, sisters, it is in womb work where we return to the ways of the Wise Woman and bow down in humility to our own humanness.


All wise women (that's you!) work with their wombs and with the wisdom of their bodies. It's within the relationship with our body where we can be SO real, so authentic! Our cycle teaches us how to hold ourselves with more kindness along our way.


"We don't receive wisdom, we must discover it for ourselves after a journey that no one can take for us" -Marcel Proust


As women, we are naturally cyclical beings and our rhythm is connected to the rhythm of our beautiful Mother Earth. Just like the moon, our womb goes through cycles .. this is the essence of the feminine.


Our monthly cycle impacts so much of our everyday actions, many you don't even consider. Research shows there are times of the month when you can get more done, be a more effective communicator, be better with high detail tasks, a better caretaker or lover, even times when learning a new skill is easier.


Imagine if you really understood when these times were in your life. You could plan your month to suit your strengths. You could get the results you were looking for, but with so much ease, USING your body to HELP you instead of HINDER you.


This may seem foreign to you because we have never been taught anything about this amazing occurrence within our cycle. Perhaps we learned about a few of the negative things that go on, but we're not given any information about the GOOD STUFF! The truth is our menstrual cycle brings enormous power and insight to our world and how we move through it.


The circle that is life is within our sacred bodies and the earth.


Just as the earth goes through seasons our inner world also goes through seasons. It is crucial to our wellbeing that we understand what is happening within our bodies during these inner seasons. Once we have gathered this wisdom and start to embody it, we realize how sacred our lives are and we can live from a more powerful and authentic place!


We are apart of nature and our menstrual cycle teaches us this! Our menstrual cycle is a grounding place of deep wisdom.


I adore my cycle in every way possible. For me, using my cycle as a guide, a compass, to navigate my days, weeks, months and overall life has been one of my biggest breakthroughs as a woman. To have the ability to understand what I am heading into each day all because I understand my body so deeply has given me such power. I would LOVE for you to feel the way I do about my cycle. And you can! Which is why I was called to create this program!


I'm so excited to share this online course with you. This course is the easiest way for women to learn about their cycle in their own time as this course never expires and you will always have access to it. "The Wisdom of Your 4 Inner Seasons" course takes you through EVERYTHING you need to know and understand about the most powerful tool you have ... Your menstrual cycle!


It is an honor to offer some incredibly powerful information to you. The information you will find here is not new information. In fact, this is ancient wisdom and once you begin this course I know you will remember the magic that is within your cycle!


What does this program offer:
An overview of your cycle as a whole.
The science and spiritual nature behind your cycle.
The meaning of your inner seasons.
What each phase represents.
How to navigate through each phase.
Understanding the cycle of death and rebirth you move through every month.
How to use your cycle to live a more authentic and balanced life.
How to use your cycle to create, work, and express yourself.
A guide to help you live a life in harmonious balance.
You womb and her relationship to the moon.
Natural remedies for menstruation.
The archetypes within your seasons.
Practices to help you embody the archetype within each phase.
Understand your own unique cyclical nature.
A deeper understanding of yourself as a woman.

Largely accepted as the most efficient mindset and communication style, Assertiveness provides the best guidelines we know for dealing with most personal and professional contexts. Delivery of criticism makes no exception.
The 4-Stage Assertive Strategy exclusively presented in this course addresses the entire process of Constructive Criticism Delivery, from thoughts to emotions to behaviors, and aims at providing a framework in which the individual actively and responsibly changes the inner and external environment for the better, through carefully crafted disclosure of opinion.
Content and Overview
This course is suitable for anyone who would like to learn how to efficiently deliver meaningful Criticism and transform negative feedback into a powerful social and self-development tool.
Drawing on the multi-dimensional character of Assertiveness, the course addresses the activation of the assertive traits on three main levels: cognitive, emotional and behavioral, thus creating an extended framework for understanding, analyzing and delivering both positive and negative feedback.
The course is divided in two parts: An introductory, theoretical segment, in which we will take a close look at feedback delivery in the assertive context, what Criticism is and isn’t and the way in which all of these elements influence constructive criticism delivery. The second part is a more practical one and it is where you will discover, step-by-step, The Assertive Strategy For Delivering Constructive Criticism.
The Assertive Strategy For Constructive Criticism Delivery includes four Stages -
The Attitude toward Criticism Delivery, Planning and Formulating the Critical Message, The Analysis of the Critical Message and the Delivery and Follow-Up processes, each of them comprising more steps to help create and activate the cognitive, emotional or behavioral traits that generate the most efficient communication techniques to convey helpful critical messages.
Then you will be ready to start implementing the Assertive Strategy, make positive changes in the world around you and motivate both yourself and others to achieve the desired personal and professional goals and build the life you want.

The Anxiety Toolbox is a course designed to help you better understand your anxiety, give you a set of tools to tackle it when it arises, and provide the exercises and insight necessary to build an internal state of being that is far less prone to it longterm.
As a former severe anxiety sufferer, I know just how crippling anxiety can be. I once believed that I was destined to spend the rest of my life either caught up in an anxiety attack or living in fear of the next one, but after several years I hit a point where I refused to accept that as my reality.
I sought out anything and everything that I could. From books to seminars to counselling to energetic healing and so much more, I stopped at nothing to put at end to the anxiety that was controlling my life. It took me a long time -and the sifting through of a lot of very ineffective resources -but I figured it out, and now I'm incredibly passionate about sharing what I found to hopefully set you free from anxiety as well!
I've built this course to share with you all of the tools that have not only proven to be the needed antidote to conquering my own anxiety, but even the anxiety of dozens of others I've counselled over the years.
HOW TO KNOW IF THIS COURSE IS A GOOD FIT FOR YOU
If you consistently live in fear of your next big anxiety attack
If you regularly let your anxiety hold you back from doing the things you normally would love to do
If you're ready to put the work in to conquer anxiety for good rather than always seek temporary fixes

courses.title: Nutrition - Level - 1
courses.bio: Quiz Bank
courses.description:
Advantages of Question and Answer Studies in Teaching


Question and answer sessions have long been considered as an effective teaching method because they actively engage students in the learning process. This technique promotes critical thinking and stimulating discussions, which not only helps students absorb essential concepts more efficiently but also encourages them to build stronger communication skills. Furthermore, question and answer sessions give educators with vital information into their students' comprehension levels, allowing for targeted interventions and support as needed.


Testing in Teaching: Striking a Balance


While testing is an important part of the learning process, it is critical to strike a balance to prevent causing unnecessary stress and worry among students. Formative assessments, such as quizzes and practice exams, can provide useful feedback to both students and teachers, directing instructional preparation and assisting students in their learning journey. However, it is also crucial to develop a low-stakes testing environment that prioritizes growth and improvement above grades. Finally, strategic integration of testing into the teaching framework can foster a culture of continual learning and improvement among both students and educators.
The Impact of Technology on Question and Answer Studies and Testing


In today's digital age, technology plays a critical role in improving question and answer sessions and testing in the classroom. Online platforms and interactive tools provide novel ways to engage students in active learning, such as virtual Q&A sessions and real-time feedback mechanisms. These digital tools not only give instructors with data-driven insights into student performance, but they also allow for personalized learning experiences based on individual requirements.


Furthermore, technology-enabled testing platforms can simplify the assessment process, allowing for more efficient grading and immediate feedback delivery. This quick feedback loop can be quite useful in guiding teaching strategies and identifying areas for additional support or enrichment. As educators continue to reap the benefits of technology, it is critical to strike a balance between traditional teaching methods and tech-integrated approaches in order to provide a well-rounded and productive educational experience for all students.
target_audience: These tests are suitable for everyone who is interested in this issue.

courses.description:
There exists within each of us a potent center of creation—a wellspring of life energy. It is the force that breathes vitality into our most heartfelt aspirations, from the projects we embark upon to the relationships we cultivate. Yet, this energy is often clouded, choked by traumas, limiting beliefs, and the weight of ancestral burdens. These obstructions, though unseen, subtly hinder our fullest expression of self and purpose.


Reconnecting with Your Kushal Ool Tuuch, the Center of Creation Force
Awakening the Life Energy within You to Manifest Purpose, Career, and Relationships
Have you ever sensed that despite your relentless efforts, something intangible stands between you and fulfillment—whether in your career, personal relationships, or sense of purpose?
Imagine unlocking the dormant power within your center of creation, liberating it from unseen blockages. What if this very energy, once unshackled, could breathe life into your endeavors, relationships, and deepest aspirations, turning them into tangible, meaningful realities?
This transformative journey is designed to free you from the constraints of trauma, conditioning, and ancestral baggage, restoring vital energy to propel your life forward. Through indigenous healing practices, you will reconnect with your essence, rediscover your purpose, and revitalize your professional and personal relationships with newfound clarity and vitality.
In this 8-module course, you will embark on a profound inner pilgrimage to release the blockages that obstruct your creative force. These barriers—whether stemming from past trauma, limiting beliefs, or ancestral imprints—are woven deeply into the fabric of your existence. When they are cleared, your creative potential, aligned with your true purpose, can flow unimpeded.
The Three Key Manifestations Affected by Blocks in Our Center of Creation:
Professional and business projects
Personal purpose and destiny
Intimate relationships


When the kushal óol tuúch—the sacred center of creation energy—is misaligned, it directly impacts our ability to manifest our heart's desires. This course guides you through unique indigenous exercises and ceremonies, empowering you to release the roots of your blockages, whether they arise from trauma, abuse, conditioning, or pre-birth experiences.
What You Will Learn:
Self-Diagnostic Questionnaire

Your Instructors:
Nana Tzununjá (Maria Eugenia Aguilar Castro)
A Mayan High Priestess and renowned healer, Nana Tzununjá is an Ashoka Fellow and a Nobel Peace Prize Nominee. Her profound wisdom guides this course, imparting ancient knowledge to heal and empower.

courses.description:
Have you ever struggled with establishing self-care as part of your daily routine? Do you struggle with finding what self-care practices work for you? Maybe, you've found that you have yet to find a self-care activity that really calls to you and you want to commit to. Maybe, the past reasons why you couldn’t commit to engaging in ongoing self-care have changed and you are ready to make a commitment to your happiness and daily self-care practices.
In this class, you'll learn about what you want and what you need in your self-care practice. You'll be challenged to find what works for you, and how you can make it a part of your daily life. You'll participate in exercises that will challenge you to dig deeper and figure out how you can set yourself up for success when it comes to finding your ideal self-care practice! More importantly, you'll rediscover what activities bring you joy and help to balance you out.
In the exercises throughout this class, you'll be challenged to think beyond your limits and boundaries. You'll be asked to imagine what your ideal self-care practice can look like on a daily basis, and you'll work through your past hurdles in small steps so that you can set yourself up for life-long success.
You’ll be invited to imagine without limits and boundaries. You’ll be challenged to look at yourself as a priority and introduce the vulnerable part of you to a new, empowered you!

courses.title: Mental Health & Crisis Intervention
courses.bio: A Comprehensive Guide to Crisis Intervention, Mental Health, and Well Being
objectives: Define the Nature of a Crisis

Identify the key elements of Active Listening in response to a crisis

requirements: No experience needed. Basic familiarity with human psychology and nomenclature preferred.
courses.description:
This course was designed to simplify and teach students the basics of human psychology and mental health well being when responding to crisis, be it in the early or latter stages.


In this course, students will learn how to apply NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming) & Active Listening to mental health crisis with Conflict Resolution, and identify a crisis, or indicators leading up to an incident in it's early stages, thus, having the knowledge will be better prepared to respond and mitigate potentially hostile situations.


Additionally, this course will teach students to develop their communication skills, and better understand others, with a goal driven problem solving approach to human behavior and mental health crisis. This course is for everyone, with an emphasis in mental health experts, crisis intervention (hostage negotiators), counselors, and public safety professionals.


By applying the techniques taught in this presentation, students will be able to narrow down and pin point the root cause of a crisis, motive, and the intentions of a mental health subject. Students will also learn how to distinguish between the two personality types (Expressive vs. Instrumental), and determine whether someone is potentially hostile.


This is a course on Neuro-Linguistic Programming & Active Listening application in response to a mental health crisis, and teaches De-escalation, and NLP techniques which can be leveraged to establish rapport, bring down psychological defenses in reluctant individuals, and bring about positive change by harnessing the power of suggestion when responding to conflict and crisis.
target_audience: Mental Health Specialists, Crisis Intervention Professionals, Counselors, Psychologists, Psychiatrists, Law Enforcement, Security, Military, and Civilians

courses.title: Trauma Informed Empowerment Coaching
courses.bio: Practical Trauma-Informed Coaching Skills: Empower Clients Without Re-traumatisation
objectives: Explain what trauma is and how it impacts the brain, body, nervous system, and identity.
Differentiate between PTSD, Complex PTSD, and general trauma responses, recognising how these may show up in coaching relationships.
Describe the core principles of trauma-informed practice and apply them to create safe, ethical, and empowering coaching environments.
Recognise common trauma responses, including fight, flight, freeze, and fawn, and respond compassionately in coaching sessions.
Understand Polyvagal Theory and nervous system regulation as foundations for emotional safety and client engagement.
Structure coaching sessions to support nervous system safety, including managing transitions, session pacing, and safe closure practices.
Apply core empowerment coaching skills to help clients reclaim agency, set trauma-sensitive goals, and build self-trust through client-led coaching.
Maintain ethical professional boundaries, understanding scope of practice, informed consent, confidentiality, and appropriate record-keeping.
Respect client autonomy and boundaries, using choice-based approaches to avoid retraumatisation and support post-traumatic growth.

Key Concepts and Principles of Trauma In: The 5 Core Principles of Trauma-Informed Practice
Trauma in Everyday Coaching – Recognising Hidden Trauma in Clients
Trauma-Informed Empowerment Coaching - Key Definitions and Concepts
Understanding the Professional Boundaries Between Coaching and Therapy
Understanding Trauma: Understanding Trauma – The Many Faces and Forms of Psychological Injury
Polyvagal Theory - Understanding Safety, Survival, and the Nervous System
Why Trauma Stays in the Body - Neurobiology and Somatic Storage

Grounding Techniques for Emotional Stability - A Practical Guide

Rebuilding Self-Trust and Inner Authority After Trauma
Navigating Shame and Internalised Limiting Beliefs
Connection and Communication: Boundaries and Communication Skills - A Trauma-Informed Approach
The Role of Connection, Relationships, and Attachment in Healing

requirements: No previous experience is needed for enrol on this course.
courses.description:
Become a Trauma-Informed Empowerment Coach with DASH
At DASH (Domestic Abuse Support Hub), we’re passionate about changing the way we support people affected by trauma. As a registered non-profit, every penny of our profits is reinvested back into helping survivors and vulnerable people through direct support services, community workshops and ongoing advocacy.
But we can’t do it alone.
That’s why we’re offering professional, accessible Trauma-Informed Training Courses. These courses equip coaches, support workers and everyday professionals with the tools to create safer, more compassionate spaces where healing and empowerment can begin.
Why Trauma-Informed Practice Matters
In today’s world, being trauma-informed is no longer optional. Whether you work as a coach, therapist, educator or support worker, many of the people you serve are carrying the invisible weight of trauma. Without the right knowledge and approach, helping relationships can unintentionally reinforce harm, misunderstanding or disempowerment.
Trauma-Informed Empowerment Coaching offers a new way. This approach centres on:
Safety and choice
Regulation before transformation
Collaboration over authority
At DASH, we believe every professional who supports others should understand how trauma impacts the mind, body and nervous system, and how to respond with skill, compassion and respect.
What You’ll Learn
Our Trauma-Informed Empowerment Coaching Course blends professional coaching skills with modern trauma theory and practical, actionable tools.
You’ll learn how to:
Understand and recognise trauma responses in clients
Create safety and psychological containment within sessions
Avoid re-traumatisation and support nervous system regulation
Set trauma-sensitive, empowering goals
Work compassionately with protective behaviours like self-sabotage, people-pleasing and avoidance
Communicate using attuned, client-led dialogue
Maintain ethical, professional boundaries and stay within your coaching scope
Who Is This Course For?
This course is ideal for:
Coaches (life, empowerment, wellbeing)
Counsellors, support workers and mental health professionals
Domestic abuse practitioners and advocates
Teachers, healthcare workers and community professionals
Anyone who works in a role that supports people
Why Choose DASH?
At DASH, we don’t believe in generic online courses where learning is disconnected from impact. When you train with us:
Your learning creates real-world change.
All course profits go directly into funding support sessions, crisis work and community recovery programmes.
You’re trained by real-world practitioners.
Our courses are built on lived experience and professional expertise, not just academic theory.
You become part of a movement for change.
Together, we’re working to ensure no survivor is met with misunderstanding or harm when reaching out for support.
Join Us – Help Change the Future of Support
Empower yourself to empower others.
Enrol today and help us create a world where safety, compassion and empowerment are the foundations of every helping relationship.
target_audience: Life Coaches seeking to work more safely and effectively with clients carrying trauma histories.
Empowerment Coaches wanting to develop a trauma-aware foundation to support client autonomy and growth.
Wellbeing, Mindset, or Personal Development Coaches who work with clients facing emotional blocks, maladaptive patterns, or low confidence.
Counsellors or Therapists in Training who want practical coaching skills while maintaining trauma sensitivity.
Mental Health Coaches or Peer Support Workers seeking to deepen understanding of trauma responses and avoid retraumatisation in sessions.
Social Workers, Support Workers, or Youth Workers incorporating coaching techniques into their professional practice.
Domestic Violence or Abuse Advocates who work with survivors and want to integrate empowerment-based coaching approaches.
Healthcare and Community Professionals interested in using trauma-informed communication and coaching skills in supportive roles.
Yoga, Movement, or Somatic Practitioners wanting to add trauma-informed coaching methods to their practice.
Neurodiversity Coaches or Professionals who support autistic, ADHD, or otherwise neurodivergent clients and wish to understand trauma’s overlap.
Anyone with lived experience of trauma who wants to train professionally to support others safely and ethically.

courses.description:
Welcome to the Self-Love & Self-Awareness Masterclass, your foundation for an empowered and fulfilling 2025. If you’re ready to elevate your confidence, strengthen your resilience, and nurture a deep sense of self-worth, this course is for you. Here’s what you can expect and why this course will be the most transformative step you take this year:


What You’ll Learn:
• Self-Compassion vs. Self-Pity: Understand the difference and practice self-kindness instead of getting trapped in negative self-talk.
• The Power of Presence: Learn how mindfulness can ground you, build self-awareness, and help you live in the moment with peace.
• Self-Forgiveness as an Act of Self-Love: Release guilt and embrace growth by learning how to forgive yourself and move forward.
• Recognizing and Replacing Limiting Beliefs: Identify the stories that hold you back and reframe them into empowering truths.
• Building Healthy Boundaries: Discover how to set clear, respectful boundaries that protect your energy and strengthen your relationships.
• The Impact of Comparison Culture: Stop comparing yourself to others and celebrate your unique path.
• The Importance of Small Wins: Learn how to acknowledge and celebrate progress, not just big achievements.
• Assertive Communication: Practice expressing your needs with clarity and confidence.
• Inner Child Healing: Reconnect with and heal the younger version of yourself who needed more love, support, or protection.
• Affirmations and Self-Recognition: Craft affirmations that resonate with your strengths and rebuild your inner dialogue.


What to Expect:
• A Personalized Self-Growth Journey: Each chapter is designed to meet you where you are and guide you step-by-step toward deeper self-awareness and resilience.
• Reflection Prompts and Exercises: Thoughtful journaling prompts and practical exercises to help you apply each lesson to your daily life.
• Community Support: Connect with like-minded learners who are also on their self-love journey.
• Ongoing Updates: You’ll have lifetime access to the course, including any new lessons or updates added to support your growth.


Why 2025 Starts Here:
• A Foundation for Success: Before making any big moves in 2025, build a strong foundation of self-trust, resilience, and self-love.
• Transform Your Confidence: This course will help you not just to believe in your worth but to live boldly and authentically.
• Embrace Change with Grace: Whether you’re navigating a career shift, new goals, or personal challenges, you’ll be equipped to handle them with clarity and strength.


Exclusive Rewards Upon Course Completion:
• Free Digital Self-Love Journal: A beautifully designed journal filled with prompts and affirmations to support your ongoing journey.
• Self-Love & Awareness Guidebook: A comprehensive resource summarizing everything you’ve learned, so you can revisit key lessons anytime.


Take this step for yourself, your future self will thank you. This course isn’t just a program, it’s a lifestyle shift. Your 2025 is waiting, and it all starts with the commitment to love and honor yourself every step of the way.

courses.title: The Power of Self Talk
courses.bio: Learn to use your thoughts to your benefit to optimise your action taking skills and build self esteem.
objectives: Identify your cognitive distortions
Become more aware of your thoughts
Compassionately being honest with yourself
Apply self talk tips to your daily life
requirements: Willingness to better yourself and want change
courses.description:
Your self talk is how you interpret and process your daily experiences. It's your judgements and your inner critic.
Building a strong inner voice will truly change your life. It's key to be able to make consctruive critisism, to be kind, to build problem solving skills and to be supportive of yourself.
Human nature is prone to being negative, but it doesn't have to stay that way. The moment we become conscious, we have the ability to change things around. We have the ability to reprogram our mind from it's default mode.
One thing for sure, this is not a course of toxic positivity. Positive self talk is not avoiding your current reality. This course is about changing your inner dialogue to work for you and not against you. It's about being honest with yourself, holding yourself accountable, and yet doing so in a loving and compassionate way (the only way that's beneficial).
Everything we do and how we feel relies around our thoughts and how we speak to ourselves. Our self talk is extremely powerful in determining our self image and what we choose to do or not do.
It's important to become conscious of what your self talk and to use it to your advantage. Doing so is moving towards taking responsibility for your life and that's one of the first steps of your self development journey.
Think better. Live better.
target_audience: Individuals who suffer from negative self talk that keeps them stuck

Who you are is often defined by your degrees, your work or the life you lead but how you come across and how you can stand out is mainly defined by your behaviour towards other people

courses.description:
Are you ready to embark on a transformative journey of self-discovery and empowerment? In "God Didn't Make a Mistake," we will explore the profound truth that each of us is crafted with intention and infused with purpose. This course invites you to delve deep into the essence of your being, recognizing your unique gifts and the remarkable story that is your life.
Through a blend of interactive discussions, reflective exercises, and inspiring materials, you will uncover the beauty of your existence. You'll engage in thought-provoking activities that challenge limiting beliefs and encourage you to embrace your identity as a valuable creation. Together, we will celebrate your individuality and learn to appreciate the unique path that has shaped you.
By the end of this course, you'll not only affirm your worth but also cultivate a deeper appreciation for the incredible gift of life. It’s time to step into your purpose with confidence and joy!
Are you ready to discover the amazing truth that you were created for a reason?
Well, jump into this course and let's start to talk to the Mirror on the Wall, defeat The Comparison Trap, learn to Like Me, not be shackled by your past, and celebrate your YOU-ness.
target_audience: By the end of this course you will believe in yourself and the gifts that God has placed in you. You are here for a reason. God has a plan for your life, and He didn't make a mistake when He brought you into this world. You are exactly who you're supposed to be, and that is something to celebrate.

A Holistic Guide to Personal Growth & Mental Well-being
Unleash Your Best Self : Practical Strategies for a Healthier, More Successful and More Fulfilling Life.
Are you ready to unlock your full potential and cultivate a life filled with purpose, joy, and inner peace? This course, "Unleash Your Best Self: A Holistic Guide to Personal Growth & Mental Well-being," is your essential roadmap to achieving just that. In today's fast-paced world, prioritizing our mental health and personal development isn't a luxury – it's a necessity. This comprehensive program is designed to equip you with the practical strategies and profound insights needed to navigate life's challenges with resilience, build a strong foundation of self-awareness, and ultimately, thrive.
We'll dive deep into key areas of personal growth, from mastering your mindset and overcoming limiting beliefs to cultivating powerful habits that drive success. You'll learn effective techniques for stress management, emotional regulation, and building healthier relationships. This isn't just about theory; it's about actionable steps you can implement immediately to see tangible improvements in your daily life. Whether you're looking to boost your confidence, reduce anxiety, enhance your productivity, or simply live with more intention, this course provides a holistic framework for sustainable well-being. Enroll today and start your transformative journey towards becoming the best version of yourself.

courses.description:
Featured Review:
"I like how Sandy combines topics on feedback and criticism, from one lesson to the next. The numbered tips are especially helpful in remembering what to look out for when interacting with customers, comments, etc. Her presentation style is engaging and fun, so is great to learn from." - Jon Clemson
Welcome To Part One!
Are you an online creator or artist and does receiving bad feedback worry you? Or maybe you’ve already received harsh criticism and felt helpless, crushed and with no idea how to form a response?
You are at the right place! You are watching Sandys-Eyecatcher TV!
Sandy Dee has led over 50 photography workshops and published multiple online courses. This, along with her extensive background in Human Resources, gave her great insight into the art of Human Behavior.
Plus: In her research she gathered an enormous amount of information on haters, online trolls, passive aggressive behavior and how and why people leave negative feedback.
Negative critiques can be all consuming.
They will block your creativity and cloud your mind - until you know how to deal with them. Sandy will help you handle and respond to negative comments and reviews by understanding how, why and when people choose to give feedback, especially online.
You will also understand the reason why generic online advice such as ‘take a deep breath’ or ‘don’t take it personally’ doesn’t help - in fact, why it can actually make you feel worse!
In Part 1 of this series you will look inside yourself and your reviewer’s mindset to learn:


How to set a positive framework to reduce the risk of getting negative reviews in the first place
The importance of willpower (and why it makes you and your reviewer cranky)
Free yourself from toxic people
Introvert vs extrovert personalities
When you should ignore a critic
Listen to yourself instead of others and generic advice
How to prepare yourself mentally for bad feedback
Our F.A.C.K.T.S system: Respond to negative comments like a pro and come out as a winner!
And so much more!


PLUS: 50 Tips on "How To Deal With Criticism" (from part 1 and part 2) are included as a PDF in lecture 51!


At the end of the course you will not only feel more confident in handling criticism but you will have a deeper understanding about yourself and the behavior of your reviewer.
Are you ready to spend more time on your content and your value and less time worrying or being frustrated? Enroll now and see you in class!
Also: Closed Captioning is available on all lectures! The computer browser offers the best viewing experience.
target_audience: Artists, Photographers, Designers, Public Figures, Influencers & Anybody Who Fears Online Criticism (Bad Reviews, Hating Comments)
Online Creators, Instructors & Teachers Who Publish Content Online (Udemy, Skillshare, Youtube...)
Anyone Who Wants To Understand What Drives Online Social Behavior Such As Trolls Or Haters

courses.description:
This course is for people who want to step outside their comfort zone and start getting RESULTS. Overcoming rejection is one of the hardest things to do, but the rewards are worth it. I designed this course to simple, practical, and results driven. As an entrepreneur and mindset coach I understand the many different emotions, challenges, and sacrifices it takes to run a business. My goal in creating this course is to help you overcome rejection long enough to get results.
Over 6.5 hours of content
Practical guide for OVERCOMING REJECTION
Proven Strategies that I personally use
Results Driven
Here is a Fact
Most people want to succeed but are afraid of rejection. Don’t believe me, I bet one of these situations apply to you.


Wanted to negotiate higher pay, but didn’t.
Want to start something new but nervous about family or friends opinion’s.
Get defensive when you receive criticism.
You know what you need to do but haven’t done it.


So maybe none of these examples apply to you. The point that I am making is that rejection is a necessary part of growth and most people don’t know how to deal with it. Ask yourself this question: How would my life be different if I could overcome rejection long enough to get the results I want?


My course will teach you what rejection really is, how to combat it and create long term change. Let’s be real, I know you want to know what authority I have to speak on this subject. The truth is my ability to overcome rejection long enough to get results allowed me to escape a negative environment that sent many of my family and peers to prison or a graveyard. I was able to focus on the long term and overcome the immediate obstacles that others couldn't. I am an entrepreneur who started at the bottom and was told no at every step of the way. I know the struggle of having $3 in your bank account but still waking up and giving 100%. I have tried wholesaling real estate when I wanted to make money fast. I worked temp jobs to make enough money to cover bills. I spent $1000 on getting licensed in real estate with my student loan money and didn't sell any properties until I moved to another state a year later. These are just a few of my struggles and in each one I had to overcome a high level of rejection.


If you are willing to change and challenge yourself, buy my course.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs Who are Afraid of Taking Risk
Highly Motivated People That Need a Boost
Driven People Who Need A Practical Way to Overcome Rejection
Business Owners Who Want to Increase Sales

requirements: A Willingness to Engage in Self-Reflection: This course involves journaling, introspection, and personal exercises, so participants should be open to exploring their emotions and experiences.
A Desire to Heal and Move Forward: Students should have a genuine interest in healing from past betrayal and a readiness to create a positive, fulfilling future.

Ability to Set Aside Time for Personal Growth: While self-paced, students will benefit from setting aside dedicated time each week to watch videos, complete exercises, and engage fully with the course content.
courses.description:
This comprehensive course is designed for women who have experienced the deep pain of betrayal and are ready to embark on a path to healing and self-empowerment. Through practical strategies, introspective exercises, and supportive guidance, you'll acquire the tools to rebuild your self-worth, set and maintain healthy boundaries, and reclaim control over your life. This course is structured in six transformative phases, starting with understanding the profound emotional impact of betrayal and progressing through phases focused on financial independence, self-care, and rediscovering intimacy with yourself and others.
In each phase, you’ll learn actionable steps to manage complex emotions like grief, anger, and anxiety, while developing resilience to face triggers and challenges. This course also offers targeted strategies for communication—whether co-parenting with an ex or navigating a current relationship—helping you to set boundaries that protect your well-being. With dedicated sections on creating a financial plan and fostering emotional independence, you'll leave with a toolkit designed to help you thrive in your new life. Whether you’re looking to rebuild trust within an existing relationship or are prepared to move forward independently, this course provides a supportive, structured roadmap to healing, empowerment, and lasting transformation. Join this journey and take the first step towards reclaiming your strength, happiness, and future.

courses.description:
Course Description:
This comprehensive course is designed to help you develop the skills and behaviors needed to become more charismatic and engaging in social interactions. By focusing on authenticity, empathy, communication, and conflict resolution, you will learn how to connect with others more effectively and leave a lasting positive impression.


Course Outline:
Introduction to Charisma and Social Skills
Understanding Charisma: What it is and why it matters.
The Role of Social Skills in Building Relationships: Key components and benefits.
Self-Assessment: Identifying your current strengths and areas for improvement.
Authenticity and Genuine Connection
Being True to Yourself: The importance of authenticity.
Developing Self-Awareness: Tools and techniques for understanding your own values and personality.
Building Genuine Connections: Strategies for creating meaningful relationships.
Effective Communication
Verbal Communication Skills: Clarity, conciseness, and confidence.
Nonverbal Communication: Understanding body language, facial expressions, and eye contact.
Active Listening: Techniques for listening effectively and showing genuine interest.
Empathy and Emotional Intelligence
Understanding and Developing Empathy: How to connect with others on an emotional level.
Emotional Intelligence: Recognizing and managing your own emotions and those of others.
Practicing Empathy in Daily Interactions: Practical exercises and scenarios.
Sharing Stories and Offering Perspectives
The Power of Storytelling: How to captivate and engage your audience.
Crafting Compelling Stories: Techniques for creating relatable and memorable stories.
Offering Unique Perspectives: How to think critically and share fresh insights.
Conflict Resolution and Negotiation
Understanding Conflict: Types and causes of conflict in social interactions.
Conflict Resolution Strategies: Techniques for resolving disputes amicably.
Negotiation Skills: How to find common ground and achieve win-win outcomes.
Practicing Kindness and Generosity
Acts of Kindness: How generosity can enhance your social interactions.
Being Generous with Time and Resources: Practical ways to help others.
Giving Compliments and Positive Feedback: How to make others feel valued and appreciated.
Continuous Improvement and Self-Reflection
Self-Reflection Techniques: How to evaluate your social interactions and learn from them.
Seeking Feedback: Methods for obtaining and using constructive feedback.
Setting Personal Goals: How to create and achieve goals for ongoing improvement in your social skills.
Course Materials:
Reading Materials: Selected articles and book excerpts on communication, empathy, and charisma.
Videos and Lectures: Recorded sessions with experts in social skills and personal development.
Interactive Exercises: Practical exercises to apply what you’ve learned in real-life scenarios.
Discussion Forums: Online community to share experiences and insights with fellow learners.
Assessment and Certification:
Quizzes: Periodic quizzes to test your understanding of the material.
Assignments: Practical assignments to demonstrate your application of the skills learned.
Final Project: A comprehensive project where you will create and present a plan for improving your social skills in a specific area of your life.
Certificate of Completion: Awarded upon successful completion of all course requirements.
Instructor(s):
Lead Instructor: A seasoned expert in social skills, communication, and personal development.
Guest Speakers: Professionals from various fields who will share their insights and experiences.
Enrollment Information:
Course Duration: 8 weeks
Time Commitment: Approximately 1.5 hours per week
Format: Online with live sessions and self-paced learning components
Prerequisites: None, although a willingness to engage in self-reflection and practice new skills is essential.

Welcome to "Charisma for Introverts: Improve Your Charisma in 15 Days!"


Are you ready to embark on a transformative journey? This isn't just any course—it's your personal roadmap to unlocking the charismatic potential within you. Whether you're an introvert looking to shine in social settings or someone eager to deepen connections with others, this course is tailor-made for you.


Why This Course Matters: Let's face it, charisma isn't just about being the life of the party. It's about captivating hearts, sparking meaningful conversations, and leaving a lasting impression. In a world where connections matter more than ever, cultivating charisma isn't just a skill; it's a superpower.


What to Expect: Over the next 15 days, we're diving headfirst into practical applications that will ignite your charisma from within. Each day, you'll receive actionable steps designed to fit seamlessly into your daily life. This isn't about overnight miracles; it's about consistent, intentional growth.


Your Role: This course is your guide, but the real magic happens when you take the reins. It's up to you to turn these practices into habits, integrating them into your daily routine. Remember, every small action counts—it's the cumulative effort that leads to remarkable change.


Let's Get Started: Are you ready to unleash the charismatic powerhouse within you? Buckle up, because this journey is going to be nothing short of extraordinary. Together, we'll celebrate victories, navigate challenges, and emerge stronger, more charismatic versions of ourselves.

requirements: Nothing! Just bring an open mind and a hunger to learn.
courses.description:
What is Verbal Self Defense 101 about?
This is an INTRODUCTION to the art and science of verbal self defense, an essential life and social skill.
In life people will always provoke and test you. They do this in order to find out what you're made of. Just like on the playground, your social standing depends on your ability to deal with people's social tests. If you do not know how to fight back verbally when people verbally provoke, bully, or test you, you will find yourself on the lower end of the "social totem pole".
This course will teach you how to "fight back" with wit and social intelligence. It will do this by identifying for you the MOST COMMON verbal attacks and insults that you will experience and teach you the BEST ways to respond.
What kind of materials are included?
This course consists of FIVE short video lessons and a PDF file summarizing the material in this course.
Two bonus lectures are also included.
How long will the course take to complete?

This course will only take you roughly 30 minutes to complete. In only 30 minutes, you will be able to deal with and crush all the most common verbal attacks and insults!
How is this course structured?

Not only will this course teach you HOW to respond to the most common verbal attacks and insults, you will also learn important mindsets and non-verbal communications NECESSARY to implement these responses to their full effect.
Finally, the course will finish with some exercises to help you reinforce the material in this course.
target_audience: This course is for people who suffer from verbal bullying, verbal attacks and insults, and teasing. Verbal self defense is an essential life and social skill.

Access to meditation clips for ongoing recovery work
Additional take-home recovery exercises for shrinking the inner critics and strengthening the authentic self for greater self-expression and personal power

Lecture 2: Regions of the Brain Implicat: Regions of the Brain Implicated in Toxic Shame

requirements: Everyone interested in the subject is welcome. No requirements.
courses.description:
Toxic shame is a source of most of the mental health conditions that we now understand. It is also a source of violence to self and others. For example, if you were never allowed to express anger in your family, your unexpressed anger is shamed and dissociated from your sense of self. As a result, your toxic shame is triggered whenever you feel angry. Such unexpressed survival energy is often converted into psychosomatic conditions such as anxiety, depression, pro-inflammatory conditions, etc.
Healthy shame is an essential part of the ego ideal necessary for healthy brain development in childhood. Healthy shame is developed from aged 6 months once a baby is able to differentiate the face of their primary care giver from others. However, developmental trauma or trauma in adolescent-hood or adulthood can transmute healthy shame into toxic shame.
Toxic shame is a soul tormentor that is experienced in the entire being as the all perversive sense that 'I am fundamentally broken, defective and flawed as a human being." Once toxic shame becomes a state of being, one's core identity, it overwhelms us with a sense of worthlessness and helplessness. Since a shame-based identity makes us feel abjectly exposed, we then look for how to cover it up using defences and other control behaviours.
If toxic shame is not dealt with, it forces us to develop a false self as a cover-up or defence for our shame-based identity. Toxic shame is unwanted exposure that will always require a cover-up or defence. Toxic shame cover up/defences may include addictions, co-dependency, borderline personality, narcissistic personality, paranoid personality, offender behaviours, etc. Toxic shame defences also include other dysfunctional family system roles such as; scapegoat, family hero/star, lost child, surrogate spouse, caretaker, rescuer, etc.
Toxic shame binds all other emotions, needs and drives within us, in the sense that, by feeling any of these emotions, needs or dives, your toxic shame spiral is triggered. Since the fundamental core of humanity is grounded in our feelings, needs and drives, if they are bound in shame, we become dissociated from the reality and incapable of fully living.
The purpose of this recovery session is to give us a safe space to fully understand and heal our toxic shame, uncover hidden defences and free the inner child, so that we can start to live to the full and enjoy all the good things life has provided.
target_audience: Everyone interested in the subject is welcome on this course

courses.description:
Would you like to feel better about yourself?
Would you like to know fully that you’re a worthwhile and valuable person?
Would you like to recognize that you, without a doubt, deserve the life that you dream of?
In his latest course, top-rated Udemy instructor and world-renowned coach TJ Guttormsen helps you achieve all of these things and more.
The course is filmed in a high-quality studio setting and is based both on psychological research and TJ’s extensive experience coaching thousands of people from across the globe since 2009.


"This instructor is amazing. Learning from him is like having a heart to heart talk with a true friend who cares. My only regret to taking this course is that I didn't find it sooner." - Gidget Harris, Udemy student, 5 stars.
"TJ Guttormsen has made another course that is life-changing for most people. Love all his work!" - Don Nguyen, Udemy student, 5 stars.


What is self-esteem and why is it important?
Self-esteem is all about how we value, appreciate, and love ourselves.
It influences almost every single part of our life, and it is in many ways the filter we experience the world through.
It is also a highly misunderstood concept.
Self-esteem is often confused with confidence. But while they might overlap in some areas of our life, these are two very different things.
Confidence is about what we know or believe that we can do. While self-esteem is about how we value ourselves as a person and how much we appreciate ourselves.
Self-esteem also doesn’t come from where most people think.
Many believe that their self-esteem is dependent on external factors such as approval from others, their past, their perceived success, or similar. And those influenced by this belief also tend to be the ones who struggle the most with their self-esteem.
So in this course, TJ is not just going to disprove that belief, but also show you how to create genuine, healthy self-esteem from the only place it truly comes from: Within yourself.


"I signed up for this course because I've had a long-term issue with self-esteem, which has negatively impacted many areas of my life. I'm so glad I did! TJ's thorough, confident and clear teachings are spot on - I had some "AHA" insights that have truly made a difference already. You are valuable, worth taking care of, and it's time to believe in your wonderful, authentic self. This course and exercises will show you how." - Despina Malas, Udemy student, 5 stars.


What will you learn?
While the course has over 30 chapters filled with knowledge and exercises, the course has two primary goals.
1: To help you take the power away from anything and everything that is currently holding your self-esteem back. Whether that is your past, other people, external pressure or expectations, or anything else.
And 2: To show you lots of ways to start generating healthy self-esteem from within yourself.
To achieve this, TJ has structured the course content in three distinct parts.


In the first section, you’ll learn all about how to take back the power over your self-esteem.
Some of the topics included are:
How to change your future.
How to let go of the past.
How to create a new self-image.
How to overcome learned helplessness.
How to get your unconscious mind to help build self-esteem.
And more...


In the second section, you’ll learn lots of ways to generate healthy self-esteem from within yourself.
Some of the topics in this section include:
How to live in integrity (and why that’s crucial for our self-esteem).
Expectation and ambition management.
How failure and mistakes can help build self-esteem.
How to know that you deserve everything you want.
Several incredibly helpful self-esteem exercises.
And lots more...


And in the third section of the course, you'll learn behaviors that can help you reach your self-esteem goals faster.
Topics include:
How to handle criticism.
How to stop having anything to prove to anyone.
How new experiences will build self-esteem.
How to teach others how to treat you.
And so on...


And in addition to all of this content, TJ offers free personal support to everyone who takes his courses. He’s just as invested in you succeeding as he is with his personal coaching clients who pay him thousands of dollars to work with him.
So if you’re ready to take your self-esteem to the next level, sign up now.

courses.description:
Confidence is important for excelling in life because it manifests itself in many different ways. The term “confidence” is a wide umbrella term that encompasses eight different specific types of confidence.
While the idea of being confident or showing confidence has the same core message – believing in yourself and your abilities – the way that confidence appears happens in eight main ways. In this course, I will teach you to build strengths and boost your skills in all the 8 following spheres of confidence:
1. Self-confidence.
2. Confidence in your support system.
3. Confidence that everything will be OK
4. Confidence that you can handle anything that comes your way.
5. Confidence that change can be a good thing.
6. Confidence in your ability to be completely self-supportive.
7. Confidence that within every struggle, challenge, obstacle, and failure, there are important lessons to be learned.
8. Confidence to step outside your comfort zone...
These eight types of confidence all require a belief in oneself to happen, but they refer to eight unique ways that belief can manifest a positive effect in a person’s life.
If your confidence is weak in any of the eight areas, your overall confidence and ability to live your life and excel are stifled.
Having a good understanding of these eight types of confidence can help you better understand where you may need to build more confidence in specific areas of your life.

courses.description:
Have you ever totally "lost it" and basically made a fool of yourself? Most people would think that this would be a conversation about how you felt afterwards. No such conversation here because we all know what it feels like to "loose it": if feels demeaning, humiliating and frankly, quite embarrassing. Instead I would like to ask you a different question: what was it that you lost when you say that you "lost it". A common answer to that question is: my temper, or my patience. if you feel that all you lost was your temper or your patience when you "lost it", no doubt you have also noticed that that you keep on "loosing it", and each time it gets a little worse. Part of the problem is that we don't know what it is that we have lost and we certainly do not know how to recover it, until now. I will explain this most common problem that afflicts all people in a way that you never heard before. You will learn what exercises to do, how to do them, and how to proceed the next time the going gets tough for you. You will feel elated to discover what few have discovered before you, and you will feel that you transcended the most visceral aspect of human nature.
The presentation and delivery of this course evolved over 20 years of therapy and teaching. Frequent repetition of key concepts and alternative explanations for the same ideas have proven to make our classes more enjoyable and productive for students. When students understand a topic and later hear an alternative explanation of the same idea they feel confident in their learning and expand their awareness of themselves. Additionally, students often comment that it is almost as if they can hear the instructor "talking to them", as the concepts covered seem to stay with students forever.
You will get a number of video lectures where I look directly into your eyes. I suggest you allow yourself the opportunity to watch the lectures at least once looking into the screen and focusing on the concepts. Later you can download the audio lectures and listen to them again if you wish.
I answer all questions students ask. Not only I enjoy very much receiving and addressing your questions, but actually I thank you for them, since all courses after the first one we did evolved from questions from students.
Thank you, and welcome to the journey!
Flavio Souza-Campos

courses.description:
Help your child protect their self-esteem when faced with bullying, stop bullying if it occurs, and build valuable conflict management skills they’ll use for life.
The skills taught in this course are based on the training programs of Vistelar, a world leader in workplace violence prevention and management.
In this course, you will learn Vistelar’s proven conflict management methods for handling bullying without fighting. Teens can take the course independently to learn these methods.
These methods have been tested by professionals in real-world environments since the early 1980s. Vistelar teaches non-escalation and de-escalation skills to healthcare staff, school teachers, and police officers and has published six books on conflict management.
The antibullying methods taught in this program have been used by tens of thousands of kids since 2010. Students give rave reviews and often report a rapid end to any bullying they may be experiencing.
Before this Udemy course, these methods were taught in hundreds of youth-focused organizations, including K-12 schools and martial arts academies. As a result, the course uses language tailored for youth and real-world stories.
You’ll discover how to prepare your child for bullying situations they may face at school or during group activities. You’ll learn exactly what your child should say, how they should say it, and how they can display confidence through posture, eye contact, and expression.
The methods learned can be used immediately to prevent bullying and handle it effectively if it occurs. In addition, your child will develop the skills to address the inevitable conflicts they will face throughout their life.
The course includes eight practical video lessons (~54 minutes) and a downloadable Quick Reference Guide.
With practice, the methods taught will become second nature, helping your child stay bully-proof for life.

courses.description:
Positive Self Talk  is really all about your internal dialogue and how positive it is or can get when you boost it as we will be exploring in this Course.
A lot of people have a problem with doing Positive Self Talk and saying affirmations because it feels 'too cheesy' or inauthentic to them and so they feel like they are lying to themselves. We get to the root of why that may be the case. Could it be a low self esteem issue that they are not aware exists? Come find out inside the course as we dive deep down into it.
Embracing the hard truth as you become more self aware of what is actually going on with you in this regard will allow you fall in love with the act of learning to say affirmations the way that it can begin to feel more authentic and true for you by improving your Self Esteem and Boosting your Positive Self Talk, so that it becomes like second nature.
No gimmicks, just pure good intentions, from you, to you.
We also unravel how not to get into 'toxic positivity' while using Positive Self Talk.
Again, we will explore what I have called The Most Effective Self Talk practice which is one of the Highlights of this Course for Addressing Negative Self Talk , hence leading to a Positive Self Talk Boost . I can confidently say that it is Life Changing and hence very effective.
The first step towards changing the way you treat yourself is to begin to notice when you are being very critical of you. It may be that, like many of us, your 'self critical or inner critic' voice is so common now for you that you hardly notice when it comes around to pay a 'mind visit', so to say.
Whenever you're feeling bad about something, think about what you've just said to yourself. Really, try to be as accurate as you possibly can . What words does your inner critic voice say to you? Are there any specific words that come up over and over again? What is the tone of your voice. Is it condescending, angry or judgmental? Does the voice remind you of anyone from your past who was critical of you? Well, we get into really practical examples inside the Course.
This Course contains Worksheets Assignments that are geared towards helping you get into that great space of a Positive Self Talk Boost while improving your Self Esteem in the process. Yes indeed. We unpack the goodness of a Healthy Self Esteem and how it is connected with our Self Concepts, Ideals, Values and of course, our Self Talk.

Whether you're going on an job interview, networking at an industry event, pitching to a potential client, or even going on a first date—your first impression can make or break that initial encounter. Before you even speak, people are picking up on subtle cues: your energy, posture, eye contact, tone of voice, and overall presence.
The truth is, we don’t get a second chance at a first impression. And in today’s fast-paced, competitive world, how you show up in that very first moment can influence opportunities, relationships, and the level of respect you command.
Do you come across as confident and clear—or unsure and forgettable?
This course is designed to help you own those crucial first moments and show up with intention, not insecurity. You’ll learn how to project confidence without arrogance, communicate with clarity and impact, and lead with authenticity—whether you're under pressure, building trust, or simply want to present your best self consistently.
You’ll gain tools to refine your executive presence, control nervous habits, and align your body language and tone with your message. By the end of this course, you won’t just understand how to make a great first impression—you’ll embody it in every professional or personal interaction.

Inspired by 10 years of experience helping people overcome the fear of public speaking, this course gives students unique and necessary tools to break through old patterns in order to show up as the version of themselves they truly want to embody.
We'll begin by laying a solid foundation of self-belief, incorporating physical practices to foster your success, identifying blindspots, and choosing positive thought patterns. Along the way, you'll learn perspective shifts that clients have called "life changing".
Most importantly, the final phase of the course involves real world application of the concepts discussed. Change begins in the mind, but it doesn't end there! You'll be given tangible action steps to implement that are guaranteed to improve your confidence, social skills, and overall comfort showing up as YOURSELF!


Each lesson includes a worksheet with a description of exercises for students to complete. Each lecture also includes additional video resources to support the learning process.


This course is taught by Tricia Veldman, MS CCC-SLP.
Having been described by others in a former life as “timid” and “soft-spoken,” Tricia is no stranger to the fear of "showing up sure". After embarking on her personal development quest, Tricia learned to trust and celebrate her own voice. Amazed by its impact on her daily life, she now combines experiential and scholastic knowledge to empower others to do the same.
Tricia has worked for a decade as a speech coach, empowering individuals to shatter limiting beliefs and become the person they most yearn to be. She walks her talk by performing original Spoken Word Poetry with the intention of both entertaining and inspiring her listeners.
Tricia gave a TEDx talk in 2023 called Tenets of Time: the short, the long, the messy. During her talk, she touches on a personal event that's completely transformed the way she views and lives life - for the better!
Founder of the platform PowerfulandPoised, Tricia makes it her mission to encourage, uplift, and inspire through her poetry, writing, and motivational speaking.
Perhaps most importantly, Tricia aims to incorporate a little bit of fun into everything she does - including this course! You'll see ;)

courses.description:
Virtually everyone has dreams, desires, and a sense of inner greatness they wish to achieve. Yet, for many, self-doubt reigns supreme, clouding their confidence and casting doubt on their abilities. They look at their aspirations as unreachable fantasies, convinced they lack the capability to turn them into reality. This mindset creates a barrier that often prevents people from even taking the first step toward their goals.
Success begins with self-awareness—the realization that you already possess the greatness needed to achieve your dreams. It’s about recognizing your inherent potential and understanding that your belief in yourself can either propel you forward or hold you back. Without self-confidence, even the most ambitious goals can seem impossible. Self-doubt acts as a paralytic, freezing you in place. It whispers fears—What if I fail? What if I’m not good enough?—which slowly erodes your motivation, diminishes your momentum, and drains your courage.
This course is designed to expose the behaviors and thought patterns that destroy self-esteem and confidence. You’ll learn effective, practical strategies to shift your mindset, build your self-worth, and develop unwavering confidence. We’ll explore the importance of cultivating a positive self-image and the critical role self-esteem plays in every aspect of life—including your career, relationships, and personal happiness.
Low self-esteem is often the hidden obstacle behind feelings of disappointment and frustration. It can manifest as jealousy, indecision, dependence, or excessive anger. It clouds your ability to enjoy life’s moments and to recognize and seize opportunities. Without a healthy sense of self-worth, success feels out of reach, and happiness remains elusive—even if your external circumstances are ideal.
By engaging with this course, you'll gain insight into the destructive patterns that undermine your confidence, and most importantly, learn how to replace them with empowering habits. You’ll discover the tools to build genuine self-esteem, develop resilience against setbacks, and unlock your full potential. This is about more than just dreaming; it’s about transforming those dreams into attainable realities.
If you find yourself relating to any of these struggles or know someone who does, I invite you to join us. We’ll take a no-nonsense approach to cultivating self-esteem and embracing the greatness that lies within you. Together, we will forge a path toward a more confident, fulfilled, and successful life.
target_audience: If you're ready to unlock your full potential, tap into your inner power, and transform your life—this course is for you. Whether you're seeking clarity, confidence, or a fresh start, you'll find the guidance and inspiration you need here.

courses.title: Beyond the Fear: Overcome Public Speaking Anxiety in 6 Weeks
courses.bio: Manage anxiety, rewire fear, and speak with confidence — with realistic AI-powered role plays to practise safely.
objectives: Identify the root causes of your public speaking fear and understand how it shows up in your body and thoughts.
Apply practical anxiety-reduction tools to manage nerves before and during a presentation.
Build and practise a confident speaking mindset through step-by-step weekly exercises.
Deliver a short talk/ public speaking event with greater calm, clarity, and control.
Practise real-world speaking moments with AI-powered role plays — master your opening and handle tough questions with confidence.

Acceptance - The Counterintuitive Way To Handle Fear

requirements: No public speaking experience needed — this course is designed for beginners.
A willingness to reflect, practise, and try new techniques.
courses.description:
If your heart races, voice shakes, fear sets in and your mind goes blank at the thought of public speaking (let's be real, the idea of public speaking makes you want to puke) this course is for you.
This isn’t your typical corporate comms course filled with tips about posture and PowerPoint. This is for real people with real fear. People who are smart, capable and sick of anxiety holding them back.
In just 6 weeks, you’ll learn how to work with your fear (not against it), and build confidence in a way that feels genuine, not performative (no power poses!).
And now you’ll also get access to brand-new AI-powered role plays, so you can practise in realistic, high-pressure speaking situations without the real-world risk. You’ll master:
The first 60 seconds of your talk (the moment nerves peak.)
Staying calm and composed when someone throws you an unexpected question mid-flow.
You’ll explore:
What’s really going on when your body floods with nerves
Simple but powerful breathing and calming tools
How to prepare and rehearse in a way that reduces fear
Strategies for managing anxious spirals in the moment
How to build long-term confidence with small, steady steps
Led by a former tech director (turned confidence coach) who overcame intense speaking fear herself, this course is honest, CBT-informed, psychology-backed, and packed with practical tools that actually work, even if you’re shy, introverted, or utterly terrified (or all three).
If you’re tired of fluffy advice or robotic tips that don’t work when you’re panicking inside then you’re in the right place.
target_audience: Anyone who feels anxious, panicked, or physically uncomfortable at the thought of public speaking
Professionals who avoid speaking up in meetings or presentations because of fear
People who want to feel calmer and more confident speaking in front of others, even if the idea terrifies them right now
People who don’t want to “perform”  they just want to speak without fear authentically
Anyone who’s tried tips like “just breathe” or “fake it till you make it” and found they don’t work

The Instant-Series Presents "Instant Confidence"
How to Be Confidence Instantly!
Are you somebody who simply lacks confidence and have no self-esteem, always worrying about what other people think of you, or how you're coming across to others?
Confidence is the power to getting anything and accomplishing everything you want. Without it, you will find yourself in a lonely, dark depressive place that hinders you in life and whatever you do will be much more difficult than it should.
You'll always question and doubt yourself, feel vulnerable as a victim, be uncomfortable around other people, fail to stand up for yourself or take initialize to go after what you want, whether job opportunities or that person you want to talk to...
Making great connections who can help you professionally, real good friends who will support you no matter what, or the love of your life who you want to spend the rest of your life with...all because you are not confident to initiate the conversation, but instead freeze or act weird, having them reject you...causing you not to be outgoing.

courses.description:
Social anxiety often takes root early in life, when unkind, critical, or dismissive communication from others shapes how we see ourselves. Over time, this can erode self-worth and leave us feeling like we’re somehow “behind” socially—as if everyone else got a script we missed.
This course is designed to help you rewrite that script. You’ll start to see yourself more clearly, approach relationships with less fear, and learn practical ways to interact without draining so much energy on worry and over-planning.
I can’t promise to make your social anxiety vanish overnight—but I can give you the tools, insights, and strategies to manage it more effectively.
Drawing from over five years of social anxiety research—and a lifetime of personal experience—I’ve identified the most common challenges people face and created concise, practical lessons to address each one.
Specifically, you’ll learn how to:


Better understand yourself and your unique patterns
Re-examine your fears and uncover what’s truly behind them
Separate fact from myth when it comes to what “good communication” is
Build and refine your social skills


If you’ve been feeling stuck, this is your invitation to start communicating with more confidence, clarity, and self-compassion. Enroll today to begin to feel better about yourself and your skills.

courses.bio: How is self-efficacy?
objectives: You will learn about the distinctive characteristics of people with strong self-efficacy and weak self-efficacy.
You will learn the art of achieving your goals. And understand how important your belief in your own abilities is for completing any task.
You will learn the most effective way of dealing with any sort of failure. It would be like therapy; fear of failure would not impede your steps then.

requirements: No Basic Requirements
courses.description:
Are you unsure of whether you have the desired capabilities to perform a certain task?
Is your lack of confidence in yourself not letting you achieve your goals?


It is a universal problem that people tend to set goals enthusiastically, but when comes the time to take some pragmatic steps toward achieving those goals, they encounter deadlocks. There could be a plethora of reasons behind not achieving the goals that people set for themselves. Such as, sometimes people lack consistency, motivation, or a mindset, but among all of them, the most crucial is when you are uncertain of whether you have the ability to perform a certain task or not, in other words, when you have low self-efficacy.


You might be wondering what self-efficacy is?
What role does it play in boosting your confidence?
How can you develop high self-efficacy?
Can high self-efficacy really transform your life?
Well, these are all questions we will answer in this course. The lessons that our course includes are based on psychology and various scientific case studies. The lessons that we offer in this course will make you feel confident about your abilities and help you achieve your goals. After completing this course, you will have a clearer mind about your abilities.


Among many things, these are some crucial things that you will learn from this course:


You will learn about the distinctive characteristics of people with strong self-efficacy and
weak self-efficacy. By observing their traits, you will have a clear idea of how important
strong self-efficacy is.


You will learn the art of achieving your goals. And understand how important your belief
in your own abilities is for completing any task.


You will learn the most effective way of dealing with failure. It would be like
therapy; fear of failure would not impede your steps then.


You will learn how other people's accomplishments can be a source of your own self-
efficacy.


Another important aspect of this course will be to make you the master of your thoughts
and cable to mold them according to your desires.


Developing a strong sense of self-efficacy is indispensable for becoming the best version of
yourself. Otherwise, any sort of self-development could be a daunting task for you.


Let's Get Started!
target_audience: You should be pliable when it comes to changing your beliefs.
You should be committed.
You should have an urge to become the best version of yourself.

courses.description:
The way you perceive yourself tells you how to think, feel, and behave, which means it controls your destiny more than any other factor.
"Finding" and designing (choosing) yourself is one of the most empowering and exciting thing you'll ever do, but it can take many decades if you lack a precise explanation of what that means and exactly how it happens on the many layers of what makes you "you."
This course is designed after the upcoming book of the same title. It divides your sense of self into 10 different layers, working from the surface down to the core of what makes you "you."
This course is much more than merely descriptive (who you have been up to this point in your life), because you are literally filled with unrealized potential to explore and discover, and because a large potion of who you think you are has merely been a reaction to outside forces.
Parents, teachers, friends, and marketers have all sought to shape your thoughts, feelings and behaviors - even when they had no idea they were doing so. Do you approve of all the directions you've taken? Would you like to make any adjustments or additions now? We like to think you'd be crazy not to, because we have a pretty good idea of how beautiful and exciting and helpful and satisfying these undiscovered, undeveloped parts of you can be.
So join us as we walk you through how to discover your full self and take the paths that lead to your best self and living your best life! You'll never see yourself the same way again!
Video discussions introduce main concepts, and homework filled with questions and other resources help you apply everything to your unique situation and preferences. We'll continue posting additional videos and resources as we see people take the course. Let us know what you'd like to hear more about in the comments!!
target_audience: Anyone who loves to understand the world, beginning with themselves and the ways they interact with it. Anyone who wants to wake up every day feeling excited about living their life. Everyone who wants to live their best life by growing their strengths and reducing weaknesses, and who is willing to invest a small amount of time to explore exciting new ideas about exactly what they're made of on multiple levels.

Self-confidence is an important factor for how far we get in life. Because self-confidence is part of you achieving your goals, reaching your dreams, creating the life you want. When you start building your self-confidence, you take one of the most important steps towards a successful and fulfilled life. In this course you'll learn how to build self-confidence – based on the scientific research in psychology and neuroscience.
You'll learn how to tackle your self-confidence from the four main perspectives: your thoughts, feelings, behavior and social environment.
