Students who complete this course will receive an official life Self-Care Coach CERTIFICATION from Transformation Academy.
THIS COURSE IS PART OF OUR MASTER EMPOWERMENT/SELF-CARE COACH CERTIFICATION (ALONG WITH OUR FOCUS/BREAKTHROUGH COACH, CONFIDENCE COACH, EMPOWERMENT COACH, ABUNDANCE COACH, SELF-DEFENSE COACH AND PEOPLE PLEASER COACH CERTIFICATIONS).

We are top Udemy instructors in the personal development category. Our courses have been taken by over 800,000+ happy students from 200 countries.

This course is a COMPLETE LIFE COACH CERTIFICATION PROGRAM that gives you everything you need to utilize all of the self-care, self-love and boundary setting techniques and tools presented in this course with life coaching clients.


Self-Care = Transformation
Create a daily routine that allows you to live life thriving!


Self-care is the most important component of developing confidence and fulfillment!
Unfortunately, our self-care needs are often overlooked or seen as low-priorities.
When people cross our boundaries and we don’t have the skills to do anything about it, it leaves us feeling helpless.
When we’re around people with toxic energy and we don’t know how to protect ourselves, we feel drained and overwhelmed.
Even with our best intentions to be happy and take care of our wellbeing, obligations to others and not knowing how to put ourselves first can lead to burnout.
Learning self-care isn’t just about the mani's & pedi's. It’s not just about spa days. It’s about your overall wellness, remembering to breathe, eat healthy, drink water, rest, exercise, and do things that bring joy and fulfillment.
This self-care course was designed to offer valuable tools to help you move past blockages and negative thoughts, do what feeds and honors you, set clear boundaries and take your power back.


Tap into the power within and reach your next level in self-care and self-love!


In this course, you will explore key components of self-care. The videos and workbooks will help you better understand why self-care is so important. You will also learn how to help others with their self-care journey! This training will focus on some key areas such as:

This course is brought to you by Transformation Academy and instructors Joeel & Natalie, who are life coach trainers with over 800,000 students at the time of this recording. They are excited to have collaborated with instructor Tasha Ina Church, which is the primary instructor in this Self-Care Life Coaching Certification.
Tasha is an Empowerment Coach in the Hawaiian Islands, offering retreats, private group coaching, and empowerment self-defense trainings to emerging women leaders so they can be their own heroes. Church is one of eleven people globally to possess a credential in Empowerment Self-Defense equivalent to The Bar Exam for attorneys. She has been internationally recognized for her work in empowerment and nationally recognized in the United States. She sits on the board of the National Women’s Martial Arts Federation, focusing on Equity and Inclusion. Recently, Tasha was on the cover of West Maui Magazine and writes articles on self-care, boundary setting, and empowerment. She was in the XLR9HI PreX Fellowship recognized in Forbes Magazine and graduated Summa cum Laude with her masters degree in Business Leadership with an emphasis on Global Systems Change. She has over 24 years of experience, along with training in Psychological First Aid through John Hopkins University.


We are so excited to have her share the key secrets to lasting success so you can help yourself and your clients continue growing along your self-care journey. Are you ready?

requirements: This is a hands on course that is going to require you to think deeply about you, how you feel about you and what, if anything you would like to change
courses.description:
Before we can overcome shyness, we have to figure out why we are shy. There is no easy answer to this question. Some people appear to be born shy and have a hard time coming out of their shell. Other people seem to be more outgoing. In my research into what makes someone shy I found that two things often figure into shyness - birth order as well as a lower self-esteem. It is also important to realize that shyness is not always so apparent. Some people, in an effort to not seem so shy will go off in the opposite direction and appear to be very outgoing when they are struggling, on the inside, to overcome this affliction. I can relate to this as I am one of those types of individuals. Others often find me to be outgoing, but in reality, I get a sick feeling in my stomach when I have to meet new people or exert myself in social situations.


Being shy does not mean that someone has a low self-esteem, but it can be an indication that their self-esteem is a bit more fragile than someone who is not shy and is not, as a result, self-conscious. Through my research, I have found that those who are shy tend to be very sensitive individuals who often make the mistake of thinking that everyone’s attention is focused on them. They are afraid to make a mistake, say something silly or do something that will cause others to notice them. They would rather fade into the background than call attention to themselves.
Many people are aware of the fact that they are shy and avoid being in the limelight as much as possible. Some people who are shy may over compensate for the fact that they feel shy and go overboard in trying to draw attention to themselves. For the most part, shyness is based upon a fear of rejection, most often due to a low self-esteem. It manifests itself differently with every individual. Some people need only have their idea rejected once before they develop a low sense of self-worth and an inferiority complex. Others can take a lot of rejection before it starts to affect them negatively.
Here are some basic questions that you can ask yourself to see if you are shy:


1. When I go to a party where I do not know anyone, I….


A. Cancel. I would rather die than attend a party where I didn’t know anyone else.
B. Try to find a place where I can sit inconspicuously so I do not draw attention to myself.
C. Try to mingle a bit and then call it an early night.
D. Find the life the party and do my best to integrate myself with the guests.


2. In school, if I knew the answer to a question, I would….


A. Not do anything. What if I wasn’t sure?
B. Wait to be called on by the teacher.
C. Raise my hand to answer the question.
D. Make sure the teacher saw that I knew the answer by waving my hand.


3. My ideal job would be…


A. A job where I could be alone in my own cubicle
B. A job where I didn’t have to interact with others on a regular basis.
C. A job where I worked in a team setting.
D. A managerial job where I was in charge of others.


4. If I like someone and want to form a relationship with them, I….


A. Follow them around and wait for them to make the first move
B. Try to put myself in their way so that they notice me
C. Arrange to be at parties and other gatherings where they may be
D. Tell them and let the chips fall where they may


5. During a job interview, I…


A. Answer questions that are asked of me only and feel nervous
B. Try to stick to saying as little as possible about myself
C. Ask questions and answer those questions presented to me
D. Assume that they are the ones I am interviewing, instead of the other way around
How you interpret this data is found in the course.
This course will teach you how to recognize shyness in yourself and how to beat this personality trait with tips and exercises that will help you emerge from your shell to become the real you.  The person you know you can be.
target_audience: Almost 50% of the US population suffers from shyness to one degree or another so this course is for that 40% myself included that has suffered from shyness

objectives: Build critical self-awareness of your own self-doubt and common imposter coping strategies, like perfectionism, hyper-achieving, comparison, and procrastination
Rewire your brain to move to inner confidence, and learn how to leverage new tools like your inner board of directors and reframing negative thought patterns
Learn to get unstuck through taking microsteps, moving before you’re ready and communicating with confidence – all quick fire ways to bust up the saboteur
Practice overcoming imposter syndrome when you fail by getting good at telling on yourself, asking for help and the use of vulnerability, humility

Building Awareness of Your Self-Doubt: Death a Thousand Comparisons: How to Stop Obsessive Patterns of Comparison
Rewiring Your Brain to Move Towards Inne: Cure for Insecurity: Develop Your Inner Board of Directors
Rewire Your Brain: Reframing Negative Thought Patterns

requirements: A desire to improve your inner confidence with quick, actionable tips; experience working in a team environment and managing others is a plus.
courses.description:
In our world today, some of the most accomplished leaders I know secretly admit to feeling like an imposter.
This feeling can show up like a nagging sense of insecurity, or a sneaking suspicion that you’re in the wrong place or role. It can show up like a lack of confidence in your professional life, or an inability to rid yourself of patterns of negative self-talk. Or it can show up just as you stretch into new territory, a vicious inner critic there to keep you from truly owning your power, taking up space and showing up with confidence.
Sound familiar? The good news is this feeling is pervasive and normal – and also ultimately surmountable. Whatever your particular brand of insecurity or self-doubt, I built this user-friendly, engaging course to help you build the skills you need to identify the imposter syndrome when it pops up for you and combat your own self-doubt.
Welcome to your course on Overcoming the Imposter Syndrome and Self-Doubt! In this course, I’ll provide short lectures to help get clear on your particular pattern of self-doubt so that you can build the inner and outer practices to shift and immediately apply these lessons to your work or life. The videos in this course are standalone. That means you don’t have to watch in any particular order, though they build off each other over time. Each lecture is short and focused, so if you’re searching for a specific skill or topic that’s relevant for you, take a look through the tips to find the knowledge you need when you need it.
I created this practical Udemy course for you—filled with my unique insights from coaching leaders at Fortune 500 companies, nonprofits and government agencies around the world for over 10 years. This course is packed with the most practical, real world training that has been requested by my clients again and again, and it’s built specifically to get you acting with more confidence and intentionality today.
This course is built specifically for any professional in any industry at any level who wants to get targeted, quick, practical help to respond to nagging feelings of self-doubt and imposter syndrome in a variety of situations.
Oh and did I mention that we laugh a lot in this course? Failure requires a sense of humor, and if we’re not having fun while we’re practicing, it’s not working.
In this course, we will cover:
Identifying and overcoming the saboteur
How to rewire your brain and reframe negative thought patterns
Taking microsteps to build accountability
When and how to ask for help when you actually need more training
Develop your inner board of directors as a cure for insecurities
Using the power of visualization to fake it ‘till you make it
How to recover after failure: a guided practice
Each section deepens your ability to have more confidence in real-life situations - particularly if you are stepping into bigger, better, new, unfamiliar or challenging professional situations.
Section 1 is all about understanding the imposter syndrome: What it is, how its helpful, and how to spot when it’s happening. Section 2 will help you build the critical self-awareness of your own self-doubt and common imposter coping strategies, like perfectionism, hyper-achieving, comparison, and procrastination. Section 3 will help you rewire your brain to move to inner confidence, helping you lean into tools like your inner board of directors, reframing negative thought patterns, visualizations and self-celebration
And then, Section 4, is all about action, like how to get unstuck through taking microsteps, move before you’re ready and communicate with confidence. Finally in Section 5,  you’ll learn to deal with failure, and how to respond with courage and grace by telling on yourself, asking for help and the use of vulnerability, humility and humor.
So what are you waiting for? Jump to see how even one of these lectures can change your life, giving you a competitive edge to help you advance in your job and personal life. I’m thrilled to help guide you as you expand your skills and overcome imposter syndrome and self-doubt starting today.
target_audience: Individuals at various levels searching for quick tools to help them get better at overcoming self-doubt.
Individuals who experience imposter syndrome and are stepping into bigger, better, new, unfamiliar or challenging professional situations.
Career professionals who are longing to be more confident and manage negative self-talk.
People in any industry who are ready to overcome the barriers to navigating new situations with confidence, ease and presence -- no matter what.

courses.description:
What better gift can we give to children than the skills and support to develop their self-confidence and self-esteem, reducing anxiety and stress, enabling them to live happy and fulfilled lives?


Stephanie O’Malley BA(Psych); MA(EdPsych), is passionate about giving every child at least one mentor in their lives who they can emotionally connect with, which is particularly important in early childhood to prevent mental illnesses later on in life.


As busy parents, teachers, and carers in an overwhelming, technology-filled world, Stephanie’s goal is to equip the key people in children’s lives with the tools, training, and support needed to reconnect with children and to help them understand themselves and their feelings, how to cope with hard situations, and the ability to ask for help when needed.

“The way everything was explained was fantastic, and knowing how small things can have a really big impact on a child’s self-esteem and self-confidence really has been life-changing for our family.”  Marion Lyons, mother of 3, Co. Kerry, Ireland.


This transformative online course empowers you as a parent, carer or educator to develop the skills to build the confidence and self-esteem of children while supporting them to reduce anxiety and manage stress levels.


Designed and facilitated by educational psychologist and Founder of DESTY, Stephanie O’Malley, you will learn a range of simple yet powerful strategies that will empower you to understand and support your child so they can reach their full potential in life.
During this course you will also learn how to build your own confidence and self-esteem so you can be a powerful role model for the children and young people in your life.
We've also included some very practical downloadable worksheets that can be used with children of any age.
Feel that you're too busy? Don't worry, we understand. That's why all of our courses are designed for busy people. Learn in your own time and at your own pace.

courses.description:
Reveal the imaginary challenge sabotaging the confidence and growth of your profession or confuse you where to start.


This course is designed to;


- Uncover your persona to explore opportunities


- Pick your pain point through quizzes


- Bring your niche into reality through assessment


- Reform you strategically


- Inspire your inner soul to ignite your potential


- Groom you exclusively


- Heal you positively


- Transform you to thrive.


Millions worldwide have benefited from ACT (Steven Heys) and DBT (Marsha) in their lives, since their original publications in 1982 (ACT) 1993 (DBT).


Soon the next person may be you as we chose simple techniques and strategies from ACT and DBT reality/choice theory, psychodynamic theory, family theory, feminist theory, and many others, tailoring them to meet the needs of each client.


Many creative and accountable people don’t accomplish what they want in their work-life because they ruin themselves with defensive, restricting or self-adverse thoughts and practices. These sabotaging beliefs and character not only hold us back, but also weaken our image in the eyes of others, hurting our hopes for success.


Mental health and emotional well-being are necessary at every stage in our personal and professional life, from childhood and adolescence through adulthood.


If you have had confused or unpredictable childhoods, it is the norm to pick up unhelpful models of dealing with emotions.


However, the healthy message is, emotions are honestly easy to study and once you know how they work, you can learn how to manage them more effectively!!


Analysis has shown ACT to be highly effective in many areas: such as performance management, job satisfaction, innovation and motivation to increase resilience to foster transformational control behaviours.


I have used ACT and DBT in my practice to help young entrepreneurs, fresh graduates, job seekers, homemakers, employees and many other professionals to uncover their thoughts, healing them completely from chronic illness. Also, it helped their clients to become more flexible, resourceful and responsive, even under the most challenging of circumstances.


I’ve studied and practised mindfulness from the perspective of ACT and DBT to explore human minds deeply. Further, conclude that you can’t be selective in your thoughts by diffusing a few and accepting a few. Also, to change habits, you need to believe in the process and have consistency. You need to be a vigilant observer of all the thoughts that arise in your mind and maintain a distance from them. It’s not easy but it requires consistent practice of many days/ months ultimately it is the way that helps you penetrate the nature of reality.


When you master practising ACT and DBT skills, you start measuring your success, understanding how well your actions line up with your values, vision and mission in life. Besides, it gives a bigger perspective to your goals and let you achieve things on your terms.


Hence, check the previews and enrol for this course to grow your character that will deliver your genius to work productively and presently living.

This course aims to guide you as a woman who has felt broken to a woman who knows her authentic inner feminine power, and stands firmly and confidently in life as her own Goddess.  As ladies we shine in ways that we don't give ourselves credit for.  The social and media world we live in is full of reasons why we are not enough.  The truth is, we are perfect already.
Having come from a challenging relationship, I was made to feel inadequate and lacked confidence in my own abilities in day-to-day living.  It has taken me years to get to a point now where I am more than OK with myself.  In fact today, I love myself thoroughly.
Yoga, Meditation and Chi Kung along with healthy eating and time in nature have all played their part in the cure; however, journaling and trying to find ways to emotionally connect with myself through the practices mentioned is what has helped me most.  I will therefore use strategies and techniques that have helped me to get to where I am now in just 21 days.
So, this course is a 21-day course to recover your life after you have felt broken, or maybe lacked the confidence in you should have in yourself.
I will walk you through each day to finding acceptance and removing judgement of others and yourself.  You will need a journal, as this course involves a lot of writing and reflection.
Every day there will be a yoga practice and dietary advice to help you gain strength from whole, healthy foods.  You will learn to see food as an energy source instead of a crutch.  You will learn meditation techniques to bring you closer to your own inner wisdom.  Each day you will practice your gratitude mantra and you will learn to feel comfortable with yourself.
Having some time in nature and amongst others who feed you positive energy will strengthen your development.
This course aims to be nurturing first of all, building, challenging, bring about an emotional awareness, a sense of gratitude, self-love and self-care.
At the end of the course, you will gain confidence in your self, feel your feminine power shine through in what you do, in the choices you make and in future relationships.  It is about dropping habits we make that attract negative thought patterns, which in turn create negative choices for us.
It is time to shine, be true to yourself and step forward into a new you.  If any of this resonates well with you, then you are meant to do this course.


Hope to see you on the other side! Namaste.


Katrina Zawawi


Please note that there is a 30 Day Money Back guarantee - So if you're not happy within 30 Days, you get a full refund.

requirements: A desire to shift their mindset and put the lessons into practice beyond the video course

courses.description:
Do you frequently read self-development books yet still feel that something is not quite clicking with you? Even if the books and courses you have taken have resonated with you at the time, you are still not moving forward with your ambitions and dreams.  Well, this course was created with you in mind.
You see, over the years, I too have read countless new age and personal development books, but it wasn't until I became certified as a Clinical Hypnotherapist using Cognitive Behavioural Therapy (CBT) techniques and qualifying as a Stress Management, & Resilience Mindset Coach that the lightbulbs finally went on.
The secret to success in both your personal and professional life is mindset.....mindset.......mindset.
What exactly does "self-sabotage" mean? Well....... its repeated thoughts, behaviours and attitudes that prevent us from achieving our goals, aspirations, and wishes.
It is a totally normal human trait that we all periodically exhibit self-sabotage without fully being aware of it.
Self-sabotage originates from the restrictive thoughts that we hold inside our minds, those limiting negative beliefs prevent us from growing. It's a significant problem that often goes undetected until we experience a vicious cycle of negative thinking that leads to stress and anxiety.
Self-sabotage can be motivated by emotions of fear or worthlessness and has a detrimental effect on our development, interpersonal connections, and overall health and wellbeing.

A person may engage in self-destructive actions for a variety of reasons. It may be challenging for you to pinpoint the precise reason why you struggle with self-destructive behaviours, but a good place to start is by looking at the thoughts and actions  that prevent you from achieving your goals in life.


The inner critic or troublemaker; the name I give to the incessant mind talk is mostly responsible for self-sabotage, however, replacing habitual, self-critical thoughts with more nurturing and supportive ones is one of the key steps in eliminating self-sabotage.


In order to assist you to move closer to your goals, this course guides you through a number of action steps to help you stop self-sabotaging and to break free from the constraints of your self-berating beliefs and behaviours.


Once you master the tools and techniques your mind is free to focus on your hopes, dreams and desires.
target_audience: Anyone who want to Banish Self Sabotage and Limiting Beliefs

requirements: No requirements
courses.description:
Did you know that you could easily help your child to be more confident?
My name is Alain Wolf. When I was a child, I stuttered, I had no friends, I suffered from social anxiety (was even hospitalized for it). As you can imagine I had no confidence.
Fast track to today: I am now travelling around the world teaching adults and children how to be more confident.
How did I go from a shy kid with no confidence to speaking in front of large audiences worldwide? By using simple but powerful confidence building techniques.
I created this short and practical course for parents who want to coach their children to have more confidence. In this course, you'll learn 7 ways to build your child's confidence: questions to ask, games to play, child hacks and so on.
As you can see it's a short course. I could have spent 10 hours talking about confidence for children but I want to give you 7 tools that will give you amazing results in improving your child's confidence.
I created this course for my younger self. This is the course I wish my parents had.
All the advice and games can be adapted to any age!
What You’ll Learn:
Harnessing the Power of Words: Words can either build up or break down a child's self-worth. Discover the hidden impact of everyday language on your child's confidence. Learn to spot and replace disempowering phrases like “I am a failure” with empowering self-talk that rewires their inner dialogue for success.
Turning Negative Labels into Growth Opportunities: When kids say “I am not good enough” or “I always mess up,” they’re locking themselves into limiting beliefs. Learn how to break this cycle by shifting their focus from fixed identities to growth-oriented thinking, empowering them to see challenges as opportunities for growth.
Transforming 'Always' and 'Never' Statements: “Nobody likes me.” “I always fail.” Kids often use these sweeping statements, and they can crush their confidence. Learn simple, effective techniques to challenge these beliefs, and help your child replace negativity with a more balanced, empowering perspective.
Small Wins, Big Confidence: Confidence doesn’t come from leaps—it’s built step by step. Discover how to guide your child in taking manageable actions toward their goals, from making new friends to trying new skills. Learn how to turn each small success into a confidence-building moment that they’ll carry with them.
Superpower Confidence Game: Tap into your child’s imagination with the “What Would Your Hero Say?” game. Use their favorite superheroes or role models to inspire self-belief and resilience during tough moments. Watch as they transform into their own version of a confident, fearless leader.
Mastering Internal Strength: Help your child shift their focus from seeking approval to embracing their true self. Equip them with tools to cultivate inner strength and self-assurance, so they can thrive regardless of external pressures or setbacks.
Body Language of a Winner: Confidence isn’t just what you say—it’s how you carry yourself. Teach your child the body language of confidence, from power poses to maintaining eye contact, and watch how these simple changes transform their interactions and self-perception.
Positive Mindset Training: Cultivate a habit of looking for the good, even in challenging situations. Through engaging games and daily reflections, help your child see the world through a lens of possibilities instead of limitations, turning every setback into a stepping stone.
Why This Course is a Game-Changer:
You’ll walk away with actionable techniques that fit into your daily routines, making confidence-building a natural part of your family life. These are strategies that work in the real world—whether your child is dealing with shyness, negative self-talk, or struggles with making friends. By the end of this course, you’ll be able to help your child face their fears, embrace challenges, and believe deeply in their own potential.
This is more than a course—it’s a life-changing toolkit to raise a confident, resilient, and empowered child. Let’s start building a foundation of self-belief that will carry your child through every stage of life!
target_audience: This course is for parents or anyone who would like to help children from all ages become more confident.

courses.description:
The Native Strength path is a centuries-old philosophy that uses medicine wheels to make sense of our world. Native American religion and culture were illegal in the United States until 1978. These teachings were part of that culture. You'll be introduced to the inner personas and the fear-feeders along with ways to help differentiate between the two.  When we learn how to listen to our inner elders and children more, the fear-feeders can't be heard. Our apprehension often holds us back from fulfilling our dreams. It's easy to imagine all of the things that can go wrong and talk ourselves out of just about anything. Once we recognize these voices of fear, they begin to develop sly ways of sneaking their toxic messages into our inner dialogue. It takes some practice to weed them out at this point and that's what this course can do for you.  We will examine the medicine wheel of fear-feeder voices that shows us the manipulative and creative ways they try to stop us from finding success and happiness. This course will help you to hear the voices of your inner elders clearer, filling you full of self-esteem and the inspiration you need to find success.

courses.description:
Exploring Multiple Perspectives Through Immersive Experiences


Incorporating immersive learning experiences into question and answer studies and testing not only gives students with a thorough understanding of historical and cultural backgrounds, but also allows them to explore multiple views. Virtual reality environments can immerse students in complicated scenarios and narratives, prompting them to examine different points of view and sympathize with various experiences and obstacles.


Students can build critical thinking abilities and a sophisticated awareness of societal issues by engaging with immersive content that exposes opposing viewpoints or ethical concerns. Educators can help students analyze and evaluate multiple points of view in immersive environments, developing empathy and informed decision-making skills for real-world situations.


Furthermore, the dynamic nature of immersive experiences enables the investigation of multiple narratives as well as the interconnection of global events, helping students to recognize the interconnectedness of history, culture, and social dynamics. This holistic approach allows pupils to have a more broad and inclusive understanding of their surroundings.


Fostering Empathetic Engagement with Virtual Experiential Learning


Immersive learning experiences allow students to engage empathetically with varied experiences and historical situations. Simulated environments can transport students to critical events in history or new cultural situations, allowing them to experience these surroundings on a personal and emotional level.


Educators can create immersive learning scenarios that encourage empathetic involvement by asking students to take on the viewpoints of people from various cultural backgrounds or historical eras. This experiential technique allows students to sympathize with others' living experiences, developing a strong sense of empathy and understanding across cultural and temporal barriers.


Empathetic interaction in virtual settings can help students gain a heightened understanding of social injustices, historical conflicts, and the richness of different cultural heritage, so contributing to their overall growth as empathetic and socially conscious individuals.


To summarize, incorporating immersive learning experiences into question and answer studies and testing provides a transforming chance to foster multiple perspectives and compassionate participation among students. By immersing children in multiple narratives and historical contexts, educators can build empathic, critically engaged citizens while also cultivating a profound awareness of global issues.


Promoting Ethical Decision-Making with Immersive Experiences.


Immersive learning, in addition to examining many views, can be an effective technique for developing ethical decision-making abilities. By immersing students in virtual simulations of ethical quandaries, instructors may guide them through complicated decision-making processes and encourage careful contemplation on the repercussions of their choices.


These immersive scenarios can encourage students to think about the influence of their decisions on diverse stakeholders, resulting in a better knowledge of the ethical consequences of their actions. This technique not only improves students' critical thinking skills, but it also fosters a sense of responsibility and ethical awareness, which are important in both personal and professional settings.


Furthermore, by working on ethical decision-making issues in virtual environments, students gain the ability to traverse real-world ethical complications with better empathy, integrity, and moral reasoning. This comprehensive approach to ethical education provides students with the skills and ethical competence required to positively contribute to their communities and society as a whole.


Promoting Mindful Reflection and Well-Being


It is critical that educators incorporate mindful reflection and well-being considerations into the design of immersive learning experiences. While immersive technologies provide intense and engaging educational experiences, it is critical that students' mental and emotional well-being be prioritized.


Educators can implement activities that encourage pupils to participate in mindful contemplation and self-awareness, thereby improving mental health and emotional balance. Furthermore, fostering a supportive environment in which students may openly discuss their experiences with immersive technology and its impact on their well-being is critical.


By encouraging thoughtful reflection and well-being, educators can assist students in developing a healthy relationship with technology and navigating the digital realm with a sense of balance, self-awareness, and mindfulness.


As educators continue to capitalize on the power of immersive learning experiences, incorporating ethical decision-making, mindful reflection, and well-being considerations ensures that students not only gain a deeper understanding of diverse cultures and perspectives, but also develop the skills and awareness required to navigate the complexities of the modern world with empathy, integrity, and balance.
target_audience: These tests are suitable for everyone who is interested in this issue.

courses.description:
What You Can Expect To Learn
This is the seventh course (there are totally 7) from the "6 Keys to ULTIMATE Confidence, Body, and Self-Esteem" program, which will be a blueprint to boosting:
Emotional Confidence-learn how to master your emotions, and successfully manage your emotions, so that you will master your negative emotions, and manage anger and fear successfully; become more in control, and enjoy peaceful confidence within you, but also become successful in managing emotions within your relationships, too.
Controlling our emotions is an essential feature of being human, and doing so while processing stress is an ability that can benefit our relationships with others and with ourselves. Take your first step on the road to enhanced emotional health by taking this course. We explore the impact of emotional health on your mental and physical well-being. We then show you how to identify your feelings and their origin to handle them in a constructive way to improve your emotional management by staying optimistic, kind and friendly. We then go through psychologist Paul Ekman’s ‘six basic emotions’ and establish the difference between ‘emotions’ and ‘moods’.
The course then delves into the concepts of ‘self-hatred’ and ‘self-love’. We illustrate how feelings of self-hatred and unworthiness may stem from early childhood trauma and show you how to silence your inner critic when it’s being unhelpful. We then investigate self-care strategies like erecting sensible boundaries, acting in character and moving past mental hindrances from the past. You can use these measures to find self-acceptance and build up your self-esteem to unlock the door to a healthy, loving relationship with yourself.
We discuss the art of self-compassion and lay out the notable differences between ‘empathy’ and ‘sympathy’, which enables you to empathize with yourself by reframing your thoughts and internal conversations to make them more constructive. The course provides several habits that can help you cultivate self-compassion, including being kind to yourself, giving yourself time to rest, practising affirmation, not focusing on the negatives and adopting self-care. This course offers an opportunity to learn from an experienced self-confidence coach how to soothe yourself, nourish your body and mind and attain emotional confidence. Enrol today to acquire practical daily habits that can banish negativity and similar unhealthy mental habits.

courses.description:
Have you ever walked away from a conversation thinking you should have asked for more, spoken with more confidence, or handled the situation differently? Whether you're negotiating a salary, discussing terms with a client, closing a sale, managing a team, or navigating everyday decisions, strong negotiation skills can dramatically improve your outcomes and your confidence.
This course is designed to transform the way you communicate and help you become a more effective, strategic, and persuasive negotiator. You’ll learn a wide range of professional techniques used by top negotiators in business, law, politics, and high-stakes dealmaking. Each concept is broken down into simple, practical lessons, making it easy for you to apply what you learn in real-life situations.
You will start by understanding the psychology of negotiation—what drives people to say yes, how decisions are influenced, and why preparation is the most powerful part of any negotiation. From there, we’ll dive into specific tactics such as anchoring, framing, mirroring, and using silence effectively. You’ll also learn how to establish your Best Alternative to a Negotiated Agreement (BATNA), which is a cornerstone of confident negotiation.
Throughout the course, we will explore how to stay calm under pressure, how to respond when someone is being aggressive or unreasonable, and how to find common ground even in difficult conversations. You will also discover how to build rapport quickly, how to ask the right questions, and how to persuade without sounding pushy.
In addition to strategy and technique, this course will help you become more aware of body language, tone, and other nonverbal cues. You’ll learn how to read the room, pick up on hidden signals, and recognize when someone is bluffing or being dishonest.
This course is not just theory. It’s packed with real-world examples, practice exercises, and scenarios that you can relate to—whether you're negotiating a raise, closing a deal, buying a car, or simply trying to reach an agreement with a partner or colleague.
By the end of the course, you will be equipped with the tools, confidence, and mindset needed to approach any negotiation with a clear plan, a calm presence, and a high chance of success.
This course is ideal for professionals, entrepreneurs, freelancers, salespeople, managers, job seekers, and anyone who wants to become more persuasive and effective in their personal or professional life.
No prior experience is required—just a willingness to learn, reflect, and practice. If you’re ready to stop settling and start negotiating with purpose, this course is for you.
Enroll today and start developing one of the most valuable skills in business and life.

courses.description:
How to establish personal boundaries at work while strengthening relationships with colleagues and boss?


You might say, “That’s not possible?”


As a business and career coach, I often encounter the same problem with my clients. In 8 out of 10 cases when it comes to personal boundaries, people choose the strategy: “Raise the shields and defend!” They act sharply, directly, and sometimes even aggressively, ignoring the feelings of those around them. The result? Instead of established boundaries, there are conflicts and damaged relationships.
Sound familiar?
At one time, I also struggled to set boundaries. I didn’t know how to say no to work, friends, and family. When I finally became exhausted and was on the verge of burnout from taking on too much, I started saying no too harshly, hurting and angering others. Then I also suffered from feelings of guilt.


Back then, I didn’t know there was another way. But nearly 7 years have passed since then. My education in coaching, 6+ years of coaching practice, the creation of my educational programs, and studying tons of information on this topic have helped me understand why many people approach boundary setting ineffectively.


But there is another way.
My methodology: a simple principle
Gentleness + Clarity and Persistence + Empathy + Communication = Strengthening Relationships . This formula is the foundation of my course.


Personal boundaries are not just about knowing how to say “no.”
They are about:
- Self-esteem and self-acceptance,
- Understanding and managing your emotions,
- Working with anxiety that destroys us from within,
- Seeing and respecting others' personal boundaries.
And most importantly, boundaries are about self-care.


What awaits you in the course?
The course consists of three modules that will help you establish healthy personal boundaries at work (and beyond).


Module 1: The Basics of Personal Boundaries
In this module, you will explore the fundamentals of personal boundaries, their importance, and how they impact your daily life. You will learn to recognize signs of boundary violations and develop strategies to address them.
Lessons:
What are Personal Boundaries and Why Are They So Important?
Emotions and Personal Boundaries: What's the Connection
How to Understand Your Emotions and Manage Them
Why Do I Try to Please Others: How to Break the Cycle
The Dangers of Tolerance
Rescuer Syndrome: What Is It and How to Stop It
How to Really Take Care of Yourself
The Whole Truth About Self-Love
Result:
By the end of this module, you will understand the reasons behind your struggles with boundaries, learn to recognize discomfort as a sign of boundary violation, and be able to change the situation.


Module 2: Personal Boundaries - Your Own and Others'
This module delves into the complexities of personal boundaries in various contexts, including work and personal relationships. You will learn how to navigate challenging situations and respect others' boundaries.
Lessons:
Boundaries: Why Are They Such a Problem?
Self-Evaluation from a Scientific Perspective
Self-Acceptance
How to Deal with Anxiety That Makes You Take On Too Much
No, You're Not Wrong. Or What Is Gaslighting at Work?
How to Survive in a Toxic Company
About Bad People, Interests, and Steve's Story
The Power of Healthy Aggression
Defining and Building Personal Boundaries at Work: Techniques and Exercises
How to Learn to See and Respect Others' Boundaries
What to Do If a Colleague Annoys You — Practical Tips
Outcome:
By completing this module, you will understand your desires and limitations in communication with colleagues and loved ones, learn to express them correctly, and respect others' boundaries.


Module 3: The Art of Saying "No"
Master the skill of saying "no" without feeling guilty or ruining relationships. Explore effective methods of declining requests in various contexts.
Lessons:
How to Say "No" Without Feeling Guilty: Refusal Techniques That Strengthen Relationships
How to Say "No" to Your Boss (When Simply Saying "No" Isn't Possible)
How to Correctly Decline Clients
Outcome:
After this module, you will be able to decline things that make you unhappy or exhausted without damaging your relationships with others — on the contrary, you will strengthen them.


After the Course, You Will Be Able To:
Understand your desires and limitations;
Say "no" without feeling guilty;
Respect others' boundaries;
Manage your emotions;
Establish healthy boundaries at work (and in life);
Separate work from personal life;
Prevent burnout.


Course Format
The course includes:
Engaging video lectures;
A workbook.
The workbook will be your guide to the world of healthy boundaries — part of it you will write yourself! We have included the best techniques from psychology and coaching on setting personal boundaries.


Does this look like what you need right now?
Join us! Take a step towards building the life you want for yourself.

courses.description:
Do you often catch yourself thinking, “I’m not good enough,” “I always mess things up,” or “I’ll never get this right”? These are examples of negative self-talk — internal messages that chip away at your confidence, peace of mind, and sense of self-worth.
In this transformative course, Overcoming Negative Self-Talk, you'll learn how to quiet your inner critic and create a more compassionate, empowering inner voice. You’ll gain a deeper understanding of your inner dialogue and learn how to:

Whether you’re struggling with self-doubt, perfectionism, or inner criticism rooted in past experiences, this course offers clarity and hope. You’ll learn to stop believing the lies your inner critic tells you — and start building a kinder, stronger inner voice that supports your growth and purpose.
No prior experience is required. This course is for anyone ready to step into greater self-trust, emotional healing, and personal empowerment.
If you’re ready to shift your mindset and rewrite your inner narrative, this course is the perfect place to begin.

courses.description:
Want to uplevel your business? How about your life in general?
If so, my friend, then I have something for you. It’s called 5 Steps to Solid Self-Worth.
If thinking about asking for money is putting you in a flap - or if it's flat out making you feel a little bit sick, then I got you, Boo, this will help.
And if asking for help in general (or for anything at all) is something that makes you squirm, then by the end of this mini-course, you'll know why - and what to DO about it.
This is a mini-course that helps business owners (like you) to learn how to receive MORE, without DOING more.
So, you’ve been in business a while, right?

You’ve done the things, you’ve played by the rules, you’ve strategised, you’ve mindsetted, you’ve run things up the flagpole and played buzzword bingo with your coach until the cows have come home.
But still, there’s a niggle that it’s not the business stuff that’s holding you back from making money.
You’re right, you know.
That niggle is right.
The business stuff is the way that you receive the money, but the money only comes if you think you deserve it.
Hmmmm
Because let’s face it, entrepreneurs who really make a lot of money are few and far between.
But do you know what they all have in common?
They believe that they SHOULD be making that money.
They don’t listen to the grumblings of their self-doubt.
They don’t waste time bolstering their egos by working harder and longer than everyone else. And if that’s what they’re doing, then it’s because they want to, not because they think they must.
They succeed because they feel worthy.
They know they deserve it.
There is not the slightest doubt in their mind that what they do will succeed.
Because they desire it to be so.
What would it be like to have that kind of self-belief?
What would it be like to make money out of something you find fascinating, and exciting, and (dare I say) easy?
Like for example making a living by helping people become the most Magnificent versions of themselves by teaching them how to balance their chakras, access Ancient Egyptian energy and employ Spiritual Alchemy?
That’s madness, surely?
(Let’s face it, what I do is next-level weird.)
Because if it’s not madness to believe that’s possible, (and it’s not, because I do make my living that way) then it means that whatever you want to do is possible too.
Just so long as you believed that you’re worthy of success.
Or worthy of anything.
This, my friend is a lesson I learned the hard way. 15 years of slog doing something I didn’t like, and then I replaced that income and surpassed it during one summer of self-exploration and energy clearing.
I simply accepted that I deserve what I want.

I went through the process that made that acceptance not only easy, but logical.
The next step is very much up to you.
If you think that you’re ready to accept that you were BORN worthy, then this journey will help you access that reality.
And then it’ll show you how starting to believe that you can have what you want, when you want, how you want… will change your life for the better.
target_audience: Best for business owners who struggle to price their products or services sustainably

requirements: No requirements
courses.description: In this course, I'll explain to you the Internal Family Systems Therapy created by Richard Schwartz. It's a psychotherapeutic modality that assumes that we all have "Parts". Parts are explained as emotions and behavioral mechanisms that we use on a regular basis. They are usually causing dysfunctional patterns of behaviors that we want to change. With the help of this modality, you can help your clients, patients, and yourself to recognize where those patterns came from and what you need to do to change them to healthy mechanisms. It's a type of inner child work that can be compared to Schema Therapy in some ways. You use structured questions that you ask your Parts to be able to get to know them, appreciate them for their good intentions and ultimately take over for them and create new functional behavioral patterns. It's an amazing therapy that you can practice on yourself and use in daily life to create good habits, and appropriate boundaries,  promote healthy self-esteem, and practice self-compassion. Your Parts think they need to keep working for you, but with Internal Family Systems Therapy you can make them realize that they don't have to be active anymore because you are the "Functional Adult" now taking over for them. I'll provide you with my personal take on this therapy and with some advice when it comes to the use of this modality. It's the main modality that I use with clients, even though I have studied multiple common therapies like Cognitive Behavioural Therapy, Schema Therapy, Dialectical Behavioural Therapy, and Art Therapy. Internal Family Systems Therapy is by far the most successful for treating my clients and to use on myself to deal with emotions and difficult situations. In this expanded version of my previous course, I also talk about spirituality and working with transgenerational Parts and Past Life Parts. This approach is already very spiritual but I wanted to expand on it to give you more avenues to explore by yourself or with your clients.
target_audience: For people looking for ways to self-regulate and therapists who want to find out more about Internal Family Systems Therapy

This course represents the third and final stage — the return home. It is the moment when the hero, who symbolically represents each of us, has completed their journey and now possesses the qualities necessary to govern their own life.


Why choose my course?
I have been accredited by the prestigious IAOTH, the International Association of Therapists, ensuring you a globally recognized certificate.


Throughout this journey, you will encounter the 12 fundamental archetypes theorized by Carl Jung — true inner forces that live in our unconscious and influence our thoughts, emotions, and behaviors.
They are universal, ancient symbols that speak a deep language older than words; they are powerful energies that live within us.
But archetypes are not just psychological concepts — they are soul maps. Understanding them is like finding an inner compass that guides us through moments of uncertainty.

Understand yourself, others, and the world around you

Take control of your life and lead it with responsibility, by awakening the strong and stable presence of the Ruler

Each archetype you encounter will be like a key, opening doors within you that are just waiting to be unlocked.

This course comes partnered with a full 30 day money back guarantee.
courses.description:
Most people don't realise, that when our main goal in life is to be approved of or accepted by others, we can unknowingly end up sacrificing our dignity, integrity and self-esteem in the process. When people behave like this, it's not uncommon to lose the trust, respect and admiration of others.
One of the main concerns that we have as human beings, is whether other people will like us, accept us, respect us and fundamentally appreciate us. So, the BIG question is, how might your life improve once you are no longer plagued by these insecurity issues?
Developing strong social confidence in life requires that we stop trying to be someone that we're not, and start being true to who we actually are - which is something that not everyone is taught about from family or at school. The good news, is that worrying about what other people think of you doesn’t ever have to be a problem again.
By the end of this course, you will be able to;
Transform the effectiveness of your communications with other people.
Say 'No' to What you Want to Say 'No' to - With Genuine Confidence.
Say 'Yes' to What you Want to Say 'Yes' to - With Genuine Confidence.
Manage your thoughts, emotions and develop far greater self-control.
Build authentic social confidence that also increases your self esteem.
Live free from worrying about what other people might think of you.
Communicate with more openness, honesty, sincerity and authenticity.
Build healthier relationships that are free from dependancy or co-dependancy.
Just be yourself with genuine confidence in ALL social situations.
And much, much more...


A wise man once said, 'When people won't accept themselves, how can they be accepted by anyone else?' So throughout this eye-opening course, we'll explore a range of crucial core truths, that if you build into your life and apply, will set you free from ever worrying about what other people think of you again.
While you can’t control what other people think of you, you can control what you think of yourself and how you respond towards those who judge you unfairly. One of the main regrets that people have, is that they spend more time 'trying' to keep people happy, than what they do just being themselves.
'Self Esteem Secrets: Why It's OK Not to be Liked By Everyone' will take you on an eye-opening, step-by-step journey towards better understanding yourself from the inside-out and accepting yourself from the outside-in. Upon completion, you'll understand with absolute certainty, why it's totally OK not to be liked by everyone.
This course comes with a Full 30 Day Money Back Guarantee, and if you're less than 100% satisfied, you can get a full refund within 30 days of your initial purchase.

courses.description:
Have you noticed that the "old" way of thinking about and writing poetry has become more fluid?
The old definitions went something like this:
What is poetry?
Poetry is language that is written following specific patterns, rhythms, structures, and/or rhymes to express ideas and emotions. Poetry is usually used to express deep, dramatic, exaggerated, and intense feelings, emotions, or ideas.
What is a simple definition of a poem?
A poem is a piece of writing that uses imaginative words to share ideas, emotions or a story with the reader. A person who writes a poem is called a poet. Many poems have words or phrases that sound good together when they are read aloud.
This course is going to explore all the ways in which the structured, sometimes rigid, image that may be in your subconscious limiting the way you define poetry can be dismantled and replaced with a definition that invites you to:
Have fun
Experience Joy
Manifest Healing
Open you to Forgiveness
Increase self love
I will introduce you to eight styles of poetry and invite you to write poems in these style.
I will give you tips and tools on how to increase your confidence for writing poems and I will share my poems written in those styles.
I will introduce to poets who write in these styles and introduce you to artists that incorporate poetry in their artwork.
I will introduce you to several poets who create love poems as a Spiritual practice
I will share ways for you to share your work online and create submissions for publication.
You can expect to have 8-10 original poems written by the end of this class.
Let’s get started!
target_audience: Beginners to writing poetry, writing as a spiritual practice, learning a new writing genre
Writers wanting to brush up on their poetry writing skills
Students wanting to start a writing practice using poetry

Build Unshakable Confidence and Transform Your Life
Do you often hold back from speaking your mind, hesitate when making decisions, or feel like self-doubt is holding you back? You’re not alone—many people struggle with confidence, but the good news is that it’s a skill you can develop. This course is designed for anyone who wants to break free from insecurity, gain unwavering self-belief, and take control of their life. Whether you struggle with low motivation, fear of judgment, or simply want to step into a stronger, more confident version of yourself, this program will give you the tools to make it happen.
Confidence isn’t about being perfect—it’s about trusting yourself, even when things feel uncertain. Through this course, you’ll uncover the deep-rooted reasons behind your self-doubt and learn how to overcome them. You’ll explore the same mindset shifts and practical techniques used by successful leaders, high achievers, and influential figures who’ve mastered the art of self-assurance.
This isn’t just theory—you’ll get actionable strategies to build confidence in real-life situations, from expressing your opinions with conviction to making bold decisions without second-guessing yourself. Imagine walking into any room feeling self-assured, pursuing your goals without fear, and finally believing in your ability to succeed. That’s the power of true confidence, and it’s within your reach.
If you’re ready to stop letting doubt dictate your life and start living with courage, clarity, and conviction, this course is your roadmap. The journey to unshakable confidence begins now—are you ready to take the first step?

objectives: Use assertiveness techniques to deal with criticism in personal and professional communication contexts.
Know how to prepare your mind to assertively receive criticism.

Discriminate between passive, aggressive and assertive reactions to criticism.
Use Assertiveness Techniques to deliver constructive criticism in personal and professional communication contexts.
Deliver helpful positive feedback.
Overcome main blockers in helpful feedback delivery.
Know how to prepare your mind to assertively deliver criticism.
Plan and formulate constructive critical messages.
Analyze the critical messages from an assertive perspective.

Delivering Constructive Criticism: The A: What holds us back from giving Helpful Positive Feedback
How to Give Helpful Positive Feedback
Stage I - The Attitude Toward Constructive Criticism Delivery
Stage II - Planning and Formulating the Critical Message
Stage III - Analyzing the Critical Message

requirements: A mind that welcomes change.
courses.description:
This 2-course bundle includes the following classes:
Dealing With Criticism: The Assertive Way
Delivering Constructive Criticism: The Assertive Way

DEALING WITH CRITICISM: THE ASSERTIVE WAY
Communication Skills and Assertiveness Strategy. Emotional Intelligence. Social Skills. Self-confidence and Self-esteem.

Learn how to transform criticism into opportunity and protect your self-confidence and self-esteem levels.


Manage Criticism Effectively through this Assertive Communication Strategy.
Learn how to think about criticism in a way that protects your self-esteem and confidence levels and that allows you to regulate your emotional responses better
Learn how to analyze critical messages and discover their growth potential
Silence the critical noise and focus on the goals that truly matter to you
Respond to criticism efficiently and enjoy healthier relationships


Unlock the mindset that allows you to live a more authentic, independent and satisfying life.
Largely accepted as the most efficient mindset and communication style, Assertiveness provides the best guidelines we know for dealing with most personal and professional contexts. Management of criticism makes no exception.
The 3-Stage Assertive Strategy exclusively presented in this course addresses the entire process, from thoughts to emotions to behaviors, and aims at providing a framework in which the individual thrives and transforms negative feedback into a powerful self-development tool.


Content and Overview
This course is suitable for anyone who would like to learn how to efficiently deal with Criticism, protect their self-confidence and self-esteem levels and discover the growth potential hidden in negative feedback.
Drawing on the multi-dimensional character of Assertiveness, the course addresses the activation of the assertive traits on three main levels: cognitive, emotional and behavioral, thus creating an extended framework for understanding, analyzing and responding to criticism.
The course is divided in two parts: An introductory, theoretical segment, in which we will take a close look at what criticism is, what personal and social roles does it hold in our lives, the forms in which it gets delivered to us and what efficient and inefficient reactions to criticism look like. The second part is a more practical one and it is where you will discover, step-by-step, The Assertive Strategy For Dealing With Criticism.
The Assertive Strategy For Dealing With Criticism includes three Stages -
The Attitude toward Criticism, Analyzing The Critical Message and Responding to Criticism, each of them comprising more steps to help create and activate the cognitive, emotional or behavioral traits that generate the most efficient responses to negative feedback.
Three specific Assertive Communication Techniques for dealing with justified and unjustified criticism are provided at the end of the course.


Then you will be ready to start implementing the Assertive Strategy, focus on the meaningful, silence the useless critical noise and activate your resources to create the life you want.


DELIVERING CONSTRUCTIVE CRITICISM: THE ASSERTIVE WAY
Communication Skills and Assertiveness Strategy. Interpersonal Feedback. Social Skills and Emotional Intelligence.


Learn how to make your critical opinions count in the social environment.
Deliver Criticism Effectively through this Assertive Communication Strategy.


Learn to deliver feedback that matters and that boosts self-esteem, confidence and social trust levels.
Learn how to think about criticism and criticism delivery in a way that takes both your rights and the rights of others into account.
Communicate your helpful opinions openly and enjoy more authentic and healthier relationships.


Unlock the mindset and communication skills that allow you to create personal and social environments that facilitate individual and social growth.


Largely accepted as the most efficient mindset and communication style, Assertiveness provides the best guidelines we know for dealing with most personal and professional contexts. Delivery of criticism makes no exception.
The 4-Stage Assertive Strategy exclusively presented in this course addresses the entire process of Constructive Criticism Delivery, from thoughts to emotions to behaviors, and aims at providing a framework in which the individual actively and responsibly changes the inner and external environment for the better, through carefully crafted disclosure of opinion.


Content and Overview


This course is suitable for anyone who would like to learn how to efficiently deliver meaningful Criticism and transform negative feedback into a powerful social and self-development tool.
Drawing on the multi-dimensional character of Assertiveness, the course addresses the activation of the assertive traits on three main levels: cognitive, emotional and behavioral, thus creating an extended framework for understanding, analyzing and delivering both positive and negative feedback.
The course is divided in two parts: An introductory, theoretical segment, in which we will take a close look at feedback delivery in the assertive context, what Criticism is and isn’t and the way in which all of these elements influence constructive criticism delivery. The second part is a more practical one and it is where you will discover, step-by-step, The Assertive Strategy For Delivering Constructive Criticism.


The Assertive Strategy For Constructive Criticism Delivery includes four Stages -
The Attitude toward Criticism Delivery, Planning and Formulating the Critical Message, The Analysis of the Critical Message and the Delivery and Follow-Up processes, each of them comprising more steps to help create and activate the cognitive, emotional or behavioral traits that generate the most efficient communication techniques to convey helpful critical messages.


Then you will be ready to start implementing the Assertive Strategy, make positive changes in the world around you and motivate both yourself and others to achieve the desired personal and professional goals and build the life you want.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn how to handle Criticism in a way that does not erode Self-confidence and Self-esteem.

courses.description:
Unshakable Confidence: The Power of the Psychopathic Mindset
When most people hear the word "psychopath," they think of criminals and manipulators.
But that’s only half the story.
What about the highly successful individuals who share psychopathic traits—yet never break the law, rarely harm others, and thrive in leadership, business, medicine, and politics?
These individuals operate with a level of confidence, decisiveness, and resilience that most people can only dream of.
What if you could harness their strengths—without losing your empathy, integrity, or humanity?
What You’ll Learn in This Course:
How high-functioning psychopaths think and behave differently from the average person
How to eliminate self-doubt and make decisions with absolute confidence
The secrets to charm, charisma, and unshakable social presence
How to stay cool under pressure, no matter the stakes
The power of ruthlessness in a healthy way—ensuring no one takes advantage of you
How to stop caring about others’ opinions and break free from people-pleasing
How to adopt these traits without becoming harmful, selfish, or narcissistic
Who Is This Course For?
Neurodivergent individuals who want to navigate the social world more effectively
People pleasers and "Nice Guys" who want to develop confidence and assertiveness
Managers and leaders who need to command respect and influence their teams
Shy and anxious individuals who want to experience what it feels like to be bold and decisive
Parents who want to role-model unshakable confidence for their children
Why This Course is Different
Most confidence-building courses teach surface-level tactics. This course goes deeper, tapping into the psychology of the most naturally confident people on the planet.
I’ve spent years working with psychopathic personalities—individuals who move through life without fear, self-doubt, or hesitation. Through this experience, I’ve identified the core mindsets and behaviors that make them so effective—and I’ll show you how to apply them ethically in your own life.
I personally score highly in psychopathic traits (as part of my neurodivergence). Once I stopped suppressing these strengths and started using them, I built a thriving business, created a strong relationship and family, and completely freed myself from caring about what others think.


Your Confidence Breakthrough Starts Now—At No Risk
This course comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you have nothing to lose—except your self-doubt.
Are you ready to develop the confidence of the world’s most successful people?
Enroll now and start mastering psychopathic self-confidence—without losing your soul.


Meet Your Instructor: Dan Munro
Dan Munro is a bestselling author, coach, and confidence expert. For nearly a decade, he has helped thousands of people-pleasers break free from self-doubt and develop unshakable confidence.
Before becoming a coach, Dan worked in rehabilitation for serious criminal offenders, helping them shift their mindsets and behaviors. This unique experience gave him rare insights into the psychology of power, resilience, and self-mastery.
This course brings together everything he has learned and applied in his own life as a coach, father, husband, and mentor.
target_audience: Managers and leaders who want more effective teams

courses.title: From Doubt to Conviction: Nurturing Confidence & Self-belief
courses.bio: Providing you with my own unique method to enable you to grow in confidence and self-belief naturally.
objectives: You will learn my unique method to grow in confidence and self-belief naturally.
You will be given examples to allow you to break down your own inner-obstacles to success.
The course will touch upon psychological studies that show we are actually already greater than we think.
The course aims to change the way you view the world, so that it taps into your inner-self in a way that will create a shift in your confidence and self-belief.
requirements: No experience, tools or equipment needed.
courses.description:
Do you ever look at others and admire the ferocious confidence and self-belief they possess?


This course shares with you my own unique method of using the way you think about the world, to change your thoughts forever; so that you can grow your confidence and self-belief naturally.


Telling someone to be more confident and think more positively, very rarely has long-lasting change. But, if you can change the way someone views the world, there is a chance those changes will be more impactful and last a lifetime.


This course touches on human-behaviours to change the way you think about others and yourself.


Rather than listing ways to be more confident, as a lot of confidence courses do, this course uses a way of learning which can result in a change in your views so that you no longer hold yourself back. This is achieved by sharing with you my own thoughts and research, to allow you to recall upon those when you feel your confidence and self-belief dipping.


By changing the way we think, we have the ability to achieve great things and remove the thoughts that usually hold us back.


The only way you can expect to see change and improvement in your life, is by having the ability to put yourself forward and do what it takes to progress.


If we don’t apply for the job, turn up at the interview, take the course or stand up in front of others and be seen, life will remain stagnant. How can it move if we don’t take the steps required to grow and progress.


Rather than learning lists such as:
-stop criticising yourself
-stand tall
-be assertive,
we need to change the way we think. Learning what makes someone confident is great, but it lacks the ability to truly get into the core of our thoughts to facilitate a lifelong change.


Changing our thoughts can massively change how we view ourselves and the world in which we live; and this course aims to give you some ideas to do that.


It is, without a doubt, a very different kind of confidence building course.
target_audience: This course is for anyone who lacks confidence and self-belief.
It is for those who want to learn my unique method in order to grow their confidence and self-belief naturally.
This course is for those who miss out on opportunities and life experiences due to lack of confidence and fear.
It is for those who have an interest in human-behaviours, and how we can view those behaviours differently, in order to grow, flourish and shine.

courses.description:
The Switch On to Life Method™
A Coaching Framework for Identity, Insight & Intentional Living
Today’s world doesn’t just require us to show up—it asks us to show up whole.
That’s why the Switch On to Life Method™ isn’t just coaching. It’s a transformative journey back to you.
Blending psychological insight, emotional intelligence, and purpose-led action, this method helps you uncover your true identity, reframe what’s holding you back, and realign your life for sustainable, inside-out growth.
We don’t just coach the doing — we guide the becoming.


Phase 1: RECONNECT
Awaken awareness. Reclaim your identity.
This phase is about turning inward—gently, curiously, and courageously—to rediscover the parts of you that may have gone quiet. We lay the emotional and psychological groundwork here.
Layers of this phase:
Identity Reconnection
Explore your life story, values, and patterns to reclaim a grounded sense of self.
→ Benefit: Know who you are, not just what you do.
Emotional Awareness & Language
Learn how to identify, name, and respond to emotions with clarity and compassion.
→ Benefit: Navigate life with emotional fluency and strength.
Contextual Clarity
Understand how your inner world influences your outer leadership, relationships, and presence.
→ Benefit: See the ripple effect of internal shifts in every part of your life.
Inner Child & Wounds Insight
Work with the emotional roots of recurring triggers or patterns that no longer serve you.
→ Benefit: Reduce emotional reactivity and increase self-trust.


Phase 2: REFRAME
Shift beliefs. Rewire the mind. Reclaim your truth.
This is the transformation engine—where old scripts are rewritten, and truth begins to take root. We challenge the narratives that have shaped your choices, often without your permission.
Layers of this phase:
Limiting Belief Transformation
Identify core beliefs that keep you stuck, and reframe them into truths that empower.
→ Benefit: Break free from inner blocks and move forward with confidence.
Cognitive Rewiring & Mindset Tools
Use evidence-based psychological tools to shift thought patterns and create new mental pathways.
→ Benefit: Think differently, respond wisely, and build internal resilience.
Self-Talk & Narrative Reinvention
Learn to recognise inner dialogue and replace it with language that reflects your worth.
→ Benefit: Become your own inner ally—not your harshest critic.
Emotional Agility & Regulation
Develop the ability to pause, reflect, and respond—especially in high-stress or uncertain moments.
→ Benefit: Lead and live with composure, clarity, and conscious choice.


Phase 3: REALIGN
Live with clarity. Lead with congruence. Sustain the shift.
This phase brings it all together: insight becomes action. Growth becomes embodiment. And your life, leadership, or parenting aligns with your truth.
Layers of this phase:
Strengths Activation
Harness your natural gifts and integrate them into daily life and leadership.
→ Benefit: Build confidence, energy, and flow in what you do.
Values-Based Goal Setting
Design goals rooted in who you are—not who others expect you to be.
→ Benefit: Achieve what truly matters, not just what looks good.
Habits & Boundaries for Energy Stewardship
Craft sustainable rhythms and protective boundaries that honour your capacity.
→ Benefit: Maintain your progress without burning out.
Purpose-Driven Living & Leadership
Step into a lifestyle and leadership approach that feels aligned, authentic, and alive.
→ Benefit: Create impact that’s not just productive—but personally meaningful.


Why It Works
Unlike quick-fix coaching or surface-level performance tools, the Switch On to Life Method™ honours your full humanity—mind, heart, body, and purpose.
It helps you go beyond surviving or performing, and into a space of thriving with intention.


Ready to Begin?
This is your invitation to return to yourself.
To uncover, unlearn, and rewire.
To lead your life from the inside out.


Let’s Switch You Back On.
target_audience: Professionals & Leaders – Enhance emotional intelligence, decision-making, and self-management to lead effectively.

courses.description:
Are you ready to reclaim your life from domestic violence and abuse?
This comprehensive online course provides you with the knowledge, tools, and support you need to navigate this challenging journey.


Whether you are a survivor, a professional, or a concerned individual, this course will equip you with the skills to:
Identify and understand the dynamics of domestic violence and abuse.
Recognize the warning signs and break free from the cycle of violence.
Develop coping mechanisms and build self-esteem.
Access essential resources and support systems.
Empower yourself and create a life free from abuse.
This course is for you if:
You are experiencing domestic violence or abuse.
You are concerned about a loved one who is being abused.
You are a professional working with survivors of domestic violence.
You want to learn more about domestic violence and how to prevent it.
Here's what you'll learn:
The different types of domestic violence and abuse.
The psychology of abusers and survivors.
How to develop a safety plan and escape from an abusive relationship.
The legal options available to survivors.
The impact of domestic violence on children and families.
How to heal from the trauma of abuse.
How to prevent domestic violence in your community.
This course is taught by experts in the field of domestic violence and abuse, including:
Trauma-informed therapists
Legal professionals
Social workers
Survivors of domestic violence
You will also have access to:
A supportive online community of survivors and professionals.
Downloadable resources and handouts.
Live Q&A sessions with the instructors.
Don't wait any longer to take control of your life. Enroll in this course today and start your journey to healing and empowerment.
target_audience: Individuals interested in understanding and addressing domestic violence and abuse, including survivors, professionals, and community members.
