courses.description:
Do you feel nervous in situations where you will be meeting new people? Do you find yourself wishing you had more friends? How much does your shyness bother you or interfere with your life? Do people misinterpret your shyness as a sign of aloofness or a snobby attitude?
Nearly everyone sometimes feels shy:
Before making an important announcement
When you want to make a good impression on someone
When raising a delicate issue with someone in a position of authority
When you have to make a complaint, etc.
Many people across the world describe themselves as shy. They are concerned that people will look at them, evaluate them, and judge them poorly. They fear rejection.
In many cases, people are unhappy with this trait. Shyness prevents them from doing things they would like to be able to do, such as getting out and making new friends, assuming greater positions of responsibility at work. They would like to change things so that they wouldn’t have to feel like this.
Shyness refers to feeling awkward or uncertain in social situations. It is associated with self-consciousness, excessive monitoring of behavior and over-rehearsal of potential statements. For many people, making small talk, asking other people for directions, saying hello to a neighbor – is very difficult. They want desperately to participate in conversation, but feel ill-equipped to do so. They feel frustrated, alienated and excluded. They hesitate, can’t be spontaneous in speech, and don’t express opinions. Shy people are often erroneously considered rude or aloof.
Shyness is also related to perfectionism, desire to please others, sensitivity to criticism, fear of rejection, suggestibility, difficulty relaxing, and frequent worry.
This course will be useful for anyone who is troubled by shyness and experiences difficulties when interacting with other people. It will provide you with sufficient information about shyness and offer a variety of strategies to overcome it. You will develop a better understanding of the problem and learn practical skills to deal with shyness.
The course includes the following topics:
Developing social skills
Building self-esteem
How to cope with the challenges posed by shyness
Enhancing your social effectiveness

Here are guidelines you should follow for participating in this course.  Following these guidelines for how to take this course will vastly increase your success cultivating self-compassion.

Preparation for the Course •	Designate a set space for taking the course •	Ensure you will not be disturbed •	Choose a specific day and time •	Treat the course like a scheduled live or a zoom class  •	Do in consecutive weeks •	Have a dedicated journal or notebook

During the Course •	Allot 1 hour for each session •	Complete Sessions 1-9 in order •	Record in your journal or notebook all responses and thoughts •	Respond to reflection questions •	Complete personal exercises to apply concepts •	Engage in self-compassion practices •	Follow guided practices •	Do assigned tasks before the next session
courses.description:
With a Certificate of Completion, professionals can earn 2 units of Graduate-Level Professional Development Semester Credits from University of the Pacific.*
Contents and Overview
This is a 9-week on-demand course that will help you become a compassionate ally to yourself. Drawing from neuroscience, psychology, education, medicine, and mindfulness, you'll learn many mind and body practices, experience personal exercises and come away with your unique self-care plan.
This is an action-packed and thought-provoking course filled with self-compassion and mindfulness practices, incorporating the most evidence-based strategies and interventions available. Through guided practices using visualization, sensory awareness, touch, mindfulness, and meditation, you’ll make self-compassion an active practice.
In this course, any act or deed done on your own behalf, as well as any behavior change that supports your well-being and personal growth are considered under the umbrella of self-compassion and self-care.
This course was specifically designed for you to interact with the content, being an active learner rather than a passive listener. There are reflective prompts to get you thinking about the material and personal exercises and practices so you can apply the concepts to you and your situation. Each topic there has a brief summary of the relevant research, content information, and practices to use in daily life.
There are 9 sessions, each with a separate video. Each session video is approximately 1 hour and includes 5 to 11 short videos and lectures with PowerPoints and visuals. This makes it convenient for you to break up your viewing to meet your schedule.
These are the sessions and lectures covered in the course.


Session 1 Why We Need to Practice Self-Compassion

*To receive a Certificate of Completion:
View the videos and respond only to specific question(s) in the question space from the Assignments. However, it is recommended that you keep your own journal with the responses to all the steps and questions in each Personal Exercise and Assigned Task so you will have a complete set of responses to reflect on and revisit.  A Certificate of Completion from Udemy is available only for those who pay a fee for the course.
To earn 2 units of Graduate-Level Professional Development Semester Credits from the University of the Pacific, you will need to attach your Certificate of Completion, fill out the registration form, and pay the fee online at Courses4teachers.
Anyone granted free access who completes all the assignments can message the instructor to certify completion of the course.

courses.description:
THE COMPLETE SELF-ASSERTIVENESS AND COMMUNICATIONS SKILLS MASTER COURSE
***********************************************
Thousands of thrilled, satisfied students, have taken her courses in 114 countries!
Taught by the renowned, licensed psychologist, Dr. Dawn Elise Snipes Ph.D., LPC-MHSP, LMHC
***********************************************
The Breakthrough  Mastery Course to Become Assertive & Self-Confident, Fast and Easy--Fully Guaranteed
Learn Assertiveness Training that Can Transform Your Clients’ Lives - How To Be More Assertive and Communicate Effectively
Here, you’ll get the the tools you need to understand and overcome assertiveness issues that can transform your clients’ lives.

If you’re working with people who suffer from the isolation, anger or depression that comes with lacking assertiveness, then this course is for you because we’ll teach you the methods to identify and change their behaviors—quickly and easily.

You’ll also learn how to identify the root causes of assertiveness issues and explore the difficulties associated with being more assertive.


What Causes Problems with Assertiveness?
To help understand where each person is coming from, this course helps you identify the root causes of assertiveness issues and how you can communicate your needs more calmly and effectively.
The most common causes that we explore in-depth are:
●     Previous punishment when attempting to be assertive
●     Fear of rejection from others
●     The need for external validation


Let's Move Forward!
We also explore the three major barriers that prevent people from making positive change.

The Stress Barrier
Becoming assertive is stressful, because you have to change the way you interact with others.

The Social Barrier
Changing your behavior can be confusing to others, so we need tools to express ourselves even when others may not like it.

The Belief Barrier
Because reality is just 10% fact and 90% perception, you’ll be able to show them step-by-step techniques to transform their entire belief system and invite them to consider new possibilities for their lives and their relationships.


Being able to assert yourself  and communicate your needs calmly and confidently is the key to successful personal and professional relationships. Best of all, your communication skills can be learned, quickly and easily—because this course is taught by the expert's expert and structured with you in mind.
Discover for yourself how 40 minutes can produce a deep and permanent shift in the quality of your life, because that's all it takes for you to begin to enjoy the benefits of this engaging and dynamic course.

The Experts Zone produces courses that are a cut above the rest. All of our educators are recognized leaders in their respective fields, highly trained with Ph.D.’s from Ivy League Universities and the world’s top schools. Moreover, each course is produced by an award-winning team of professionals to make sure that you get the most up-to-date research to enhance your skills and advance your career
We respect your time and what you want to accomplish, which is why all of our courses are tailor-made with you in mind—a complete PRACTICAL education in about one hour.
In fact, you’ll be able to see the difference right away. All of our courses are preview-enabled right from the first course, so you can see just how we start out—with a bang! There’s no fluff, no repetition, no distracting graphics or impractical examples. Rather, you’ll enjoy an interesting, fun and engaging presentation chock full of proven, practical tools and strategies—with real-life examples. Perfect for both professional in the helping fields—such as, therapists, clergy, psychiatrists—as well as the everyday person who wants to enrich their own lives and perhaps even help those around them who may be struggling.
Empower yourself today and gain a massive understanding of human behavior... because if you’re ready to offer Professional Assertiveness Training, then enroll now and the first life you change, may be your own.
Get your education from a REAL PROFESSIONAL with more than 20 YEARS experience and a course that has TOP reviews from students in almost 100 countries


Meet Your Instructor:
Dr. Dawn Elise Snipes Ph.D., LPC-MHSP, LMHC
Renowned psychotherapist and author of  Journey to Recovery: A Comprehensive Guide to Recovery from Addiction and Mental Health Prob, Foundations Recovery Network, Meridian Behavioral Healthcare

CONFIDENCE COURSE

Hey, Justin Quinton here! Let me ask you a question...
Do you suffer from a lack of confidence and self-esteem?
When you want to speak up during a meeting or class, does a sense of anxiety silence you...
Are you unable to take action when you want to, like talking to someone you find attractive...
Do you try to avoid tension and confrontation in conversations where you need to stand up for yourself or ask for something you deserve…
Do you find yourself overthinking and in your head when around new people and social situations...
Do you feel overwhelmed with negative thoughts or a fear of rejection when trying anything new...
What about obsessive self-talk that stops you from sharing your ideas or creativity...
Does a lack of confidence and self-esteem make it hard to just be yourself and enjoy life...
If you’ve said yes to any of these, you need 60 Minutes to Self Esteem The Confidence Crash Course!
All of these problems are very common and things I used to personally struggle with myself.
This is why I know EXACTLY how to build your confidence and self-esteem up so you can gain control of your life!
Best of all, I've taken the major sticking points most people face, and condensed them into a course that's only 1 hour (1:25:44 if you count the bonus practices)!
If you’re familiar with my work you’ll know I have a very unique and different approach than the boring “tried & true” or “classic“ same old stuff you’ve heard a hundred times over that's free all over youtube and the internet...
Listen, as culture and the world changes, so do our problems, ever wonder why your parent's advice doesn’t always help??
This is why we need different solutions...
Fresh strategies to tackle modern problems of confidence and self esteem.
This course contains a new perspective on confidence and self esteem that I’ve used with extreme efficiency within my own private psychology practice.
I want to help you achieve a level of confidence that allows you to be yourself in new environments.
To be able to confidently strike up conversations with people you find attractive.
To be fearless with all types of rejection.
To share your ideas and self with the world.
So I’m insanely excited to introduce..
60 MINUTES TO SELF ESTEEM: THE CONFIDENCE CRASH COURSE
You probably know by now that Confidence is required if you want to reach your potential and achieve happiness in life. This Confidence crash course is designed to quickly help you understand the principles behind self esteem and confidence. Take control of the major sticking points and problems a lack of confidence and self esteem causes. With practices you can quickly and practically use right now.
Contents and Overview
This course was made for anyone that wishes to control their social inhibitions or anxieties and improve their levels of confidence and self-esteem. The only requirements are a flexible mindset and a commitment to changing yourself.
Students in this course will have access to 5 Confidence and Self Esteem Principles Video Lectures. Solutions to the top 10 Problems people face with low self esteem and confidence. As well as 5 powerful Practices and Tools you can start using immediately. Including the extremely powerful course finale that installs all the lessons into your psyche, called: The Self Esteem Mind Programming Audio
Unlike my other Confidence Master Class (The Fear 2.0: Core Confidence Conditioning) which focuses on psycho-education and core level identity change. This course was designed to focus on particular issues and finished in a little over an hour. It contains powerful new content that teaches you:

And Much More..
Start Boosting Your Confidence & Feeling More Satisfaction In Life With This Power Course.
As always, there’s a full money-back guarantee if you’re unsatisfied for any reason, so there’s no risk! So go ahead and check out the preview videos and course curriculum! If you like what you see, and are committed to improving yourself, I'm confident you’ll love this!
So what are you waiting for?
If you’re still reading this that means something, it means you know you need to take action and stop letting a lack of confidence and self esteem prevent you from leading the life you deserve! Let me help you with these tools and strategies and don't let the life you could have pass you by.

courses.description:
In the 21st century, many etiquette “rules” may appear outdated. However, they exist for a reason: they are proven guidance to improve our interaction with each other. Most importantly, having good, modern, and up-to-date etiquette can show that we respect one another.
In this comprehensive and fast-paced course, you will learn everything you need to know in business dining etiquette; then, you can adapt your own modern style to these timeless etiquette rules, ensuring that you present yourself as a savvy and respectful dining companion.
We start by guiding you through the preparation phase, including sending proper invites and dressing appropriately for the occasion. Learn the significance of choosing the right drinks, the art of seating arrangements to facilitate conversation, tipping, choosing the proper silverware for each dish, and the importance of non-verbal communication cues to set a positive tone for the meeting.


Each topic is covered in a concise manner. Together, the 8 videos touch on over 50 topics with images and videos to help students visualize the topic. Whether hosting a meal or attending as a guest, you will gain the skills to navigate any business dining situation confidently.


The course is taught by Iryna Bushmina, an international business etiquette trainer from Ukraine who has experience conducting training in 12+ countries for hundreds of professionals.
target_audience: Business owners who are interested in presenting themselves confidently during a meal or coffee meeting
Entry-level professionals who want to grow their social skills in a professional setting
Client facing professionals who want to improve their etiquette
International professionals who want to learn western etiquette
Recent university graduates who want to impress with good etiquette

Centered Confidence
The concept of centered confidence is rooted in something known as subtractive psychology, the understanding that the less you have on your mind, the more you can get in touch with your naturally confident self and begin to emit a magnetic presence.
Instead of giving you more to do - more techniques, more affirmations, more stuff that doesn’t work - here, you will discover how letting go of harmful mental conditioning and how activating your psychological immune system will help your mind clear itself of negative thinking that dims your natural state of radiance.

In this groundbreaking program, you will discover why the “get-out-of-your-comfort-zone” model most self-help gurus tout rarely works. TJ shows that only by understanding two more zones—the growth zone and the panic zone—can you safely and constructively exit your comfort zone at will and begin seeing a massive difference in your progress.
“The secrets of Confidence and Communication" is a deep dive into the negative psychological programming we all experience growing up, but few know how to completely rid themselves of. Centered Communication
Centered communication relies on three ingredients known to people who excel at sales, negotiation, teaching and influence. Those qualities are also what naturally good communicators, knowingly or not, apply to cultivate deep platonic and romantic relationships.
The three ingredients are rapport, tension, and escalation, and once you understand how they fit together and how to create each of them your social confidence and results will skyrocket immediately.

courses.description:
Have you ever felt the burning desire to pursue your dreams, but a paralyzing fear of failure held you back?
Is the fear of not succeeding blocking your path?
Is the life you're currently living truly the one you desire, or are you letting the fear of failure prevent you from taking the necessary steps for change?


It's time to bid farewell to that fear and embrace the success you deserve!


This innovative course has been specifically designed to help you overcome your limits, break free from mental blocks, and achieve extraordinary results.
Failure may seem daunting, but we firmly believe that every failure is just a necessary milestone on our life journey, whether it's in our professional or personal lives.


Along the path to our dreams, we are bound to encounter situations that lead to mistakes. Making mistakes is a natural part of being human. We can't avoid them, but we can learn from them. Mistakes, setbacks and obstacles are crucial to our growth process. Sometimes, a mere shift in perspective can reveal the value that a mistake can offer.


Failure plays an essential role in our journey of growth and improvement.


Far too often, driven by the fear of not making it, we end up abandoning our dreams in a corner. However, the biggest mistake we can make is to give up before even starting. The more we postpone, the feeling that the perfect moment will never come becomes stronger and stronger.


The right moment to take action is now!


In this course, you will be guided step by step through powerful strategies and proven techniques to transform the fear of failure into confidence. You will learn how to identify and overcome your fears, eliminate self-sabotage, and develop a mindset that will propel you towards your goals.


The first step will involve exploring your comfort zone, learning to push yourself beyond your usual boundaries, and seizing growth opportunities that arise along your path.


The second step will be understanding your fears. The fear of failure represents one of the most common forms of fear, an emotion that can manifest in various ways. It can lead you to procrastinate or even avoid taking action, play it safe, or even self-sabotage. You will also understand the effects that fear can have on your body and discover the underlying causes behind the fear of failure, as well as the behaviors you adopt to protect yourself from it, behaviors that actually hold you back.


The third step will be to transform your fears into courage by renewing your mindset. You will learn how to tap into the courage that lies within you, gaining greater self-confidence and self-esteem.


As the fourth step, you will learn a series of practical techniques that you can apply immediately to overcome your fears, stop procrastinating, and develop a positive mindset that will drive you to take resolute action.


Finally, we will provide you with an extra resource: a step-by-step guide consisting of nine phases to help you define your action plan.


Through engaging lessons and practical exercises, you will discover how to turn failure into a springboard for success. This course will provide you with powerful tools to maintain motivation and develop resilience that will enable you to face any obstacle with confidence and determination.
Whether you are an entrepreneur, a freelance, or simply someone who wants to fully realize themselves, this course is suitable for you. The fear of failure will no longer stand as an insurmountable barrier, but rather an opportunity for growth and personal development.
Don't allow fear to hold you prisoner and prevent you from achieving everything you desire. Take control of your life and unleash your full potential.


Don't wait any longer.
Embrace your courage!


Enroll now and embark on your journey towards a life filled with success, fulfillment, and confidence!
target_audience: Those who want to overcome and transform the fear of failure
Individuals who feel stuck and wish to lead a more fulfilling and enriching life
Those who experience worry and apprehension when stepping out of their comfort zone, even in small situations

courses.description:
What if I told you the only thing standing between you and the life you dream of – the success, the love, the recognition – is your self-esteem?


Think about this for a moment: Your self-esteem is the foundation of your entire life.


Just like the foundation of a house, if it’s solid, your life stands tall and strong. But if it’s shaky or cracked, no matter how beautiful the structure is, it’ll eventually crumble.


That’s why so many brilliant, talented people are stuck, unable to move forward, watching opportunities slip away.


They’ve built their life on a shaky foundation. And it’s keeping them from unlocking their full potential – in their career, in relationships, and in life.


People with just average abilities but strong self-confidence often end up getting more out of life than incredibly talented people who doubt themselves.


But it doesn’t have to be this way.


That’s why I created this course. I want you to finally see what you’re truly capable of – and go after it. Whether it’s finding a fulfilling relationship, excelling in your career, or finally getting the respect you deserve. It all starts with one thing: A rock-solid self-esteem.


In this course, you’ll discover a powerful, time-tested technique to transform your self-esteem in just 15 minutes.


And here’s the kicker – once you learn it, you’ll be able to boost your confidence in just 2 seconds, whenever you need it.


You deserve more. Let’s make sure you get it.
target_audience: Do any of these sound familiar?
You hate being criticized and it eats you up inside.
You feel ashamed when you want to say no or disagree with someone.
You’re uncomfortable around people with power or influence.
You’re always chasing approval: “Why didn’t anyone like my post?” or “What will people say if I do this?”
Your confidence flips like a switch - one moment you feel good, the next you’re drowning in self-doubt.
You dream big, but fear stops you: “What if I fail? Do I even deserve this?”
You struggle to stand your ground and defend your opinions.
You’d rather stay quiet than risk looking stupid or foolish.
If any of this feels familiar, you need to take this program. No excuses. It’s time to take control of your self-esteem and start winning where it counts.

Perfect for fashion lovers, aspiring stylists, or anyone eager to enhance their image and wardrobe, it enables participants to authentically express their unique identity and boost confidence through personalized style adjustments.


Diving into the relationship between personality, as mapped by the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI), and fashion choices, students learn how cognitive functions shape their style preferences. They'll identify their style personas and align their clothing selections with their fundamental preferences and values. The curriculum encompasses color theory, the meaning behind clothing choices, and a thorough examination of how personality influences fashion decisions.


By applying principles of psychology, the course uncovers how personality traits not only affect fashion selections but also influence body language and how we perceive ourselves. Participants are equipped to make informed, empowering decisions about their style, realizing the profound link between their inner world and outer presentation.


Embark on this transformative journey to revolutionize your approach to fashion. You'll merge the worlds of art, science, and style, crafting a wardrobe that’s deeply personal. This course isn't just about fashion; it's a pathway to discovering yourself and how you want to be seen by the world, encouraging a more intentional and expressive way of dressing.

Achieve Mastery as a Coach - Acquire Core Skills & Make a Bigger Impact as a Manager or a Coach
Are you an aspiring coach or manager wanting to make a bigger impact with your staff or clients seeking to make a positive difference in your clients and staffs' lives?


Or perhaps you're an established professional looking to upgrade your coaching skills? Whichever the case, becoming an effective coach requires mastery of several core skills, and we are here to guide you on this meaningful journey.
Our course focuses on the essential qualities that translate into successful coaching relationships. Here's what we cover:
Exceptional Communication Skills
Clear and effective communication is the cornerstone of a successful coaching relationship. We teach you how to articulate complex concepts in a way that is easily understandable, enabling your clients to receive and apply them seamlessly.
Empathy and Emotional Intelligence
Understanding and recognizing your clients' emotional states and responses is integral to coaching. We emphasize the importance of providing a supportive environment that caters to each client's unique needs.
Patience and Perseverance
Improvement takes time. We instill the importance of patience in coaching, teaching you how to help clients stay motivated and persevere, even when progress seems slow.
Continuous Learning
The coaching landscape is continuously evolving. Our course prepares you to stay on top of current advances, ensuring you can offer the best guidance to your clients.
Unleashing the Power of Listening
The power of effective listening cannot be overstated. We train you to truly listen, uncovering critical insights that could be the key to your clients' breakthroughs.
Find Your Coaching Niche
Whether you're into life coaching, health and wellness, business, or any other specialty, we help you identify your niche and lay a solid foundation for your coaching career.
Included in this comprehensive package is a 12-day Coaching Challenge designed to equip you with confidence, an indispensable tool for every successful coach. After all, remember - confident coaches attract clients.
Our course is not about just adding more tools to your coaching toolbox. It's about mastering the fundamental skills that can significantly enhance your efficacy as a coach. With us, you're not just learning; you're transforming into a confident professional capable of making a lasting impact in your clients' lives.
Dive in, take the challenge, and get ready to become a better coach who delivers bigger results. Because your clients deserve nothing but the best, and with this course, that's exactly what you'll give them.
Welcome to your journey towards coaching mastery!

courses.description:
This empowering training will uncover all the key components of confidence and assertiveness, bolstering your emotional IQ and self-awareness. Through focused habits such as self-reflection, boundary setting, and honest communication, you will learn to navigate social interactions and challenging situations with poise and wisdom.
Confidence Blueprint is a comprehensive approach to personal growth and self-empowerment, rooted in understanding our emotions and how they influence our interactions. This course offers practical strategies that have been applied successfully in various domains including corporate settings, mentorship programs, personal relationships, and community leadership.
Key to this training is fostering self-knowledge. By exploring our inherent tendencies and thought patterns, we can develop a grounded sense of who we are, enabling us to make informed choices that align with our core values and immediate priorities. This growth in self-awareness lays the groundwork for increased confidence and assertiveness in everyday encounters.
Cultivating emotional intelligence is the heart of our Confidence Blueprint. Emotional IQ involves knowing, understanding, and managing our emotions, as well as empathizing with the emotions of others. This skill allows us to navigate social dynamics with tact. The course delves into honing emotional intelligence, and integrating wise new disciplines into your daily life.


Some of the key concepts covered in this course include:
- Strategies for boosting self-confidence and strengthening emotional resilience
- Strategies for setting boundaries assertively and maintaining them with clarity
- Understanding the correlation between who you 'identify' as and how you feel
- Life wisdom for cultivating self-awareness, emotional intelligence & assertiveness
- Psychology models for understanding how to shape and modify you personality
- The role of self-discipline in achieving personal goals and influencing other people
- How self-knowledge alone enables self-awareness, which leads to self-discipline
- How self-discipline alone enables people to become assertive & socially effective


By ingraining our principles and practices into your routine, you can deepen your self-awareness and emotional intelligence, thus enhancing your ability to handle stress, resolve conflicts, and maintain healthy relationships. This course lays a robust foundation for nurturing assertiveness, equipping you with the wisdom needed for personal and professional growth.
Through enlightening lessons, reflective exercises, and real-world examples, learners will gain the knowledge, wisdom and insights to understand themselves with greater precision and accuracy. They can learn how to move beyond merely agreeing or disagreeing with principles, and instead reflect upon them to evaluate their relevance in the context of their life.
The wisdom, skills and knowledge you'll gain through this training are not just theoretical – they are practical and applicable to the real-life situations you'll encounter day-to-day. Throughout this training you will naturally develop a deeper knowledge of yourself, and consequentially increase your ability to build strong relationships, overcome career life and daily struggles.
Our training materials are captured in HD video, accompanied by an MP3 version of the course, and supplemented with PDF resources to enhance your learning experience. The course is available on-demand, providing a comprehensive framework to contextualize your studies and establish a strong foundation for sharing your newfound life-knowledge with others.
ⓘ This training is part of a broader 28-course Achology curriculum. It comes with a full 30-day money back guarantee, so if you're not satisfied, you can get a refund with no questions asked.

courses.description:
"Imagine the main insights from 50 books and 8 courses, squeezed into an easy to understand framework to give structure to this information"






Welcome to the Confidence & Self-Esteem Masterclass!!!
Great that you are willing to take ownership and build your self-confidence.
As you are probably searching for the right course that fits your individual needs, I hope this little guide will help you make the right decision.


You have severe social anxiety and are searching for a teacher that has been at the same place.
"How I overcame social anxiety" by Tobias Atkins is a great choice. I am not a big fan of the final section as this is a bit too "pseudo-psychologic" for my preferences, but this is even a bonus section so it doesn't really count as a negative argument :)
You are looking for a course with many easy to implement techniques.
"Double your confidence" by Jimmy Naraine is a great choice for you. For me it was lacking structure and was too short-term oriented, but there surely were many great short-techniques to quickly boost your confidence. My two favourite ones are part of this course.
You are looking for a course to increase your charisma and do not care about the price.
"Charisma University" by Charisma on Command is the right choice for you. It is hosted on their own website and was with 600$ far too expensive in my opinion. However, when you have the luxury of not having to worry about money, there surely is a lot of value in this course.
You are looking for a course to build long-lasting confidence and care about structure.
Then this course right here is the right choice for you. You have to be willing to take action, but if you are ready to take ownership of your self-confidence this is by far the most complete course currently out there (At least from what I have stumbled upon on so far).
Imagine the main insights from 50 books  and 8 courses, squeezed into an easy to understand framework to give structure to this information.


And if you are wondering why I recommend other courses here, this is because it is not about the competition but about helping you overcome the tough situation of not feeling good enough. Plus, as I know that every person has different preferences.
target_audience: You are aiming to build confidence in social situations and increase the self-esteem about your own worth.
You care about a strucured approach to really understand this complex topic deeply.
You are willing to take action.

courses.description:
Welcome to "Minimalist Living and Maximum Self-Confidence in 21 Days" – a transformative journey designed to bring practical and actionable changes into your life. This isn't just a course; it's a roadmap to help you navigate the realms of minimalism and self-confidence, leading to meaningful development.


Over the next 21 days, we're not just going to talk about concepts; we're diving deep into daily practices. Each day is a step, a practical application that nudges you towards effective action-based development. This isn't about lofty ideals; it's about tangible changes you can make in your life, one day at a time.


Consider this course as your guide, a friend walking alongside you in this journey. But here's the key – the power lies in your hands. You're not just a participant; you're the driver of your own transformation.


This course is a roadmap, yes, but the destination is shaped by your actions. It's up to you to take these practices and seamlessly weave them into your daily life. This isn't about a radical overhaul; it's about gradual, intentional shifts that accumulate over time.


Think of it as a conversation between friends, where we explore the realms of minimalism and self-confidence together. It's a dynamic, practical, and authentic journey.


So, my friend, as we embark on this adventure, open your heart to the possibilities ahead. Be ready to embrace change, to integrate these practices into the fabric of your life. The road is laid out, but the steps are yours to take.


Let's make these next 21 days a testament to your growth, simplicity, and confidence.

courses.description:
Do you ever feel like you’re hiding your true self from the world? Do you struggle with self-doubt, fear of judgment, or feeling like you're just not good enough?
If so, you’re not alone. Shame is one of the biggest obstacles to confidence—yet most people don’t even realize it’s holding them back.
Shame influences your thoughts, emotions, and behaviors in ways that limit your potential. It makes you second-guess yourself in social situations, avoid opportunities for growth, and struggle to build meaningful relationships. But here’s the truth:
Shame Can Be Overcome—And Confidence Can Be Yours
Confidence isn’t something you’re born with; it’s something you create. And the first step is learning how to let go of shame—the hidden force that keeps you feeling insecure, awkward, and unworthy.
This course gives you a proven system for eliminating shame and unlocking natural, effortless confidence. Through practical exercises, mindset shifts, and real-world challenges, you’ll learn how to break free from self-doubt and show up in the world as your authentic self.


What You’ll Learn:
The Root Causes of Shame – Understand how shame develops, how it affects your self-esteem, and why it holds you back.
How to Reprogram Your Mindset – Identify and challenge the limiting beliefs that make you feel “not good enough.”
Practical Tools to Eliminate Shame – Learn step-by-step techniques to break free from guilt, embarrassment, and self-judgment.
How to Develop Unshakable Confidence – Gain the courage to express yourself fully, take social risks, and stop seeking approval from others.
The Science of Self-Acceptance – Build a healthy self-image so you can be comfortable in your own skin and enjoy life without fear of judgment.
Real-Life Social Challenges – Put your new confidence to the test with simple but powerful exercises designed to push you outside your comfort zone.
How This Course Will Change Your Life
Feel Comfortable in Any Social Situation – Whether it’s public speaking, dating, or everyday conversations, you’ll feel at ease and in control.
Develop Genuine Self-Love – Stop the cycle of self-criticism and start appreciating yourself for who you are.
Attract Better Relationships – Build deep, meaningful connections with friends, partners, and colleagues without fear of rejection.
top Overthinking and Second-Guessing Yourself – Say goodbye to self-doubt and start trusting your instincts.
Live Without Fear of Judgment – Stop worrying about what others think and start making choices based on what truly makes you happy.


What Students Are Saying
"This is the most practical and effective way to develop confidence I have ever come across. Dan is spot on, and applying these lessons is making me more confident than I’ve ever been in my life."
— Tim Pinnock
"Dan gets straight to the point, outlining the mechanics of shame and practical steps to eliminate it. This course is powerful and impactful."
— Fred Lunjevich
"Insightful and eye-opening. Opens up new life opportunities by changing the way you think. I'm finding genuine long-term benefits from this course."
— Issy Nancarrow


Meet Your Instructor: Dan Munro
Dan Munro is a bestselling author and experienced confidence coach who has spent nearly a decade helping thousands of people overcome shame and build a fearless mindset.
With a background in rehabilitating serious criminal offenders, Dan has developed a unique and deeply effective approach to personal growth—one that helps people transform not just their confidence, but their entire lives.
Through years of coaching and personal experience, he has created a step-by-step method that anyone can use to free themselves from shame, build authentic confidence, and unlock their true potential.


Start Your Transformation Today
Confidence isn’t about pretending to be fearless—it’s about being unapologetically yourself.
Are you ready to break free from self-doubt, stop seeking approval, and finally feel comfortable in your own skin?
This course gives you everything you need to take that first step toward true self-acceptance and lasting confidence.
Enroll now, risk-free, with Udemy’s 30-day money-back guarantee.

courses.description:
The State Of Feeling Sorry
Do you often feel guilty as if you’ve done something wrong?

Do you often feel sorry like you've done something wrong to others?

Do you often agree with others out of fear being wrong?
These negative states of the mind are actually the states of Self-Rejection, which is the seed cause of unhappiness.

In this course we will go deep within to transform this state!

Developing Self-Acceptance
This course will take you to learn a technique called No-Sorries.

This technique simply asks you to stop saying the word "sorry" in your life.

In these 21 days you will understand why this technique works so that you can develop greater self-confidence and happiness in life.

There Are No Rules
Now the course is not asking you to follow religiously to not say sorry in your life. But it simply teaches you how by not saying sorry you can transform the mind. That is why this is a 21 day course so that you can understand the technique in more detail so you can fully experience the power of the technique rather than to guess what it would do to you.

Live your life, believing in yourself.
This course is targeted to those who often experience guilt, vulnerability, a lack of self-support / self-confidence, or those who always put others as priority before themselves.
target_audience: People who often experience Regret & Guilt
People who are indecisive
People who are self-critical

objectives: Learn techniques to figure out why they are procrastinating, and use that knowledge to move quicker away from procrastination to working on their gifts.

Life Is About Connection And Connecting - Procrastination Prevents That
Procrastination Isn't A Disease We Have - It Is Entirely Curable

When We Procrastinate, We Block Our Unique Gift And Perspective
The Light And Dark Go Together
Love And Integrate All Parts Of Ourselves To Reduce Procrastination
Procrastination Can Never Be Completely Eliminated As We Always Have Shadows
Procrastination Is Like Not Listening To A Valuable Part Of Ourselves
Everyone Suffers From A Unique Form Of P: Different Forms Of Procrastination Means Different Shadows Are Being Attacked
If We Use Sex Or Masturbation Or Porn To Procrastinate...
If We Use Shopping Or Consumerism To Procrastinate...
If We Use Incessant TV Watching Or Book Reading To Procrastinate...
If We Use Incessant Physical Activity Or Workaholism To Procrastinate...
Go Deep Enough To Deal With Our Insecurities, Shames, And Vulnerabilities
Use The Way You Procrastinate As A Lesson Into Your Shadow And Do The Work
The Light And The Dark Cannot Exist Without Each Other
We Really Need To Love Ourselves When We Procrastinate - We Truly Need Kindness
In The End, No One Is Perfect. All We Ca: Thank You For Sticking Through To The End

requirements: The only prerequisite that this course has is to be human. Every human at one time or another experiences procrastination.
courses.description:
Procrastination is one of those things that can get debilitating and degrading. We hate ourselves for procrastinating, but we cannot control ourselves from doing it. So it's a self-perpetuating cycle.
I want us to stop this cycle. I want to use shadow work to get into the nitty-gritty of why we procrastinate.
I believe most of us paint the brown leaves green when we look at why we procrastinate by treating the symptoms, but we don't get into the roots of it. Why do we procrastinate? It isn't because we are lazy, or stupid, or whatever else we might tell ourselves. It is because there is something we should be dealing with, but we aren't.
What is it exactly?
This course will help you figure that out. I am hoping through the mix of video lectures, worksheets, and quizzes, you will be able to get ahead of the curve with procrastination. So that the next time it comes at you, you will be able to use that opportunity to collect data on yourself, and kill procrastination in its tracks.
We all have so many gifts that we aren't utilizing because we spend so much of our time procrastinating. Let's stop doing that to ourselves. Our gifts are way too precious for us to do that. The world needs our gifts.
target_audience: Anyone who has experienced the frustrations of dealing with procrastination and wants to get over it faster the next time it hits them.

requirements: No experience needed, you will learn everything you need to know
courses.description:
Welcome to my course "BPD Healing and Superpowers". I'm Bex Renee, a Reiki Master and Shamanic/Nordic healer, course designer, and content creator. I specialize in designing subliminals and meditations, as well as neuroscience, witchcraft, and frequencies (I also dabble in tarot and astrology in my spare time).


I was diagnosed with Borderline Personality Disorder and ADHD three to four years ago and felt it was time to create this course. I've compiled my knowledge and techniques from my professional expertise and my personal BPD healing journey.


In this course, we're going to approach things differently. We'll start by discussing the three therapies: DBT, Schema therapy, and MBT. Then, we'll delve into the nine BPD criteria and how to work on them individually for healing. We'll also explore the neuroscience of BPD and learn about the brain, gaining awareness of our behaviors.


Moving forward, we'll learn to embrace the shadow part of ourselves through ancestral healing, brain reiki, inner child healing, core wounds, and other shadow work tips. Finally, we'll conclude with the "self-love" section, where we'll explore loving ourselves, having compassion for ourselves and others, healing with reiki, writing a love letter to ourselves, and transforming BPD into a superpower.


This course provides ample resources and activities for you to work on in your own time. The lectures are designed to be colorful, versatile, and easy to follow and understand. All you need for this course is a pen and paper to take notes.


Remember, there's no right or wrong way to heal BPD. I've included a wealth of information so you can find the healing methods that work best for you. Despite being a single mother with three children, managing a four-bedroom house, and running a business, I've been able to manage my ADHD and BPD, and I believe you can too.


Let's not pay attention to negative claims about BPD on the internet. With consistency and time, BPD can be healed, managed, and even used for good. You just have to take those steps. I believe in you and hope to see you in my course.


Be sure to check out my profile for links to my other services. Have a blessed day!


Bex Renee
target_audience: for those wanting to heal Borderline personality disorder
learn everything about BPD
turning BPD into a superpower and living a full balanced life

courses.description:
Hello and welcome to this course on gaining greater self-esteem.
I am David Barton, and I have created this course to help people like you develop your self-esteem and shape a better opinion of yourself.
My basic goal here is to help you learn to love and appreciate yourself more. Essentially that is what self-esteem is; it’s a type of self-love and appreciation. A measure of worthiness; how worthwhile you feel as a human being. This translates into the way you appreciate and love others too.
There are many components that come together to create a healthy self-esteem, and we will cover several of those in this course.
I believe that no one is born with an unhealthy self-esteem. That unfortunate state arrives as we grow and develop in the world. In this course we will explore some of those negative influencers and challenge the values and beliefs we have internalized from them which hinder our growth and enjoyment of life.
Actually, that is my goal for you; to help you reverse some of these negative effects which have been imparted to you.
If you decide to take this course, then please download and use the companion workbook I have created. The workbook is designed to give you the best value from the material.
I hope that you will join me on this journey as we delve into the world of building better and healthier self-esteem.

courses.description:
This course is designed to help individuals develop and enhance their public speaking skills, whether for professional presentations, academic settings, or social events. We begin with an introduction to the fundamentals of public speaking, addressing the key challenges and offering solutions to overcome common fears. Students will explore the different types of speeches, including persuasive, informative, and entertaining, and learn how to identify the right message for their audience.
One key component of the course is mastering storytelling, a powerful tool for engaging audiences. We’ll also delve into the art of speechwriting, from drafting an impactful speech to refining it for clarity and impact. Visual aids will be introduced as a way to support and strengthen the message, with tips on how to prepare and use them effectively during a presentation.
Nervousness is a common obstacle for many speakers, so we will focus on strategies to manage anxiety and boost confidence before and during a speech. Additionally, we’ll cover the importance of using speaker notes wisely, speaking with clarity, and maintaining strong body language to reinforce your message.
The course will highlight the habits and techniques of successful public speakers, providing practical tips that can be applied in various speaking situations. Finally, students will learn how to effectively wrap up a speech, leaving a lasting impression on their audience. Through practice and feedback, participants will gradually build the confidence and skills necessary to speak with poise and impact
target_audience: Aspiring Public Speakers: Individuals looking to improve their presentation skills and build confidence in public speaking.
Professionals: Those in fields where public speaking is part of their career, such as educators, business leaders, and marketers.
Students: Individuals who need to develop effective speaking skills for academic presentations or projects.

requirements: There are no requirements or prerequisites for this course.
courses.description:
Do you suffer from self-harming thoughts? Do you have a habit of comparing yourself to others’ success? Do you want to stop being pessimistic in everything that you do? Would you rather take your life and career to a higher level or rather just land that dream job you have always desired? Have you ever felt stuck or limited in your abilities? If so, you might benefit from adopting a growth mindset. A growth mindset is the belief that your abilities and intelligence can be developed through dedication, hard work, and perseverance. This concept, popularized by psychologist Carol Dweck, can significantly transform the way you approach challenges in both your personal and professional life. Embracing a growth mindset encourages resilience. When you face obstacles, you begin to view them as opportunities to learn rather than setbacks. This shift in perspective allows you to tackle challenges head-on, fostering an attitude of determination. A growth mindset can enhance your overall well-being. By focusing on improvement rather than perfection, you can reduce stress and anxiety. You realize that it’s okay to make mistakes; they are simply stepping stones toward your goals. This understanding helps promote a sense of fulfillment in your life, as you become more aware of your progress and celebrate small victories along the way.
In this course, you will:
Identify the root causes and symptoms of self-sabotage and how they might be holding you back in life and at work.
Discover the strategies of a growth mindset to combat self-sabotage and become a better you.
Be present with a growth mindset in your organization explore many positive outcomes and navigate the complexities of today’s business world.
Try proven positive affirmations to address negative thoughts.
Complete a Self-reflection Assessment and worksheets to expand your learning and personal growth.


I am Patricia Nunez, your instructor for this course. I am passionate about teaching and want to share with you the benefits of living with a growth mindset. Adopting a growth mindset has changed not only my life for the better but also my relationship with colleagues and loved ones. Those around me have seen the positive outcomes in my life when adopting a growth mindset. So can you see a positive transformation in your life with a growth mindset by applying the strategies that I use taught here.

I hope that you will join me in this course, invest your time with me and you will unlock new paths to success and happiness in your life. Remember, growth starts with the right mindset!
target_audience: Those who want to grow in their career and in their relationships to experience greater fulfillment in life.
Those who want to identify self-sabotage when they're showing up with a fixed mindset, and understand how a growth mindset might help them improve in their personal development skills.

If you already feel like you're exercising a growth mindset on a daily basis and you're comfortable taking risks, this course may NOT be for you.

Then you graduate to bigger and more powerful helicopters. Howard will demonstrate a variety of helicopters available in Microsoft's Flight Simulator that you can fly, both free and payware.
The skills you learn here can be used in any flight simulator, but demonstrations and pictures are taken of the Cabri G2.

Do you find yourself holding back in conversations, unable to express your true thoughts and feelings?

You'll learn how to replace self-limiting beliefs with empowering ones, balance assertiveness, and cultivate a growth mindset.

Imagine a world where you communicate with confidence, earn respect effortlessly, and lead with empathy and strength. This course is a step towards that world. It's about becoming a better negotiator, an inspiring leader, and a valued team member.
Assertiveness is more than a skill; it's a way of life. It's about standing up for yourself while respecting others. Join us on this journey of self-discovery and empowerment. The simple meaning of Mindfulness is 'remembering to be aware', so it helps us to observe and learn how our mind works. A good way of describing MINDFULNESS MEDITATION is that the deliberate act of paying attention to the present moment, free of the judgement.
This brings you in a mode of relaxation, balance and inner peace.
The positive effects of MINDFULNESS MEDITATION on mental and overall health are well documented and backed up by hundreds of scientific studies.
In the far east the practical value of MINDFULNESS MEDITATION is known for more than 2000 years, as it is taught in the context of Buddhism. As a non-sectarian philosophy MINDFULNESS MEDITATION is open to all people interested - regardless of their religion or background.

- "Clinicians should be aware that meditation programs can result in small to moderate reductions of multiple negative dimensions of psychological stress.
-  JAMA Intern Med. 2014 Mar;174(3):357-68.
- "Increases in mindfulness were found to mediate the relationships between formal mindfulness practice and improvements in psychological functioning, suggesting that the practice of mindfulness meditation leads to increases in mindfulness, which in turn leads to symptom reduction and improved well-being."
- Jounal of Behavioral Medicine 31(1):23-33
- "These results suggest that mindfulness training may improve attention-related behavioral responses by enhancing functioning of specific subcomponents of attention."
- Cognitive, Affective, & Behauvioral Neuroscience June 2007, Volume 7, Issue 2 pp 109–119
-"Increasing evidence shows that mindfulness meditation, delivered either via MBSR or MBTI, can be successfully used for the treatment of insomnia with good patient acceptance and durable results."
- Curr Opin Pulm Med. 2015 Nov;21(6):547-52.
- "Taken together, these data indicate that meditation engages multiple brain mechanisms that alter the construction of the subjectively available pain experience from afferent information."
- J Neurosci. 2011 Apr 6; 31(14): 5540-5548

Unlock the power within and transform your self-perception with our “Body Alchemy: Transformation of Self-Perception” course.

Participants will benefit from personalized guidance that fosters a deeper understanding of self-worth. Whether you’re struggling with body image issues or simply looking to enhance your self-perception, this course provides the tools and support you need to make lasting changes.
Throughout the course, you will be guided through transformative exercises that help you shift your mindset and embrace a more positive view of yourself. You will learn to honor your body, recognize its capabilities, and develop a loving relationship with it. This journey is about more than just physical appearance; it’s about embracing your entire being and recognizing your inherent worth.
Join us on this transformative journey and discover the alchemy of self-love and acceptance. Embrace your body, honor your journey, and step into a more confident, empowered version of yourself. This course is your opportunity to create lasting change and cultivate a deep sense of self-appreciation.

courses.description:
Do you sometimes feel paralyzed by self-doubt? Do you hear that inner voice telling you that you're not good enough, that you’ll fail, or that others are better than you?
This course is for you if:
You constantly criticize yourself, and it stops you from feeling confident.
You feel like you don’t deserve success or happiness.
You’re stuck, held back by the fear of failure or rejection.
You want to eliminate negative thoughts and replace them with self-love and support.
Why Do You Need This Course?
Your inner critic can be the biggest obstacle to your success, happiness, and fulfillment. If you don’t learn to manage it, it will continue to hold you back from living the life you deserve.
This course will teach you not only how to manage that voice but also how to transform it into your greatest strength. You’ll build a lasting sense of confidence that will serve you for a lifetime.


What Results Will You Achieve?
After completing this course, you will:
Transform your negative self-talk into a supportive inner dialogue.
Feel confident, worthy, and free from self-doubt.
Build a strong relationship with yourself and become your best ally.
Face challenges with more ease and trust in your abilities.
Make decisions confidently and take action without fear.
What Will You Learn in This Course?
Over 7 days (plus an integration day), you’ll embark on a transformative journey that will help you:
Recognize your inner critic – Understand how it works, where it comes from, and why it holds you back.
Befriend it – Instead of fighting it, you’ll learn to listen to it with compassion and transform it into support.
Replace limiting beliefs with inspiring ones.
Build confidence and create a new, supportive identity.
Handle daily critical thoughts effectively – using proven techniques, affirmations, meditations, and powerful methods inspired by Byron Katie, Louise Hay, and Mel Robbins.
How Is the Course Structured?
Day 1: Understanding the inner critic – where it comes from and why it’s there.
Day 2: Listening with compassion and building a new relationship with the critic.
Day 3: Transforming criticism into support.
Day 4: Visualization and creating a new inner ally.
Day 5: Identifying and changing limiting beliefs.
Day 6: Reinforcing positive beliefs and self-support.
Day 7: Stepping into your new identity.
Integration Day: Daily practice for observing your inner dialogue and releasing limiting beliefs.
Are You Ready for a Change?
Sign up today and take the first step toward fully loving and supporting yourself. You deserve to live with confidence, peace, and self-love.

courses.description:
Welcome to the 21X Academy, where we're on a mission to not just talk about self-confidence but to help you actively build it, day by day. Our courses are not about theories and abstract concepts; they are your daily guide to practical applications that lead to real, tangible development.


In this unique journey, we've designed a road map for you. Picture it as your personal GPS for building self-confidence. But here's the catch – you're the driver. It's not just about having the map; it's about steering your own course. Your journey is in your hands, and we're here to be your co-pilot.


Every day, we'll hand you a new tool, a fresh insight, or an actionable task. This isn't about overwhelming you with information; it's about giving you bite-sized, practical steps that you can seamlessly integrate into your daily life. Small changes, big impact.


Now, let's be real. This isn't a passive course where you sit back and absorb. No, this is about rolling up your sleeves and making these practices a part of your daily routine. It's about turning knowledge into action, theory into practice, and aspirations into achievements.


Think of it like a fitness regimen for your confidence muscles. And just like in the gym, the results depend on your commitment. The more consistently you apply these practices, the stronger your confidence muscles become.


So, buckle up, my friend. You're about to embark on a journey of self-discovery, growth, and a whole lot of "aha" moments. This course is more than a map; it's your passport to a more confident you. The destination? That's up to you. But we're here to guide, support, and cheer you on every step of the way.


Ready to take the wheel?
With excitement and encouragement, The 21X Academy Team

This comprehensive course is designed to help you shatter those barriers and unlock your potential as a powerful, persuasive communicator in any setting - from the boardroom to the family dinner table. This course doesn't just rehash dry communication theories – it equips you with battle-tested techniques forged from decades of in-the-trenches professional experience. Overcome the psychological blocks keeping you from communicating with conviction

courses.description:
“OUR POTENTIAL”
“We all have our potential written in the stars. We may believe it or not. When we mature it, we can implement our original Spiritual Contract so we can play our part in helping humanity.
Now the question is: Are you ready to take on the natural cosmic energy currents, freely offered to us, in order to take your life to the next level? Or are you going to deny, to yourself and the world, the spark of the amazing brightness of your soul?”
From “Shamanic Journey – Crossing the Portal 2020 - 2021”
By Dr Ana Garcia PhD, DTM.


INTRODUCTION
“All through our lives we are conditioned by the people and institutions around us to fit the Status Quo. In order to be accepted by others, we develop masks which conceal the person Who We Really Are and somehow manage to lose ourselves in the busy and frantic process of living! The resulting loss of centre brings the feeling of being pulled in all directions by external circumstances, which limits our chances to achieve our true potential. But I believe that every individual has a Hidden Gift, a special talent which makes us unique and which needs to be shared with the world. Finding helps us realize that we really count and that we can really make a difference”


THE EXERCISES
The exercises in this course are designed to be done at home as you take time to reflect, consider, meditate and investigate them. You will align yourself with a more holistic vision of yourself, and will trigger your own advice, guidance, direction and healed perspective of your life.
When we are ready to move onto the next level in our journey of development, we leave our conditioning or limiting thoughts and beliefs behind, and work on replacing them with newer, freer and more expansive ones.
It can be painful. Think of a snake shedding the skin: it first has to stuff itself in order to gain a larger size, then starve itself in order to loosen it – that is the vulnerable time of the process: when the snakes’ eyes are blurred as the skin is loose.
It is the transition time but it has to be done.
Whether the transition is hard or not, whether the period of time that it takes for the change to take place is long or short, whether we are in pain or we hardly notice the process… it is always the person that persists who completes the lesson and shifts to the next level.
We learn to deal with the process of transmutation the more we pay attention to it.
Different people have different rhythms and speeds. We need to be patient: our turn will come, generally when we least expect it. We also need to recognise that every step, no matter how painful may be, is another step towards freedom.
I hope you will enjoy the program as much as I did when I wrote it, and I wish for you to find and develop your Hidden Gift!

courses.description:
Welcome to Mastering Your Mind: A Guide to Schema Therapy.
This course is an invitation to embark on a powerful journey of self-discovery and emotional healing through the lens of Schema Therapy. Designed to help you uncover and transform the deeply rooted patterns that shape your thoughts, feelings, and behaviors, this experience offers a comprehensive and practical approach to personal growth.
Schema Therapy centers around the concept of early maladaptive schemas - core emotional themes and beliefs that are formed in childhood and reinforced throughout life. These schemas often influence how we see ourselves, relate to others, and respond to challenges. In this course, you’ll learn how to recognize these patterns and understand the ways they impact your daily experiences.
Guided by experienced Schema Therapy practitioners, you'll begin with a clear, accessible introduction to the foundational concepts: the formation of schemas, the coping mechanisms that maintain them, and the schema modes that drive your emotional responses. From there, we’ll delve deeper, using a blend of expert instruction, interactive exercises, and real-world examples to bring the material to life.
You’ll develop practical tools for identifying and challenging your own schemas, with strategies for shifting out of limiting behaviors and into more adaptive, empowered ways of living. Whether you grapple with abandonment, mistrust, unrelenting standards, or self-sacrifice, this course will equip you with actionable techniques for healing and growth.
Beyond personal insight, we’ll also explore how Schema Therapy enhances your relationships, supports boundary-setting, and improves communication. You'll learn how to foster healthier dynamics with others while building a stronger, more compassionate relationship with yourself.
By the end of this course, you’ll not only understand the inner workings of your mind more deeply, you’ll also be prepared to make meaningful changes that lead to greater fulfillment, clarity, and emotional resilience.
target_audience: All levels

IS LACK OF CONFIDENCE AFFECTING YOUR LIFE AND CAREER?

courses.title: Everything a student pilot needs to know about flying.
courses.bio: Online flight school. Online flying instruction.

Learn to fly fixed wing or helicopters in under 10 hours average.
No medical needed or vast quantities of hard cash.

Introduction: Inherent design fault in tail wheel aircraft.
Flaps ballooning and sinking. ADF NDB.
Cessna 172 tracking to and from a VOR
Once you have your pilots license what do you want to do next?

requirements: No experience necessary.
courses.description:
Chief Flying instructor.
Baron flying club.


If you are stuck on anything please feel free to ask questions.
So you want to learn to fly?
Why not it is Great fun.
My style is not for everyone but here it is.
Flying can be very very expensive, Helicopters are double expensive, but now there is no need to let that stand in your way.
The future for flying training is CGI and VR headsets with controllers. The air forces around the world are already doing this in their pilot training as is saves a fortune. So whatever type of flying you want to do this is an inexpensive way to go.
Today the flight sim on your own computer with a VR headset is almost like the real thing. (Yes it is!) I am a real pilot and done plenty of both. I love flying in VR because it is FREE. Loads of cool aircraft to fly too as FREE downloads. You can easily build hundreds of flying hours experience for FREE.
If you want to be a commercial pilot there is no option but to spend heaps of cash, join the military or land yourself a scholarship with a big airline. But in the meantime you can learn with me on your own PC almost for free. My courses are an excellent introduction to being a pilot.
You will need a joystick and controllers too and a flight sim programme. I use X Plane 11 and microsoft flight sim. VR headset is highly recommended but not essential.
Don't waste cash at the local flying school just yet. I am a Multi engine pilot and skydiver, I qualified as a pilot in 1996. I ran my own flying school "The Baron Flying Club" at Shoreham airport in East Sussex, where students were trained to PPL and multi engine PPL standard CAA UK.
Today I teach private students only.
I love doing low flying and aerobatics but I want to bring my online training to everyone, students, people who simply cannot afford it, or do not have the medical requirements because lots of people do fly just for fun and are not actually interested in going commercial. Sim flying is actually better than the real thing in many respects mainly the cost.
Using pc and mac based flight simulators we can go through every aspect of flight school without the crippling cost in easy stages and make it fun. Flight sims are not held up by the weather either as real aircraft often are, the realism levels are awesome. I enjoy flying the flight sim every day, We really can go anywhere in the world to fly.
Do it in your own time as much or as little at a time as you like, At the end of my courses you will know if you have the ability, desire or need to actually lash out thousands and thousands of your own cash to fly the real thing.
The drones are the future certainly for combat aviation. They will be controlled by someone on a computer sitting in a room on the other side of the world.
VR headsets are really very good for flying and I highly recommend them. In my opinion it really is worth investing in a good joystick, throttles and rudder pedals, even second hand ones from ebay can be found at a good price.




Blue skies!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn to be a pilot and fly whatever kind of aircraft the want to.

courses.description:
Encouraging Lifelong Learning with Technology


Beyond the immediate academic benefits, using technology into question and answer studies and testing instills in pupils a desire to learn for the rest of their lives. Students develop adaptability, ingenuity, and curiosity by using digital tools and creative learning platforms, all of which are necessary for ongoing personal and professional development. This proactive approach to learning prepares students to be nimble problem solvers and lifelong learners, ready to flourish in an ever-changing world.


Finally, the intentional use of technology in question and answer research and testing has far-reaching consequences for student engagement, skill development, ethical considerations, and the promotion of a lifelong learning attitude. As educators negotiate the changing educational landscape, the deliberate and intentional use of technology will continue to construct a dynamic, inclusive, and future-ready learning environment for all students.


Extending the Boundaries of Learning with Immersive Experiences


Immersive experiences have enormous potential in technology-integrated question and answer research and testing. Emerging technologies like artificial intelligence and virtual reality provide revolutionary potential for students to interact with complex information in a fully experiential way. Students can immerse themselves in virtual settings and simulations to investigate theoretical topics and real-world problems with unparalleled depth and detail.


These immersive experiences not only pique students' interest and curiosity, but also promote a visceral grasp of the subject. Whether conducting virtual experiments in science or navigating historical events through interactive simulations, these immersive experiences push the boundaries of traditional learning, allowing students to gain insights and knowledge that traditional teaching methodologies cannot provide.


Using such immersive technologies in question and answer studies and testing not only improves students' learning, but also instills a sense of wonder and interest, kindling their inherent urge to learn more about the subject matter.


Fostering Creativity and Innovation with Technology-Integrated Learning.


In addition to obtaining academic knowledge, technology-integrated question and answer sessions and testing platforms promote creativity and innovation. Students can use digital tools and collaborative platforms to engage in open-ended problem-solving, brainstorming, and ideation processes that are similar to real-world innovation techniques.


Furthermore, the interactive and dynamic character of technology-integrated learning encourages students to take chances, experiment with ideas, and adopt an attitude of continual development. This not only fosters their creativity but also instills an inventive mentality, which is critical for meeting the problems of the twenty-first century.


By seamlessly incorporating technology into the learning process, educators can nurture a generation of forward-thinking problem solvers capable of tackling complicated situations with inventiveness and originality.


Enabling Personalized Learning Journeys with Data-Driven Insights


The use of technology in question and answer studies and testing offers a wealth of data that may be used to tailor and maximize each student's learning experience. Educators can learn a lot about students' learning styles and preferences by evaluating trends in their responses, engagement levels, and areas of difficulties.


These data-driven insights enable instructors to personalize instructional materials, interventions, and support mechanisms to each student's individual requirements. Personalized learning journeys can be designed to provide additional resources for further research or focused support in difficult areas, ensuring that every student has relevant and impactful learning experiences.


Furthermore, the use of data-driven insights enables educators to uncover systemic trends and areas for curriculum refinement, resulting in ongoing improvement of the overall educational experience.


Finally, incorporating technology into question and answer studies and testing not only improves academic performance but also acts as a catalyst for nurturing creativity, enabling personalized learning journeys, and pushing the boundaries of traditional learning through immersive experiences. As educators embrace the possibilities of emerging technologies, the educational environment is set for substantial transformation, helping students to succeed in an ever-changing and interconnected world.

courses.title: Personality Disorders: Types and Treatments
courses.bio: Ten Personality Disorders and Effective Therapies
objectives: Identify and distinguish the TEN different Personality Disorders defined in the DSM-5.
Understand the best treatment methods for overcoming these Personality Disorders.
Work through examples and quizzes to test your knowledge of the PDs and specific therapies
Review key concepts regarding PDs involving symptoms, definitions and demographics.

Revisions to the DSM-5-TR 2022: 2 - Additions: Prolonged Grief and Unspecified Mood Disorders

requirements: An interest in understanding what certain rigid personalities look like and the psychotherapies that can change those patterns.
courses.description:
Understand what a Personality Disorder (PD) actually consists of and the ten specific types of them (identified by the DSM-5 TR). Such PD issues are rigid and last a long time. They impact on most of one's inner experience and observed behaviors on a frequent basis. They are notable by others because of the deviation from a given cultural pattern. An untreated PD can lead to significant distress and impairment.
They consist of the Odd ones: paranoid, schizoid, and the schizotypal. The Dramatic ones: antisocial, borderline, histrionic and narcissistic. And the Anxious ones: avoidant, dependent and obsessive compulsive patterns. Each of these Personality Disorders is distinct but one person can struggle with a few of them simultaneously.
In addition, gain insights into the four areas of functioning that are impacted by the Personality Disorders. Most clients with a PD can be affected in two or more of the following areas. The areas involve the way someone thinks (cognitive), the way they experience emotions (feelings), their interpersonal relationships at work, home or with social networks (friendships, productivity and significant others), and finally their capacity to control impulsive thoughts or actions.
Learn proven strategies for changing these very rigid personality patterns. The typical therapies involve using specific Cognitive-Behavioral, Biological and Psychodynamic or related techniques. Apply what you've learned to actual case studies toward the end of the course. Develop insights about the key challenges involved with recovering from any of the ten personality disorders that are covered during the class.
target_audience: Anyone with an interest in personalities, psychotherapy and problem behavior

courses.description: Do you feel strange and weird in some situations? Maybe some circumstances make you feel uncomfortable? Are you taking the same route to school or your work, preparing and eating the same meals, meeting the same people, no new hobbies, no new friends in your life? No changes in personal or professional life? There could be many reasons for these feelings and results, however, there is a prominent one that we will take care of in this course. Neophobia. Also known as fear of novelty. Often people who have a mild level of Neophobia also have other weak sides like feeling uncomfortable in public or getting rejected by someone. By practicing Neophobia from different perspectives: Solo Constellation (being alone with yourself), Public Constellation (being in public but without interaction), Inner Circle (inner boost), and Fear of Rejection we step by step, starting with very easy and doable exercises will steadily, bit by bit obtain:  1. confidence  2. self-esteem  3. decrease our fears  4. we will get interesting to ourselves and our surrounding.  5. we will get into many adventures and collect many many stories from these various experiences. Lastly, the whole course is built in a clear, simple, and fun way. Enjoy! : )
