courses.description:
In recent years, the notion of authenticity has been clouded by its overuse in social marketing, social media platforms, and within style magazines, leading to a widespread misunderstanding of its true essence. Authenticity is not just a label but a quality that signifies genuineness and sincerity. It’s about living with integrity, conviction and confidence.
If you're seeking to cultivate authentic confidence that lasts, this enlightening journey into the heart of your true identity will lead you to make peace with who you truly are, accept who you're not, making peace with your shortcomings and shed the limiting self-beliefs that breed self-doubt. If there is one subject that deserves a place in every school curriculum, it's this!
Many outlets offer quick-fix techniques and anecdotal solutions, suggesting that confidence can be gained instantly. However, this is not true. If you're seeking easy answers and assume confidence is something that can be learned, be advised that it won't work that way. The ONLY way to develop true confidence is by committing to the process of being who you truly are.
This training draws from a range of psychological and philosophical models to guide you on an enlightening journey of self-discovery. By shedding everything false, inauthentic, or superficial, you will uncover your true self. Ultimately, this course aims to help you become secure in who you are and develop lasting confidence and authentic self-esteem that radiates from within.


Some of the key concepts covered in this course include:
-  How to define your identity in a way that allows flexibility to grow & mature
-  The genuine meaning of authenticity and its role in developing confidence
-  The fluid nature of your personality, and your ability to improve it each day
-  The impact of societal expectations and trends on our sense of self-worth
-  The role that character traits and integrity play in developing a true identity
-  Uncovering and accepting your capacity for growth and self-development
-  Identifying and overcoming limiting beliefs that hinder authentic confidence
-  The relationship between self-knowledge, identity, self-worth, & self-esteem
-  The cost of superficiality, apathy, fakeness and inauthenticity in relationships
-  Embracing humility as a strength and cultivating authenticity in relationships


By guiding you through a journey of self-discovery and acceptance, this training will provide practical insights for becoming more of who you are, less of who you aren't, and start generating genuine confidence from within. You'll learn how to embrace your flaws, own your strengths, set boundaries, communicate assertively and navigate social interactions with ease.
This course blends timeless insights with real-world examples to reveal the thought patterns that can hinder people for a lifetime. The insights will be applicable to the daily challenges you face, helping you develop deep self-knowledge and ability to build strong, meaningful interpersonal relationships—an key factor that significantly affects everyone's quality of life.
Our training materials are captured in HD video, accompanied by an MP3 version of the course, and supplemented with PDF resources to enhance your learning experience. The course is available on-demand, providing a comprehensive framework to contextualize your studies and establish a strong foundation for sharing your newfound life-knowledge with others.
After completing this course, you will have gained the tools to embrace your authentic identity confidently. You will be better equipped to navigate life's challenges with a strong sense of self-worth and genuine confidence. Whether you're looking to improve your personal or professional relationships, or simply want to feel more confident in yourself, this course is for you.
ⓘ This training is part of a broader 28-course Achology curriculum. It comes with a full 30-day money back guarantee, so if you're not satisfied, you can get a refund with no questions asked.

courses.description:
Have you felt lost in your relationship with food? Obsessed about changing your body? Preoccupied by food noise and negative self-talk?
Whether you've been a chronic dieter, or you've put your life on hold in many ways because you have attached yourself to an image or appearance ideal that is your measure of success, then this journey is for you.
We live in a society where we are constantly bombarded by messages about how we should look, what we should weigh, what we should or should not eat, what we should or should not wear, how we should or should not exercise. Is it a surprise that we may be living in accordance with other people’s rules, adopting other people’s goals, and measuring our worth by other people’s metrics? It's time to advocate for ourselves differently, compassionately, and fiercely.
In this course we will work together to understand how we have internalized so many beliefs about our bodies and food, and how those beliefs affect us on a daily basis.
If you are used to avoiding certain people or activities in your life, thinking "once I lose the weight, I'll...," and want a more flexible, free, functional relationship with yourself, your body, and food, you've come to the right place.
The course is divided into four sections, each focusing on an important skill that will move the needle as you aim for better body image and a more intuitive relationship with food.
In each section, you will learn specific practices and strategies for developing a relationship with your body and food that is respectful, gentle, compassionate, and gritty so you can start living in alignment with YOUR values versus those that so many of us have unconsciously adopted.
You don't have to LOVE your body to heal your relationship with food actually! The skills you will learn in this course will help you to feel more confident overall, reconnect with what really matters in your life, and help you reclaim your mental and emotional health.
target_audience: You feel out of control or exhausted from chronic dieting and the beliefs that you need to change yourself to fit in.
Even if you have not chosen to diet, you put your life on hold in many ways because you have attached yourself to an image ideal that is your measure of success.
You want to learn how to have a more functional and flexible relationship with food and your body.
You speak very unkindly to yourself and want to change your self-talk.
If you have taken other courses with Dr. Kori, you will find this one remarkably helpful to you as well.

courses.description:
INTERNATIONALLY CERTIFIED & ACCREDITED
Conquering Self-Doubt & The Lizard Brain| ACCREDITED
___________________________
Hello Beautiful Students,
Take a journey into understanding not only the psychology, but the biology and instinct responses we blame ourselves for, while learning to redirect your energy toward the life and success you deserve.
Many don't realize that the reactions we sometimes have are genetic dispositions from a time when we needed protections from things we no longer deal with in our modern society. When we don't understand our human biological responses, we blame ourselves for certain behaviors we cannot help. This type of self-shaming becomes dangerous because we begin down a slippery slope of believing we are not capable of things, when in reality, simply understanding our reaction to things allows us to see the process and then change them. What you will learn in this course is not just how the brain works, but how to accept what you can learn about it and build it into how you respond when it happens with the same level of commitment you have to the process of giving up or believing you are less than.
Our psychology is complicated and my goal in this course is to assist highly qualified people to achieve all sort of goals, to understand their psychology and biology in how they respond and react to things and begin concrete steps to redirect their energy and thought processes to overcome the natural reactions that come up for everyone. If each student can understand this process so that they spend minimal time caught up in the blaming and shaming in their experiences on the journey to success, they can spend more time in the pursuit of their own happiness.
This mini advanced Master class is a scholar level of learning focused in on one major topic and unpacking it thoroughly.
In this course:
1. How to Understand Self-Doubt & Self-Love
2. How Do We Become Confident?
3. How Can We Enjoy a Measure of Success?
4. We Should Be Confident! So Why Aren't We?
5. 6-Steps to Confidence
6. Fear of Dealing with Haters (includes a discussion on vulnerability)
7. Action Steps to Self-Love
8. Building a Reality| Closing Statement
9. PDF Workbook with Self-Evaluation Questions
10. Special POBA Certificate as a Certified Self-Confidence & Empowerment Practitioner
I hope you enjoy this course lovelies. See You Scholars in the Master Scholar Class!
Love & Light, Sufi

courses.description:
14 Day Hypnosis Weight Loss Progam
Are you ready to embark on a transformative journey towards lasting weight loss and well-being? Welcome to our 14-Day Hypnosis Weight Loss Program, a holistic approach that combines the power of hypnosis with the science of mind-body connection. We are so confident in the effectiveness of this program that we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you do not experience results.
Why Hypnosis Works:
Our program begins by addressing a common misconception - hypnosis does not work for those who do not want it to work. It's essential to have a genuine desire for change and an open mind. Once you embrace this mindset, you're ready to tap into the incredible potential of your subconscious mind.
Mind-Body Connection:
During the first days of the program, you'll delve into the profound link between your mind and body. Understanding how your thoughts and emotions influence your physical well-being is a crucial step in achieving sustainable weight loss.
Harnessing the Power of Imagination:
You'll be guided through a series of mind-body exercises that demonstrate the extraordinary power of your imagination. These exercises will reveal how your thoughts and mental imagery can directly impact your body's responses, laying the foundation for the transformative hypnosis sessions to come.
What to Expect in the Program:
Over the course of 14 days, you'll experience daily hypnosis sessions that are carefully designed to:
Boost Motivation: Ignite your inner drive to make healthy choices and lose weight.
Curbing Cravings: Learn to resist unhealthy temptations and make mindful eating choices.
Emotional Resilience: Strengthen your emotional resilience, empowering you to overcome emotional eating.
Positive Body Image: Cultivate self-love and acceptance, fostering a healthier relationship with your body.
Lifestyle Transformation: Establish lasting habits for a healthier, more balanced life.
Our program is a comprehensive approach to weight loss that addresses the mental, emotional, and physical aspects of your well-being. With our 30-day money-back guarantee, you have nothing to lose except unwanted weight and self-limiting beliefs.
Transform your mind, transform your body, and embrace a healthier, happier you. Join our 14-Day Hypnosis Weight Loss Program and experience the incredible results for yourself. Your journey to lasting weight loss and well-being starts here.

Unlock the Human Advantage in the Age of AI
In a world racing toward automation, the most powerful skill you can develop… is the one machines can’t replicate.


AI is reshaping industries, fast. But no matter how advanced the technology gets, one truth remains:


It’s humans who lead. It’s humans who connect. It’s humans who create lasting impact.


And the edge that separates those who thrive from those who stall?


Human Skills.


According to the World Economic Forum, soft skills like leadership, communication, adaptability, and emotional intelligence now rank in the top 5 most in-demand professional skills globally — yet they’re still rarely taught in traditional systems.


Why This Course Is Different
This isn’t a surface-level self-help course.


Lead Within Academy is a global human skills program built on neuroscience, real-world psychology, and decades of lived experience mentoring people across 6+ countries.


We don’t just give you tools — we help you become the kind of person who leads from within.


Inside, you’ll unlock:


A complete roadmap to build unshakable confidence, emotional intelligence, resilience & leadership

Built for the Real World
Whether you’re 16 or 60 — a student, a professional, or simply ready to reset — this course meets you where you are and helps you rise.


You’ll learn how to:


→ Communicate with clarity and lead with purpose
→ Rebuild your self-worth and confidence from the inside out
→ Manage pressure, handle setbacks, and make smarter decisions
→ Build long-term momentum in your life, career, and mindset


This is the skillset employers want, relationships need, and future leaders are built on.


The Bottom Line
Technical skills get you in the room.
Human skills move you forward.


This course isn’t just about growth. It’s about transformation.


You’ll walk away with a new mindset, a new level of clarity — and a new standard for how you live, lead, and show up in the world.


Join the thousands already transforming their lives.


Welcome to Lead Within Academy — where the next generation of leaders begins within.

courses.description:
This course uses traditional Native American teachings that will show you how to stand up for yourself. You’ll be able to recognize when you are being manipulated by others and put a stop to it gracefully.
Take Control Of Your Life In The Traditional Native American Way
· Understand the Circle of Foxes
· Begin the Dance of the Coyotes
· Rewrite the Story of Your Life
· Discover your choices with the wheel of Attitudes & Approaches
· Gain a deeper understanding of all medicine wheels with the Wheel of Life
Live the life you planned before you were born without shame.
Native American tradition says we planned our life before we were born. This is our Sacred Dream or our Children’s Fire. Denying this dream goes against The Creator. Armed with the tools in this course, you’ll be able to confidently walk your path undeterred by toxic people and make yourself a priority.
The Circle of Foxes medicine wheel shows us what it looks like to live our life for the approval of others in all eight directions. The Dance of the Coyote shows us the opposite. The Story of Your Life shows you exactly how you are in control. The Wheel of Attitudes and Approaches introduces us to solutions we may never have considered. The Wheel of Life is the key to all medicine wheels and shows us exactly what each direction stands for to gain a deeper understanding.
You’ll learn to recognize people who are highly influenced by the opinions of others and why this can be problematic. Many of us don’t even realize how others have impacted our behavior until we see on the medicine wheel. Living our life for others can be disguised as independence.
Having control over our inner dialog is the first step and you’ll learn how to recognize words that simply feed on your fears and silence them.
When we know what we truly want out of life, our Sacred Dream, our spirit is re-energized and our life has purpose.
target_audience: Sometimes we are raised to conform to fit in that we may not even recognize when we are sacrificing our self to make others happy.  This course is also for people who have a hard time saying "No." As people pleasers, we want others to be happy and like us, but this may mean we sacrifice our own dreams and self-esteem.

Master First Impressions in 21 Days: Transform Your Life with Lasting Impact


Did you know that studies suggest it takes only seven seconds to form a first impression? And in just 21 days, you can transform how the world perceives you.

courses.description:
Do you ever feel like your confidence vanishes the moment you need it most? Or that self-doubt speaks louder than your strengths?
This course gives you the framework, tools, and daily practices to change that. Using the proven psychology of Rational Emotive Behavior Therapy (REBT), you’ll learn how to spot hidden limiting beliefs, challenge unhelpful thought patterns, and rebuild confidence that lasts.
Instead of surface-level “feel good” advice, you’ll gain a step-by-step system to:
Recognize and release limiting beliefs that quietly undermine confidence
Apply REBT methods to reframe thoughts and change your mindset
Build a personal library of coping statements, mantras, and affirmations
Use mindfulness, guided imagery, and bias-busting tools to stay resilient
Anchor confidence in joy, self-care, and full self-acceptance
By the end of this course, you won’t just “know” about confidence—you’ll have practical tools you can use every day to speak up, trust yourself, and move forward without hesitation.
Outcomes You’ll Achieve
Break free from limiting beliefs holding you back
Apply REBT tools to rewire thoughts and behaviors
Build unshakable confidence in decisions, communication, and presence
Practice self-acceptance without guilt or self-criticism
Anchor confidence with daily rituals and resilience habits
This isn’t theory—it’s transformation. Enroll today, and step into the version of yourself who acts with confidence, speaks with clarity, and lives without apology.

courses.description:
This Udemy course, AI Self-Coaching Tools for Confidence by Elena Osokina, is a one-of-a-kind program designed to give you practical, daily strategies for building unshakable confidence. Unlike generic self-help content, this course empowers you with hands-on AI tools, reflective practices, and self-coaching techniques that you can immediately apply to your personal and professional life.
To make your learning even more powerful, you’ll get two exclusive downloadable resources:
Self-Coaching Session Assignment – a step-by-step guide to help you create personalized coaching sessions using AI.
AI Prompts Library for Confidence – over 20 ready-to-use prompts for real-life situations, from handling fear of judgment to boosting self-expression.
These resources ensure that your growth doesn’t stop with the videos—you’ll have practical tools you can return to again and again, making this course a truly transformative experience.
By the end of this program, you’ll have a clear, repeatable method for working through self-doubt, turning negative thoughts into useful insights, and building real confidence step by step. You’ll learn how to create personalized self-coaching dialogues using AI to:
Clarify what’s blocking you
Explore your emotional reactions
And generate constructive next steps for action
More importantly, you’ll develop the habit of checking in with yourself regularly, reflecting on your inner state, and taking responsibility for your growth. That’s where true confidence begins—when you stop waiting for someone else to tell you who you are or what to do.
Self-coaching is powerful because it makes you the expert on your life. But let’s be honest—it can be hard to ask yourself the right questions when you’re feeling overwhelmed or stuck in fear. That’s where AI comes in.
So remember this: you don’t need to wait years to become more confident. You don’t need to read dozens of books or take endless trainings. With the right questions, daily awareness, and support from AI, confidence can grow in real-time—starting today.
target_audience: Students and job seekers facing performance anxiety or impostor syndrome.

courses.description:
In six weeks, you will learn a lifetime skill. You can apply this 4-step framework of Discover, Define, Design, and Deliver to anything that life throws your way. Use it to pivot to a new job or career, discover an alternative to a hard decision, or simply build the confidence you need to keep moving forward.


Note: While you'll get access to the full course when you purchase, we recommend spending a week in each section. This will allow the learnings to sink in and cultivate the self-awareness and clarity that is at the heart of Life Experience Design.


Here's what you'll learn each week:


Week 1: Assess your current life
Identify exactly what your problem areas are and how to hone into what’s keeping you from your ideal life
Week 2: Discover your ideal life
Get clarity on your ideal life vision, including what’s already working for you that you might not realize
Week 3: Define your values and vision
Articulate exactly who you are and what you value in order to cut through indecisiveness and elevate your confidence in attracting your ideal life
Week 4: Design creative solutions for your ideal life
Strategize the most fulfilling ways for you to take steps towards your ideal life while honoring the responsibilities and obligations you have now
Week 5: Deliver an actionable game plan + your first step
Narrow down on an actionable plan and take your first step towards your ideal life by the end of this course.
Week 6: Reflect and wrap-up
Set yourself up for continued success by building in accountability, exit strategies, and opportunities to refine and pivot your plan. Because you will continuously be evolving as you attract more of what you want in life.
-----
Is LED right for you? It's for you if you want to:
Get clarity around what you want in life and why
Gain the confidence to take the leap
Create a clear path to achieve your goals
Feel good about your job and life, always
If any of these is a resounding yes, then this program is for you!
-----
What participants from past Life Experience Design programs are saying:
“I love how you both share your personal and professional examples related to the process. It makes the problems relatable and the process attainable. I have been learning so much from your framework!” — Ayesha S.
“The framework I learned from the life experience design workshop helped me hash out some measurable and objective short-term goals rather than always focusing on the long-term ones and feeling like I wasn't accomplishing anything. Breaking things down into actionable items was one of the best takeaways I took from this exercise.” — Taylor Z.
"Having a laid out framework was very helpful and made sense to follow along with you. Using it as a talking point and for discussion, activities were very effective.” — Jaimie C., Design Your Life Experience: VIP Program client
-----
What you’ll get:
Several hours of lectures to bring you clarity, insights, and inspiration to help you align your current life to your ideal life ($899 value)
18 digital worksheets ($99 value)
Lifetime access to digital content ($899 value)
Private alumni community with direct access to Lia and Hannah ($499 value)
-----
Meet the founders & your facilitators, Lia and Hannah!
Lia Fetterhoff has over 12 years of crafting award-winning mobile and web experiences at SkySlope, Loanpal, Google, Nest, TIBCO, Attik, and consulting for startups.
Hannah Chen has been designing innovative solutions for a wide range of products: Lyft's front light-up emblem, Google Assistant, Google Payment, Oracle HR software, and more. Design methodology typically applies to products and services, but Hannah believes ‘design thinking’ can also be used in daily life.
How they met: Lia and Hannah sat next to each other at Google and realized they both had a passion for using design thinking to live more intentionally, which led to collaborating on Life Experience Design.

The Inner Child Healing course is a transformative journey designed to help you reconnect with your inner child and heal emotional wounds from the past. Our inner child represents the essence of who we truly are at our core, carrying our deepest emotions, desires, and vulnerabilities. We can unlock profound healing, self-discovery, and personal growth by addressing and nurturing our inner child.
During this course, you will embark on a guided exploration of your inner child, facilitated by experienced and compassionate instructors. You will learn a variety of powerful techniques, tools, and practices to support your healing process and cultivate a loving and nurturing relationship with your inner child.
1. Understanding the inner child concept: Exploring its significance in personal development, and recognizing the impact of childhood experiences on our adult lives.
2. Uncovering Emotional Wounds: Identifying and acknowledging the emotional wounds carried by your inner child, including unresolved traumas, limiting beliefs, and patterns of behavior.
3. Forgiveness and Letting Go: Learning to let go, release emotional baggage, find your worth, and realign your heart to find a better balance in your life.
Throughout the course, you will have the opportunity to engage in self-reflection exercises, and guided healing practices you will have gained valuable insights, emotional resilience, and a deeper connection with your authentic self, empowering you to live a more fulfilling and joyful life.

objectives: 1. Make better daily choices by understanding how your brain works
2. Apply simple but powerful problem-solving tools to both personal and professional challenges
3. Master practical techniques to break free from mental blocks and generate creative solutions
4. Unlock the power of flexible thinking to make the best decisions in any situation
5. Navigate uncertainty to make better choices, not rushed mistakes
6. Build your personal toolkit of proven decision-making approaches
7. Transform from an uncertain decision-maker to a confident choice-maker

The Nuts and Bolts of Decision-Making: Whats Ahead on the Decision Advantage
IQ vs. EQ: Why Smarts Aren't the Answer
Tuning Your Brain for Smarter Decisions: Flexible Thinking: Bridging Fast and Slow
Activity: "Bias Detective: Your Social Media Feed"
The Power of Personal Values in Decision Making
Thriving Under Uncertainty: Flexible Thinking: Balancing Now and Later
The Ecosystem of Decision-Making: People: The Keys to Effective Interpersonal Decisions
Using Data to Make Unbiased Decisions

requirements: 1.	Suitable for both beginners and experienced professionals looking to enhance their decision-making skills
2.	No special academic background needed - just bring your curiosity about decision-making and willingness to learn
3.	An open mind and willingness to examine your current decision-making patterns
4.	Interest in understanding how your mind works and motivation to improve
5.	Commitment to practicing the techniques
6.	Access to a notebook (digital or paper) to complete practical exercises and reflection activities
courses.description:
Do you often feel overwhelmed by constant decision-making? Or worried that one wrong choice could derail your success? You're not alone. In today's fast-paced world, the pressure to make the right decisions can be paralyzing. But what if you could transform that pressure into confidence?
The “Decision Advantage” isn't just another theoretical course about decision-making – it's your practical guide to understanding how your brain actually makes choices and how to make it work better for you.
What makes this course different?
In this course, we dive into the fascinating world of how your brain really makes decisions, combining neuroscience with real-world applications. No complex theories – just practical tips and techniques you can use immediately to make better choices, from daily decisions to life-changing ones.
In "The Decision Advantage," you'll discover how to:
Turn uncertainty  in decision making into a strength
Develop the mental agility to adapt when circumstances change.
Break free from decision paralysis and mental fatigue.
Build unshakeable confidence in your choices.
Master the art of swift, smart decisions under pressure.
Become the go-to person others trust for crucial decisions.
Stress proof yourself and your choices.
This course isn't about finding "perfect" decisions – it's about making consistently better choices that move you forward with more clarity and confidence.
target_audience: 1.	Individuals facing important life decisions who want simple but powerful techniques to make better choices
2.	Professionals at any level who want to make effective decisions at work, especially when facing uncertainty or complex choices
3.	Team leaders and managers looking to improve their decision-making confidence and effectiveness
4.	Entrepreneurs and business owners who regularly make important decisions with limited information
5.	Career changers and job seekers wanting to strengthen their decision-making skills to advance professionally
6.	Students and young professionals preparing to take on more responsibility and wanting to develop solid decision-making foundations
7.	Anyone feeling stuck in their decision-making process or experiencing 'analysis paralysis'
8.	Self-improvement enthusiasts interested in understanding how their mind works and optimizing their choices

courses.description:
Are you ready to transform your dating life, boost your confidence, and build meaningful connections? Whether you’re new to dating, reentering the scene, or struggling with attraction, this course will guide you every step of the way. You’ll learn the art of approaching with confidence, creating engaging conversations, and building attraction both in person and online.
The course begins by laying a strong foundation, helping you adopt the right mindset, develop self-assurance, and overcome common dating challenges. You’ll then dive into the digital realm, mastering how to create a compelling profile, initiate conversations, and connect on popular dating platforms. Next, we’ll explore how to read body language, recognize signals of interest, and smoothly escalate interactions.
Beyond first impressions, you’ll learn how to deepen connections by building trust, fostering emotional intimacy, and keeping conversations engaging. We’ll also equip you with tools to handle rejection gracefully, ensuring you stay resilient throughout your dating journey.
By the end of this course, you’ll have all the knowledge and practical skills needed to confidently navigate modern dating and achieve your relationship goals—whether you’re looking for casual encounters or something more meaningful. Get ready to unlock the secrets to dating success and become the best version of yourself!
target_audience: Men New to Dating – Those looking to build confidence and improve their social and dating skills from the ground up.
Men Reentering the Dating Scene – Recently single individuals who want to navigate modern dating successfully.
Men Struggling with Attraction – Anyone seeking to understand the psychology of attraction and how to make meaningful connections.
Men Interested in Casual Relationships – Those who want to learn how to approach, attract, and connect casually with women.
Men Looking to Improve Communication – Individuals who want to enhance their conversation skills and become more engaging.

Someone suffering from social anxiety feels intensely worried about socialising and interacting with others, either in particular social situations or all social situations. They may feel a mixture of fear, apprehension, and panic about being rejected, misunderstood, embarrassed, or perceived negatively during social interactions.


Does this sound like you?


I feel dread or fear when I’m around people
I constantly scan my surroundings to check if people approve of me
I feel anxious about how I appear to other people in social situations
I find reasons and make excuses to not join gatherings with friends and family because I feel stressed and nervous about them
I get sweaty, nervous, dizzy, feel faint, or feel my heart pounding when I’m in a social situation


Now Imagine yourself....


Being able to attend events and parties and enjoy being there
Comfortably expressing your thoughts and opinions without any worry of judgement or disapproval
Reaching new heights in your career and personal relationships
Feeling relaxed and confident when attending interviews, meetings, and social gatherings
Enjoying every moment with your family, friends, and colleagues with no fear or anxiety impacting you


In this course you will learn every tool and technique you need in order to get there - taught by a Master Psychotherapist that will take you step-by-step through the process.

courses.title: Dealing With Criticism: The Assertive Way
courses.bio: Communication Skills and Assertiveness Strategy. Emotional Intelligence. Social Skills. Self-confidence and Self-esteem.
objectives: Use assertiveness techniques to deal with criticism in personal and professional communication contexts.
Know how to prepare your mind to assertively receive criticism.
Analyze the critical messages from an assertive perspective.
Formulate assertive responses to criticism.
Identify the main roles of criticism.
Discriminate between passive, aggressive and assertive reactions to criticism.

EXTENDED CONTENT: AI Scenario 3: The Family Dinner Criticism

requirements: A mind that welcomes change.
courses.description:
Learn how to transform criticism into opportunity and protect your self-confidence and self-esteem levels.
Manage Criticism Effectively through this Assertive Communication Strategy.
Learn how to think about criticism in a way that protects your self-esteem and confidence levels and that allows you to regulate your emotional responses better
Learn how to analyze critical messages and discover their growth potential
Silence the critical noise and focus on the goals that truly matter to you
Respond to criticism efficiently and enjoy healthier relationships
Unlock the mindset that allows you to live a more authentic, independent and satisfying life.
Largely accepted as the most efficient mindset and communication style, Assertiveness provides the best guidelines we know for dealing with most personal and professional contexts. Management of criticism makes no exception.
The 3-Stage Assertive Strategy exclusively presented in this course addresses the entire process, from thoughts to emotions to behaviors, and aims at providing a framework in which the individual thrives and transforms negative feedback into a powerful self-development tool.
Content and Overview
This course is suitable for anyone who would like to learn how to efficiently deal with Criticism, protect their self-confidence and self-esteem levels and discover the growth potential hidden in negative feedback.
Drawing on the multi-dimensional character of Assertiveness, the course addresses the activation of the assertive traits on three main levels: cognitive, emotional and behavioral, thus creating an extended framework for understanding, analyzing and responding to criticism.
The course is divided in two parts: An introductory, theoretical segment, in which we will take a close look at what criticism is, what personal and social roles does it hold in our lives, the forms in which it gets delivered to us and what efficient and inefficient reactions to criticism look like. The second part is a more practical one and it is where you will discover, step-by-step, The Assertive Strategy For Dealing With Criticism.
The Assertive Strategy For Dealing With Criticism includes three Stages -
The Attitude toward Criticism, Analyzing The Critical Message and Responding to Criticism, each of them comprising more steps to help create and activate the cognitive, emotional or behavioral traits that generate the most efficient responses to negative feedback.
Three specific Assertive Communication Techniques for dealing with justified and unjustified criticism are provided at the end of the course.
Then you will be ready to start implementing the Assertive Strategy, focus on the meaningful, silence the useless critical noise and activate your resources to create the life you want.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn how to deal with Criticism in a way that does not erode Self-confidence and Self-esteem.

courses.description:
In this course you will learn how to transform the relationship you have with yourself and the way you connect with others, thereby creating a far more confident and happier life for yourself.
I have over 10 years’ experience as a practicing Life Coach, specializing in the field of confidence and the effect this has on our everyday lives. I spent more than 20 years in the corporate field and what I observed during this time led me on this journey. It became clear that those with confidence seemed to rise above challenges not only in their careers, but in other areas of their lives too.
Over the last 10 years I have observed the powerful impact this work has had on my clients. This has inspired me to design this course in a digital format, to make it more available to a much wider audience.
Our life is a product of how we think and feel, especially about ourselves. In order to bring about change, we need to change our behaviors. The most likely way for this to happen is to change how we think and feel about ourselves. My experience with my clients is that this work often brings about an entire paradigm shift not only in the way they see themselves, but also the way they see others.
By the end of this course you will have learnt how to have a more loving and respectful relationship with yourself, which will positively affect how you interact with others. This will cause you to then respond differently to everyday situations and challenges, thereby resulting in a happier and more meaningful life.
Change and growth takes place when we have awareness and understanding of the dynamics playing out in our life, and when we have the tools to change these dynamics, in order to bring about a different and more effective result.
This course will focus firstly on helping you to gain a greater understanding of these dynamics, and then on a day by day basis teaching you the skills you require in order to interact differently with not only yourself, but also with others, thereby bringing about significant change.
The ideal student for this course is anyone that is looking at their life and is thinking “this is not quite working out” in terms of what I had in mind, or what I had planned. Anyone that has identified that there may be another way of doing things that may be more effective and may bring about better results will be a suitable candidate for this course. This type of thinking is essential because without it you are less likely to be willing to do the work required to bring about the desired growth and changes in your life.
I am so confident about this course, it is backed up with a 30 day, 100% money-back guarantee.
target_audience: Anyone of any age that may have identified that there may be another way that may produce a different result and may be more effective

courses.title: Gıda Hijyeni Soru Bankası
courses.bio: Gıda Hijyeni Test Bankası
courses.description:
The intersection of ethics, equity, and immersive learning.


As educators realize the transformative power of immersive technology, it is critical to evaluate the ethical and egalitarian implications of incorporating these experiences into question-and-answer sessions and tests. While immersive experiences provide unmatched depth and engagement, it is critical to ensure equal access to these technologies for all student populations.


Educators must wrestle with the ethical implications of using immersive experiences, particularly in terms of protecting students' privacy and data security within virtual settings. Furthermore, equity needs deliberate initiatives to bridge the digital gap, ensuring that all students, regardless of background, have equitable access to these immersive learning experiences.


Promoting Inclusive and Diverse Perspectives through Immersive Learning


The incorporation of immersive experiences into question-and-answer sessions and testing presents an opportunity to promote inclusion by providing varied perspectives. Virtual reality simulations, for example, can transfer students to other historical eras, cultural contexts, and geographic locations, allowing them to study and comprehend multiple perspectives in a fully immersive environment.


Educators may use these tools to help children develop empathy, global awareness, and cultural competence, preparing them to navigate an increasingly interconnected and diverse world. Educators may foster a more inclusive and empathic generation capable of comprehending and responding to complex societal concerns by exposing pupils to a diverse variety of opinions through immersive experiences.


To summarize, the responsible use of immersive experiences into question and answer studies and testing has the potential to not only increase learning but also promote inclusivity, ethical considerations, and different perspectives. As educators continue to use technology as a tool for transformative learning, the ethical and equitable deployment of immersive experiences is critical to creating a truly meaningful educational environment.


Engaging Ethical Considerations in Immersive Learning.


The use of immersive experiences into question-and-answer sessions and tests necessitates a thorough ethical review. As students immerse themselves in virtual environments, educators must ensure that these technologies are used responsibly, taking into account considerations such as the portrayal of critical historical events, cultural authenticity, and the possible impact on students' mental and emotional health.


Furthermore, ethical considerations apply to the creation and sharing of material for immersive experiences, emphasizing the importance of accurately and respectfully portraying other cultures and perspectives. Educators and content developers must handle the issues of representation and historical accuracy while maintaining ethical standards and maximizing the instructional potential of immersive learning.


Improving Equity in Access to Immersive Technologies


Equity is a significant consideration when integrating immersive experiences into question-and-answer sessions and tests. While new technologies provide unparalleled educational opportunities, access gaps must be addressed so that all students have equal access to these immersive learning tools. This includes not just supplying the appropriate technology and software, but also taking into account elements like internet connectivity and technological support, especially for students from impoverished places.


Educators and politicians are tasked with breaking down access barriers and bridging the digital divide, with the goal of creating an inclusive educational landscape in which every student may benefit from the enriching potential of immersion experiences.
target_audience: These tests are suitable for everyone who is interested in this issue.

What do you think about your body? Do you dislike some parts of your body or have days when you feel self-doubt? Such feelings are natural from time to time but being obsessive with ourselves in the long term can result in serious concerns such as depression and eating disorders. Take your first step toward feeling happy with your body every day with this unique course. It begins by defining positive body image and its various aspects, including perceptual, affective, cognitive and behavioural body image. Then we will look into ways to improve your body respect, including practising gratitude, self-care and letting go of body comparison.
Next, the course emphasises the significance of body acceptance and introduces methods and activities to assist you in developing your body acceptance. Following that, you will explore the distinction between helpful and unhelpful assumptions. It includes the ways of identifying and altering the underlying appearance assumptions that triggered your body dissatisfaction. Subsequently, the course emphasises the significance of body acceptance and brings methods and activities to assist you in developing your body acceptance. You will examine the distinction between helpful and unhelpful assumptions and gain more reasonable and adaptable guidelines to use daily by identifying and then altering the underlying appearance assumptions that triggered your body dissatisfaction.

The course then will teach you to strengthen your relationship with your body through the body-aware approach. The course Transform Your Self Esteem is brought to you by Ro Johnston. Ro, is a life coach, social entrepreneur and author and she has formatted her hours of life coaching content on self esteem in to a self paced, practical course that includes tips and techniques to improve self esteem.

This course examines what self esteem is and what influences it.

What if you could trust yourself fully? Imagine making decisions effortlessly, guided by your inner wisdom. What if, in just 10 minutes a day, you could unlock the power of your intuition and transform how you navigate life?
Welcome to the 30-Day Intuition Course, where your inner knowing becomes your greatest asset. Whether you're at a crossroads, craving more clarity, or want to feel aligned in all aspects of your life, this course is designed to help you master your intuitive power—without overwhelming your schedule.
Why 10 Minutes a Day?
I get it—life is busy. That's why this course is simple, yet powerfully effective. In just 10 minutes a day, you'll learn practical tools to sharpen your intuition, reconnect with your inner self, and start making choices that feel right.
Your daily commitment is small. The results are life-changing.


WHAT’S INSIDE?


Daily Intuition Practices: Short, easy-to-follow exercises that guide you into deeper self-awareness and intuitive understanding.
Weekly Check-ins: Track your progress and celebrate your growth with reflection prompts to help you apply your intuition in real-world situations.
Audio & Video Lessons: Get inspired and learn on-the-go with quick, impactful lessons that fit into any lifestyle.
Guided Meditations: Calm your mind and tap into your inner guidance with soothing, intention-setting practices.


WHY INTUITION IS IMPORTANT


Enhance Decision-Making: Intuition allows for quick, accurate decisions, especially in complex or uncertain situations.
Boost Creativity: Intuitive thinking can spark innovative ideas and solutions that logic alone might miss.
Improve Relationships: Understanding and empathizing with others on a deeper level leads to more meaningful connections.
Personal Growth: Cultivating intuition fosters self-awareness, confidence, and a stronger sense of inner peace.
Professional Success: Intuitive insights can guide you towards career opportunities and leadership excellence.


I spent too many years entrusting others to know what was best for me, only to become angry and resentful. Once I was ready to take full ownership of my life, I was able to repair my relationship with my intuition and start to find more fulfillment in my decisions.
How to be a VIP: A Very Intuitive Person was created from many years of practice, witnessing clients, and educating myself more on the perks of fine-tuning our gut instincts. This course is a compilation of techniques and answers to frequently asked questions about trusting your inner wisdom.

courses.description:
If you ask someone, “What does it mean to be courageous?” they might reference a superhero movie, thinking it’s about saving someone from a burning building, jumping in front of a car, or disarming a shooter. While these are acts of courage, we also need courage for everyday challenges—like walking away from conflict, pursuing our dreams, or talking to a stranger. Courage helps us choose the right emotion in tough situations and do what’s right. It’s a tool we all have, but not everyone knows how to use it. This course will help students unlock their superpower: courage. Cornelius offers practical tools to help them become more courageous in their lives.


Cornelius is one of today’s most dynamic youth motivational speakers. Growing up on Chicago’s South Side, he faced violence and crime from a young age. Many of his friends ended up incarcerated or lost their lives, leaving him to wonder how things might have been different if they had learned to manage their emotions and become leaders. Despite these challenges, Cornelius earned both his bachelor’s and master’s degrees. He founded Super-Self Institute, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit that helps youth become super leaders, authored nine youth development books, and has been a youth counselor for the past 10 years. Through his transparent motivational speaking, Cornelius shares his journey of overcoming adversity to achieve his goals, helping students believe that anything is possible if they are willing to work for it. His ability to connect with any audience is exceptional, inspiring students to unleash their true power and become today’s super leaders.
target_audience: Youth and Adults who lack courage.
Youth and Adults who are super shy.
Youth and Adults who have trouble making decisions.
Youth and Adults who wants to increase their leadership power.
Youth and Adults who are unsure of themselves.
Youth and Adults who are self conscious.

As someone who has encountered the complexities of dealing with narcissistic bosses in both my personal and professional life, I understand the importance of equipping oneself with the right strategies to thrive in such challenging environments. In this course, I will personally guide you through a journey that encompasses a range of objectives designed to help you effectively navigate the world of narcissistic bosses.
First and foremost, we will delve into the crucial skill of distinguishing between narcissistic behavior and a boss who genuinely holds you accountable for your work. It can often be challenging to discern whether your boss's actions stem from narcissism or genuine expectations, and I will share insights to help you make that distinction with confidence.
Day-to-day interactions with a narcissistic boss can be emotionally taxing. Drawing from my experiences, I will provide practical techniques to help you navigate your daily work life with poise and professionalism while minimizing conflict and stress. From handling criticism to managing difficult situations, you'll learn to maintain your composure and productivity.
Effective communication is at the heart of any successful professional relationship. I will share my own experiences and the strategies I've honed over time to communicate assertively and diplomatically with narcissistic bosses. You'll gain valuable insights into providing feedback, addressing issues, and fostering cooperation without provoking defensiveness.
Finally, self-care and building personal security are paramount when dealing with narcissistic bosses. I've personally witnessed the toll such environments can take on mental and emotional well-being. In this course, we will prioritize self-care strategies to help you maintain your equilibrium and happiness. Additionally, I'll share methods for building personal and professional security, allowing you to thrive despite the challenges presented by your boss's narcissism.
Join me on this journey to master the art of dealing with narcissistic bosses while fostering your personal growth and well-being. Together, we'll equip you with the knowledge and skills needed to not only survive but also excel in these challenging work environments.

courses.description:
Conquer and reverse compulsive behaviors that damage and undermine all your life's hard work by gaining more discipline and willpower.
Become more resilient to small daily failures, and gain mental fortitude that will make you stronger for the rest of your life.
SELF DISCIPLINE IS A TOPIC EXAMINED BY THE GREATEST THINKERS IN HISTORY
Great emperors of Rome, philosophers of ancient Greece, great military thinkers, and modern scientists have all wrestled with the question of how we can all improve our lives and the lives of people around us by becoming more disciplined and gaining more willpower.
Over many centuries, they have collectively come up with a number of ideas which I boil down for you in this course, so you don't have to read thousands of pages of textbooks.
USE MINDFULNESS TO GAIN WILLPOWER AND SELF DISCIPLINE
When you are more mindful about what you are currently doing, you will make better moment-to-moment decisions, and not give into compulsive behaviors. You can always takes few extra moments and rethink the decision you are about to act on, and reconsider whether your behaviors will aid or damage your overall effort.
The act of being mindful and imagining two possible outcomes is often enough to gain the willpower and self discipline you need to do the right thing.
DON'T LET SHORT-TERM, COMPULSIVE DECISIONS DERAIL YOUR EFFORTS
Compulsive behaviors and rash decisions tend to be quite damaging. They can range from food choices to exercise choices to business decisions to even choices of whether to get angry or not, and how to best handle potentially threatening situations.
MANAGE STRESS IN ORDER TO GAIN MORE WILLPOWER AND DISCIPLINE
Short-term stress isn't considered bad. It can even be helpful to give us energy and focus to take on immediate challenges. But when stress reaches the point of overwhelm, we tend to fall into coping mechanisms that tend to be undesired behaviors that we aren't as mindful about. In fact, mindfulness itself becomes harder to do because our minds are so consumed with that feeling of overwhelm.
TIME MANAGEMENT AND TASK ELIMINATION TO DECREASE OVERWHELM
When we decrease the intensity of our immediate stressors, they aren't as likely to cause the feeling of being overwhelmed, and that can make it easier to be more mindful about our discipline, and immediately give us more willpower.
BALANCE WHEN TO USE WILLPOWER AND SELF DISCIPLINE
Don't confuse discipline with willpower. Willpower is the process of forcing yourself to do something in the moment. Self discipline refers to your overall handling of a situation from your mindset to your planning to your execution of certain tasks.
For greatest success, combine when you use willpower and when you use self discipline. Sometimes forcing yourself is possible, but often it's not. When forcing yourself to do something out of sheer will isn't possible, you'll be able to employ many tactics to work smarter and not work harder by being intelligent and sophisticated about your self discipline.
DON'T MAKE DECISIONS WHEN TIRED
The problem with making decisions when tired is similar to the problem of making decisions while feeling overwhelmed. It's just harder to think everything through. It's also harder to find the willpower for self discipline when tired. If you are tired, it's often smarter to just rest instead of forcing yourself to do some next task because you will gain diminishing returns if you are working while being tired.
THE MARSHMELLOW TEST FOR DISCIPLINE AND WILLPOWER
We'll also discuss the famous Marshmellow test, which tests the discipline and willpower in children. The Marshmellow test has been a strong predictor of later-life and school success.


Invest in your future! Enroll today!

courses.description:
Your values are the things that are most important to you, they are the Foundation of your Confidence, guide your Behavior, influence your Decisions and Keep you Motivated. Knowing your values is important because they help you achieve your goals. First of all, being unsure about your values leads to stress and anxiety. Even worse, being unsure about your values can lead you to behave contrary to your values, which can lead you to even more stress and anxiety, regret and even guilt.
Values Reflect Who You Are: Your values are your personal guideposts—they represent what matters most to you. When your actions don’t align with your values, it can create an inner conflict. This disconnection may lead to feelings of unhappiness or dissatisfaction because you’re acting against what you believe is right or important.
Emotional Discomfort: Unhappiness often arises when you feel you’ve let yourself down. For example, if you value honesty but find yourself withholding the truth, the gap between your values and behavior can trigger a sense of unease or regret.
Achieving Success and Staying Aligned: When you reconnect with your values, it’s easier to create meaningful goals and see achievable outcomes. Success feels more authentic because it reflects who you are and what truly matters. For example, if you value perseverance, sticking to a challenging project can bring a deep sense of accomplishment, not just a temporary win. Aligning your actions with your values helps you build a life that feels both successful and fulfilling.
Self-Reflection and Growth: Feeling unhappy about straying from your values isn’t always negative—it can be a sign of self-awareness. It helps you recognize where you’ve veered off course and gives you the chance to realign your actions. For instance, if you value kindness but snap at someone, that discomfort can motivate you to apologize and act more compassionately in the future.

courses.description:
Master the Art of Frame Control: Rewire Your Mind for Confidence and Success
Your perception of reality isn’t fixed—it’s a frame that can be shaped, controlled, and optimized.
Most people go through life reacting to events based on default frames they never chose. They let fear, self-doubt, and limiting beliefs dictate their experience. But what if you could reframe any situation to empower yourself instead?
This course will teach you Advanced Frame Control—the ability to reshape your perspective, control your mindset, and create your own reality.
Why Frame Control is a Game-Changer
Every experience in life is just raw data. It has no built-in meaning—it’s your frame that determines whether something feels like a setback or an opportunity, a disaster or a lesson, a threat or a challenge.
For example:
Being stuck in traffic can be "a frustrating waste of time" or "a chance to listen to a great podcast."
A heated argument with your partner can be "an exhausting conflict" or "a chance to deepen your connection and understanding."
Losing a job can be "a devastating blow" or "the push you needed to start your dream business."
Your frame determines your life. If you don’t control it, it will control you.
What You’ll Learn in This Course:
How to identify and break free from limiting frames that keep you stuck
The psychology behind how frames shape confidence, success, and relationships
Advanced NLP techniques to reprogram your subconscious responses
How to turn failure, rejection, and criticism into fuel for growth
The secrets of persuasive people and leaders who shape reality with their words
Practical exercises to train your mind to default to empowering frames

People who struggle with self-doubt and negative thinking
Entrepreneurs, leaders, and influencers who need to control narratives in business and life
Anyone interested in NLP and mindset mastery
Individuals looking to stop being reactive and start shaping their own reality

Choose Your Reality—Choose Your Life
If you’re ready to stop being controlled by your fears, doubts, and old thought patterns, this course will give you the tools to take charge of your mindset, emotions, and personal success.
Let’s get started.


Your Mindset Breakthrough Starts Now—At No Risk
This course comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you have nothing to lose—except the limiting beliefs that have been controlling your life.
Are you ready to take charge of your reality and master your mindset?
Enroll now and start developing Advanced Frame Control—the key to unshakable confidence, success, and mental resilience.


Meet Your Instructor: Dan Munro
Dan Munro is a bestselling author, coach, and expert in mindset mastery. For nearly a decade, he has helped thousands of people-pleasers break free from self-doubt and develop mental resilience and unshakable confidence.
Before becoming a coach, Dan worked in rehabilitation for serious criminal offenders, helping them rewire their thinking and behaviors. This experience gave him deep insights into the psychology of control, perception, and personal transformation.
This course brings together everything he has learned and applied in his own life as a coach, father, husband, and mentor.

courses.description:
Emotional Gut Health Mini-Course: Heal Codependency and Restore Balance
Heal CPTSD, Mend Narcissistic Somatic Trauma Symptoms
Tracey Nguyen, RN, MN, holistic nurse psychotherapist at True Health Counselling, shares transformative techniques for emotional healing, gut health, and codependency recovery. Drawing from personal experience with IBS, leaky gut, and candida linked to trauma, this mini-course empowers you to heal emotionally and physically.


Personal Note from Tracey
Hello, I'm Tracey, and I'd like to share something personal. I, too, once had unimaginable digestive issues (IBS, leaky gut, candida). I couldn't eat anything, and my quality of life was awful—this is 100% linked to stress and trauma. If I can heal my body and even create a business out of my healing, the sky is also the limit for you, beyond health.
Growing up in an abusive environment was normal in the culture and household I was raised in, and I felt very unsafe feeling and expressing my emotions. I was oppressed by a controlling and strict parent who influenced me to believe I did not have my natural right to feel, express, and be myself without getting punished. I was expected to be perfect and do things perfectly. I was never good enough, and I spent my life trying to gain approval. All of this made me constantly anxious, chasing and performing. Fast forward, years later, after painful and expensive trial and error, I concluded that ultimate healing was within me as it is within you. Feeling, validating, and expressing the stuck and trapped emotional stress from the past and healing codependency was the way and IS THE TRUE WAY to personal power and transformation.
This mini-course includes what is most important to do so you can start focusing on the core things to heal. For a full comprehensive step-by-step guide, please see my full version of the courses.


What You'll Learn
This mini-course has potent, life-changing techniques to help you improve your emotional intelligence, heal codependency, and restore balance to your emotional gut health. By the end of this course, you'll have achieved strategies to break free from your controlling relationships and increase emotional well-being and physical health.


Why This Course Is Better Than Others
Transform Your Gut Health: Learn how your emotional well-being directly impacts your gut health and how to heal both simultaneously.
Heal Codependency: Break free from codependent patterns and release the anxiety in relationships.
Unlock Emotional Freedom: Let go of the resentment that is holding you back from living more peacefully.
Master Mindfulness Techniques: Learn practical mindfulness and emotional strategies to process and release trapped emotions.
Build Healthy Boundaries: Discover how to emotionally process the fear of someone being upset with you.
Embodied Healing: Understand the power of embodied healing to release stored emotions and trauma.
Powerful Relationship Skills: Discover how every problem is a relationship problem and improve your communication skills.
Authentic Emotional Expression: Learn how to express your trapped emotions in your body in a raw and real way.
Release Resentment: Develop the tools to release emotional blockages and resentment on an embodied level for peace.
A Lifetime of Growth: Gain lifelong skills for emotional and physical healing that will benefit you for years to come.
Requirements
No Prior Knowledge Required: This course is designed for anyone, regardless of your experience level.
Easy to Start: You can begin immediately—everything you need to get started is included!
Affordable and Accessible: You don’t need to spend a lot of money to benefit from this course; it’s a small investment for a massive transformation!
Personal Support: I’m here to guide you every step of the way—whether you need extra help or have questions, just reach out!
Course Description
Are you ready to take control of your emotional and physical health? Imagine releasing emotional triggers, healing codependency, and improving your gut health—all at the same time. This course is not just a learning experience; it’s a transformative journey that will guide you step by step toward healing and self-empowerment.
You will learn life-changing techniques like mindfulness for emotional healing, how to let go of resentment, and how to emotionally process the fear of conflict. You don’t have to navigate this journey alone—I will be right beside you, guiding you through each step with a clear, structured plan.
By the end of this course, you’ll walk away with simple exercises you can follow along daily that will serve you for a lifetime, empowering you to live with emotional freedom, healthier relationships, and improved gut health.


What Exactly Will You Learn in This Course?


Understand Why Every Problem is a Relationship Problem: Master the underlying connection between emotional health and relationships.
Heal Emotional Triggers with Mindfulness: Use mindfulness techniques to manage and release emotional triggers.
The Power of Embodied Healing: Learn how to tap into the body’s wisdom for deep emotional healing.
Effectively Process Feelings: Gain the tools to process and release negative emotions in a healthy, constructive way.
Validate and Express Trapped Emotions: Learn how to express suppressed emotions to create emotional release and balance.
Navigate the Fear of Someone Being Upset with You: Develop strategies to emotionally process and overcome this common fear.
Take Responsibility for Your Emotions, Not Others': Learn how to release the guilt of being responsible for others' anger.
Let Go of Resentment on an Emotional, Embodied Level: Use powerful embodied practices to fully release resentment and its emotional hold.
Improve Your Gut Health through Emotional Intelligence: Discover how emotional healing impacts gut health and how to use this for lasting improvement.
Create Lifelong Change in Your Relationships: Learn how to break free from trauma bonds.
Course Structure
Introduction to Relational Psychology & Mindfulness: First, I will introduce you to the basics of relational psychology and how mindfulness can be used to heal emotional pain.
Healing Emotional Triggers: After that, we’ll dive into mindfulness techniques that help you heal emotional triggers and break free from emotional reactivity.
Embodied Healing for Lasting Change: Next, you will learn the importance of embodied healing and how to integrate this practice into your emotional growth.
Validating and Expressing Emotions: We will explore how to validate and express trapped emotions for emotional release and well-being.
Emotionally Processing the Fear of Conflict: Together, we’ll discover effective strategies to manage and process the fear of someone being upset with you.
Breaking Free from Codependency: Then, we’ll focus on healing codependency and learning how to establish healthy emotional boundaries.
Letting Go of Resentment: You will learn how to release resentment on a deep, embodied level, transforming emotional pain into peace.
Improving Gut Health Through Emotional Healing: We’ll explore how emotional intelligence directly impacts gut health and how to improve both simultaneously.
Continued Growth and Lifelong Tools: Finally, I’ll guide you on how to continue this journey of self-improvement for a lifetime of emotional and physical well-being.
Who This Course is For
Beginners who want to understand emotional intelligence and its impact on their life and health.
Anyone seeking to heal codependency and create healthier, more fulfilling relationships.
Individuals who want to improve their gut health through emotional well-being.
Employees looking to shift their mindset and improve their emotional health both personally and professionally.
Anyone feeling stuck in emotional patterns and ready to experience lasting transformation.
True Health Counselling: As a holistic nurse psychotherapist, I offer complex trauma-informed care through The Integrative Somatic Trauma Healing Approach—a psychosomatic, mindfulness-based framework with Gestalt therapy and a faith-based lens. Specializing in CPTSD, BPD, narcissistic somatic symptoms, psychosomatic disorders, and immune dysfunction, I guide faith-oriented clients to authentic healing, safe relationships, and coming home to their souls.
Start Your Journey: Ready to heal CPTSD, codependency, and gut health issues? Join the mini-course today and unlock emotional freedom and somatic healing.
target_audience: Individuals seeking to build inner strength and emotional resilience.
Individuals who are struggling with guilt, emotional attachment, or the fear of others' opinions.

People looking to enhance their emotional clarity and self-expression through meditation.
People who recognize patterns of codependency in their relationships and are seeking healing.
People looking to heal the emotional relationship core wounds contributing to gut health issues

courses.bio: Healing our Mother and Father Wounds
objectives: During this course, you will learn how your birth story has shaped your foundation
During this course, you will learn how your mama, daddy and other caregivers drama has been passed down to you
During this course, you will learn the reasons why it's important to break the cycle and heal the womb wound
During this course, you will learn why many of us won't work on healing our mother and father wounds
During this course, you will learn the cost of not healing the womb wound
During this course, you will learn how the womb wound prevents us from walking in our authenticity
During this course, you will learn the different ways we carry the wound womb and how it shows up in our lives
During this course, you will learn how to begin healing the womb wounds

Course Section: When I First Realized My Wounds
Where Does Momma and Daddy Trauma Come From
Moving Through Momma and Daddy Trauma Drama

requirements: No prerequisites
courses.description:
We are NOT our parents! We are NOT their stories! We are NOT their traumas!


As children we do not have much control over what happens to us. We are dependent on our parents and/or other caregivers to take care of us, mold us and guidance us. In most cases, they try to do the best they can. However what we do not realize until we become adults, is that our parents, our caregivers, other adults in our lives did the best they could to provide for and guide us within the lens of surviving or living through their own personal traumas. Is this an excuse? No, it just fact!


Our parents, caregivers and other adults in our lives came into this world just as we did, through the lens of someone else's traumas and life experiences. Depending upon how those traumas or experiences were managed, determined how they shaped our mama, daddy, caregivers and other adults. Because the negative intergenerational cycle or what we sometimes refer to as "curse" may not have been broken, these unhealthy narratives were passed down to us. Well My Beloved...here's the good news! As adults, we have control over our lives! We have the control to change the narrative and to create a new story! courses.description:
Over the past 15 years, one of the biggest problems I’ve run into (and worked on) with every one of my clients, was NOT how to close more deals, be more efficient, or negotiate better pricing. It was something that was right there in front of us all, every day, trying it’s hardest to slow us down. It was self-doubt and self-sabotage!
Do you ever notice that no matter how hard you try to show the world that you are “doing great” and “feeling fine”, there are a bunch of negative, self-limiting thoughts bouncing around in your head? Well... this is normal. We all feel this way. But we don’t have to.
If you are reading this right now, my guess is that you are at the point where you want to do something about this, right?
Well, I experienced this very thing throughout my 20’s and 30’s. It seemed like everything I tried to do; no matter how hard I worked on something; I didn’t achieve the success that I thought I deserved. It seemed like some (un)expected bad thing would happen and take away my earlier wins.
It wasn’t until I was at my lowest in my career and my life, that I realized (through the help of a few smart mentors of mine) that I needed to CHANGE MY MIND!
I was the cause of all my failures and struggles. It was my negative beliefs and thoughts that were holding me back.
In this course, I will help you, just like I was helped years ago:
I will show you how you were taught to be careful, doubtful, and afraid to fail.
Then, I will help you dig into your self-limiting beliefs – lifting up the rug, turning on the lights, and exposing what’s been holding you back.
And finally, together, we will rewrite your operating instructions with new, empowering, positive thoughts which will propel you to success in any and every-thing you take on.
If you are ready to change your mind and create a new, successful world for yourself, then LET'S GET STARTED!
target_audience: Professionals who are struggling to achieve more in their careers.

courses.title: Law Administration Procedures - Level - 4
courses.bio: Quiz Bank
courses.description:
Promoting Mindful Reflection and Well-Being


Integrating mindful reflection and well-being considerations into immersive learning experiences is critical for supporting students' overall development. Educators can encourage students to engage in reflective activities that allow them to evaluate the emotional and psychological implications of their immersive learning experiences. Educators may help students build a healthy connection with immersive technologies by creating a supportive environment for open discourse regarding the nexus of technology, well-being, and thoughtful observation.


Furthermore, prioritizing students' mental and emotional well-being while implementing immersive learning experiences encourages self-awareness and emotional balance, providing students with the tools they need to navigate the digital realm with mindfulness and resilience.


As educators continue to harness the power of immersive learning experiences, incorporating ethical reflection, cultural competence, empathetic engagement, and mindful well-being considerations ensures that students not only gain a deeper understanding of diverse perspectives and historical contexts, but also emerge as empathetic, culturally aware, and ethical decision-makers capable of navigating the complexities of the modern world with integrity and empathy.


Exploring Diverse Perspectives Through Immersive Storytelling


Immersive storytelling in virtual environments is an effective tool for exploring diverse views and storylines. Students can build a nuanced awareness of the intricacies inherent in human experiences by connecting meaningfully with the perspectives and challenges of people from various cultural origins.


Students can immerse themselves in the lived experiences of people from various historical periods, geographical locales, and cultural settings by using immersive storytelling. This in-depth exploration of varied perspectives builds empathy and appreciation for the complexities of human existence, resulting in a more thorough knowledge of the interconnection of world events and societal processes.


Furthermore, the immersive nature of storytelling in virtual settings encourages students to overcome their own prejudices and preconceptions, allowing them to approach challenging challenges with a fresh perspective. This not only teaches critical thinking, but it also fosters a greater sense of empathy and compassion for individuals and communities whose experiences might otherwise go unnoticed.


Promoting Global Citizenship and Cross-Cultural Competency


Incorporating immersive learning experiences into educational frameworks not only helps students gain in-depth cultural awareness, but it also promotes global citizenship and cross-cultural competency. Students can broaden their vision and transcend ethnocentric perspectives by immersing themselves in virtual worlds that capture the richness of many cultural heritages.


Immersive learning allows students to understand the interconnectedness of global challenges, as well as the shared responsibility that comes with addressing them. This comprehensive approach to learning creates a feeling of global citizenship by teaching students that their actions and decisions intersect with and affect a broader, interconnected world.


Furthermore, the immersive character of these encounters enables students to develop cross-cultural competence through active engagement with and reflection on cultural variety. This allows students to approach intercultural encounters with compassion, respect, and a thorough awareness of the complex forces that shape different societies.


To summarize, incorporating immersive learning experiences into educational paradigms has enormous potential not just for extending students' comprehension of various perspectives and historical settings, but also for cultivating empathy, global citizenship, and cross-cultural competency. By interacting with these immersive technologies, students can develop into conscious, culturally aware individuals capable of navigating the complexity of our globalized world with a profound feeling of interconnectivity and respect for diverse cultural narratives.
