courses.description:
This Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP) training serves to equip you with a cognitive framework for understanding your psychological make-up. The course is structured in a way that'll lead to towards completely understanding how NLP principles can be embodied and applied to strengthen your mindset and develop robust emotional intelligence.
NLP is a psychology-based approach to communication and personal development that focuses on the direct connection between neurological processes (neuro-), language (linguistic), and behavior patterns learned by experience (programming). For over 50 years, it has been embraced in fields such as business, entrepreneurship, high-level sports, and coaching.
This training addresses critical questions such as: How can NLP impact mental health and emotional resilience? What role does language play in shaping our inner dialogue? How can we transform self-limiting narratives and contribute to personal and professional growth? How do we harness emotional intelligence to navigate complex social and work environments?
This course offers an insightful journey into how your thoughts, beliefs, and behaviors shape your emotions and affect your mental health. Through principled teaching and real-world examples, you'll learn how to apply NLP to rewire unproductive thought patterns, effectively manage stress, and establish a personal culture of emotional resilience from deep within.


Some of the key concepts covered in this course include:
-  The influence of language on our thoughts, worldviews, beliefs, and behaviors
-  How to adopt new positive thought patterns and discard unproductive habits
-  The relationship between our mental judgement and relationship experiences
-  A framework for understanding emotions and creating positive states of mind
-  Understanding the impact of emotional intelligence (EI) on social relationships
-  Communication skills for earning trust, managing conflict & influencing people
-  The role of self-awareness and personal insight in fostering personal growth
-  Timeless disciplines for managing stress, anxiety and other negative emotions
-  The role of maturation and responsibility in becoming an attractive character
-  The principles and life wisdom that leads to self-awareness and self-reflection


Students will delve into a spectrum of timeless life principles, drawing on the works of influential figures such as Virginia Satir, Milton Erickson, Abraham Maslow, and others who influenced the early development of NLP. This study aims to equip students with a nuanced understanding of 'change dynamics', and create a pathway towards self-actualisation and growth.
Through enlightening lessons, reflective exercises, and real-world examples, participants will gain the knowledge, wisdom and NLP skills necessary to even guide others towards self-discovery and personal growth. They can learn how to move beyond agreeing or disagreeing with principles, and instead reflect upon them to evaluate their relevance in the context of their life.
The wisdom, skills and knowledge you'll gain through this training are not just theoretical – they are practical and applicable to the real-life situations you'll encounter day-to-day. Throughout this training you will naturally develop a deeper knowledge of yourself, and consequentially increase your ability to build strong relationships, overcome career life and daily struggles.
Our training materials are captured in HD video, accompanied by an MP3 version of the course, and supplemented with PDF resources to enhance your learning experience. The course is available on-demand, providing a comprehensive framework to contextualize your studies and establish a strong foundation for sharing your newfound life-knowledge with others.
ⓘ This training is part of a broader 28-course Achology curriculum. It comes with a full 30-day money back guarantee, so if you're not satisfied, you can get a refund with no questions asked.
target_audience: Individuals seeking to significantly improve their emotional intelligence (EI).

requirements: The only requirement is the desire to Break Free from Manipulation
courses.description:
What Is Manipulation?
This insightful Psychology course will teach you that Manipulation is the exercise of harmful influence over others. People who manipulate others attack their mental and emotional sides to get what they want. The person manipulating — called the manipulator — seeks to create an imbalance of power, and take advantage of a victim to get power, control, benefits, and/or privileges at the expense of the victim.
Manipulation can happen in close or casual relationships, but they are more common in closely formed relationships. In a way, everyone can manipulate others to get what they want. But manipulation is defined as any attempt to sway someone’s emotions to get them to act or feel a certain way.
Manipulators have common tricks they’ll use to make you feel irrational and more likely to give in to their requests.
This course will alert you to these tricks.
Signs of Manipulation
You will learn that Manipulation can happen in many forms but quite basically Manipulation is an attempt to undermine your rational thinking.
Being able to identify manipulation is a large part of putting an end to it. Manipulation can take a toll on your own emotional well-being.
On this course you will do practical exercises to identify the signs of manipulation in your own life.
Personality Vulnerabilities.
You will also learn how you are vulnerable to manipulation and develop an action plan to set boundaries and take back control of your life.
target_audience: This course is intended for all individuals who want to understand manipulation
This course is intended for all individuals who want to break free from being manipulated

courses.description:
Unlock the Power of True Bravery
Warning: This course includes profanity and raw, unfiltered truths.
Fear controls most people. It holds them back from opportunities, keeps them stuck in their comfort zones, and stops them from living the life they truly want.
But not you.
If you’re here, it means you already have the courage to face discomfort and take action despite fear. Now, it’s time to go beyond ordinary courage and step into the realm of True Bravery—where fear is no longer an obstacle but a tool for growth.
As George Addair famously said:
"Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear."
What You’ll Learn in This Course:
The difference between normal courage and True Bravery
The two core methods to train yourself to be braver in any situation
How to override fear and prevent it from controlling your decisions
The "F*ck it!" technique – a simple yet powerful way to take bold action
How to use physiology to instantly boost your courage
Psychological techniques to eliminate cowardice as an option
How to recover and learn from bravery attempts, even when things don’t go as planned
Why True Bravery Matters
Bravery is not recklessness. It’s not about taking unnecessary risks or ignoring danger. True bravery is about wisdom—knowing when fear is wrong and having the power to override it.
Most of what you fear is actually low-risk. The only thing stopping you is your mind.
But those who train themselves to seek discomfort and challenge their fears are the ones who achieve extraordinary things. They become the 1%—the superhumans who refuse to let fear dictate their lives.
Who Is This Course For?
People who want more courage to take bold action in life
Those who feel held back by irrational fears and want to break free
High-performers, entrepreneurs, and leaders who need to push beyond their limits
Psychology and self-development enthusiasts fascinated by fear and mental resilience

Before becoming a coach, Dan worked in rehabilitation for serious criminal offenders, guiding them through massive life changes—proving that even the most difficult circumstances can be overcome.
This course brings together everything he has learned and applied in his own life as a coach, father, husband, and mentor.

courses.title: 30 Day Self-Love Challenge
courses.bio: Uncover a more authentic relationship with yourself!
objectives: Daily tasks to help you heal, appreciate, and empower yourself.
requirements: Be a human being :)
courses.description:
Whatever you are working on—whether it’s your physical health, mental health, relationships, or career—a healthy sense of self-love is an essential tool for your journey. Without it, everything is more difficult. Instead of blaming yourself or blaming circumstances, you can access the peace and happiness you deserve.


What Is Self-Love?
Love is misunderstood to be an emotion; actually, it is a state of awareness, a way of being in the world, a way of seeing oneself and others. ~DAVID R. HAWKINS
The idea of self-love is often misunderstood. People believe that self-love is the same as narcissism or that self-love only comes to those who are “lovable.” Let’s take a moment to clear this up.
Self-love, like love for any other person, is the natural outcome of taking the time to understand, accept, heal, appreciate, and nourish the person you are (as opposed to the person you think should be).
Self-love is self-understanding. Self-love is self-awareness. Self-love is self-care.
Building self-love is not a matter of becoming lovable, nor is it a matter of becoming better than others. It’s about connecting to yourself in an authentic, sustainable way and doing everything you can to nourish that connection.


How Will Self-Love Help You?
When I loved myself enough, I began leaving whatever wasn’t healthy. This meant people, jobs, my own beliefs and habits—anything that kept me small. My judgement called it disloyal. Now I see it as self-loving. ~KIM MCMILLEN
Self-love changes lives—for better when it’s there and for worse when it’s absent. Here are some of the ways that having self-love can impact your life:
Confidence. Self-love helps break your addiction to the approval of others because your own approval becomes the most important thing.
Accomplishment. Loving yourself means developing an awareness of your skills and talents and cultivating the courage to pursue them.
Physical health. Taking time to understand your body’s needs and capabilities is essential to developing long-term habits of caring for your physical health.
Mental health. Loving the person you see in the mirror is the only way to help that person through any kind of distress. When you take the time to understand yourself, you can actually help instead of just trying to shut yourself up.
Self-forgiveness. Seeing yourself with eyes of love is the only way to forgive yourself for the mistakes you’ve made in the past so that you can stop being held back by the person you were and start appreciating the person you are.
Healthy relationships. Cultivating love for yourself will give you the essential practice you need to build relationships based on love rather than need.
Leadership. If self-love is difficult for you, then persevering on this journey will help you develop the ability to love when it’s difficult, which is your one-way ticket to compassionate leadership and helping others.
Patience. Self-judgment tries to convince you that if you just fix that one last thing, you can earn your own approval. Self-love will teach you to accept self-discovery as a lifetime journey. Like this, you will not only overcome chronic perfectionism, you will also develop deep, resilient patience for the process of change and the way of life.
Just imagine how different your life could be if you took the time to cultivate a better relationship with yourself. Why not begin today?


Join the 30-Day Self-Love Challenge
You have been criticizing yourself for years, and it hasn’t worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens. ~LOUISE L. HAY
This challenge was designed to help revolutionize your relationship with yourself through daily tasks that dig deep into the mental, emotional, and behavioural patterns that govern how you feel and think about the person in the mirror.
The 30 days of the challenge are divided into three sections:
Cleansing. For the first 10 days, you will develop an awareness of what has been holding you back in the past and begin to remove those limitations.
Appreciating. For the next 10 days, you will cultivate gratitude, understanding, and appreciation for who you are in the present.
Growing. For the last 10 days, you will develop skills and insights that will help you become who you’re meant to be in the future.
I’m also inviting all participants of the 30-Day Self-Love Challenge to a private Facebook group that we lovingly call the “tribe.” This space is incredible. All the participants have come together in the name of self-love, compassion, and self-awareness to create a safe, supportive haven for self-discovery. This group is the perfect place for you to make new friends, receive the support you need, and share your story with the people who will be most inspired by it.
As for the program, all the videos will arrive into your email inbox daily after you sign up. Each video is filmed in a different spot in beautiful Costa Rica, so you can enjoy the beauty of nature while learning to enjoy the beauty within you!
This is going to be a fun and powerful process, and I’ll be with you every step along the way.
In a nutshell, you’ll receive:
30 video tasks of deep, intensive, life-changing tasks that will transform your relationship with every part of you—your body, your inner guidance, your inner gremlin, your emotions, your thoughts, your dreams, your fears, your past, your passion, and your purpose.
Lifetime access to a community of like-minded people on the same journey—people who will understand why you’re doing this, what you want, and where you want to go.
Lifetime access to all the videos, so you can go at your own pace and repeat the challenge whenever you want!

Prepare to embark on a transformative journey that will touch your heart, awaken your spirit, invigorate your body, and expand your mind. This journey will guide you step-by-step through an empowering process of self-discovery and transformation. By the end of the course, you’ll have a robust toolbox filled with strategies to cultivate self-love and confidence. You’ll navigate life with greater ease, resilience, and fulfillment.


Why This Course is For You:

Taking Out This Limiting Belief At Its Roots

requirements: The only prerequisite is that the student does not have psychosis. As with all self-development courses, you are advised to consult with your medical professional before embarking on this learning.
courses.description:
Welcome. I consider you important, and if you disagree, that's fine, we can agree to differ. You may be pleasantly surprised with your course, as it is very practical and hands-on.
This is a course full of practical skills that are easy enough to try during the actual video lecture. You learn as you do. This is not a theory that you can later apply. You learn exactly how whilst you watch your video lesson. After the introductory training to ease you into it, we start with simple, practical skills that can "rewire your brain" (a common descriptive metaphor) and help you do whatever you like without fear stopping you. That party you missed, that interview you didn't attend, that relationship that broke your heart, and more - imagine not having that fear of "not good enough" keeping you in a rut! To bravely go where you want, do what you want, with whom you want, the way you want. Everything is easier when you believe in yourself. And this course teaches you how.
This course uses a unique adaptation of EFT Tapping with a bit of Reiki healing and some common but invaluable wisdom from my hypnosis knowledge. Every lecture consists of an explanatory easy-to-follow video, and a download reminder and easy-to-follow short PDF. Your lectures are as follows:
Find how your course is applied efficiently in real life, get an overview of the course, and download your easy, illustrated How-to guide that you can easily put into practice within minutes.
Learn the role of the subconscious mind, and how EFT Tapping can dislodge limiting beliefs from it.
Find a neat new way to quieten that inner critical voice, literally at your fingertips.
Discover the biggest blocks to feeling good enough. And learn how to release them. You can expect to feel the progress as you apply the new skills along with the easy lecture video.
Imagine your mind as a garden. In this lesson, we weed out the roots underneath the "Not Good Enough" weeds. In their place, immediately will start to grow the most amazing strong flowers and trees, of "I Am Good Enough". Your self-esteem and confidence can then be free to grow.
Learn the one trick you can use to make saying positive affirmations work. Even if you have tried them before and they didn't.
Enjoy your learning and your journey!
target_audience: People who want more self-esteem, who want to feel better in themselves, at work, in a relationship, in their leisure activities (such as play better tennis), become more confident in any task (such as driving), and generally release some negative limiting beliefs that get in their way.

EFT Practitioners who wish to learn how EFT can be adapted and used in flexible ways.
Tappers who want to feel truly Good Enough!
Anyone who is limited in their personal or professional life by feelings of not being good enough.
Anyone who wants a gentle and helpful introductory course to what EFT Tapping can do.

courses.title: How To Transform Fear of Rejection And Self Expression
courses.bio: Freeing Yourself To Be Fully You
objectives: How the fear of rejection is no bigger or different from any other fear we may have.
What fear is and our part in how we create it.
The origin of the fear of rejection.
Types of self rejection that we do.
The importance of self-expression.
What it means if we experience others rejecting our gifts.
The relationship between rejection and resistance.
What ways the moment can elevate us.
The relationship between allowing and receiving
How wholistic processes work in our lives.

The Giving Of Ourselves: We All Have Gifts To Share
Receiving The Moment: Allowing The Moment: A Wholistic Process

requirements: A willingness to look deeply at yourself and take responsibilty for your actions and experiences.
Understand this is a process and allow it to unfold in the best way for you.
courses.description:
Welcome to How To Transform Fears Of Rejection And Self Expression. I am happy this course found its way to you.
As someone who grew up terrified to speak up, speak out, and express myself in front of others out of fear that I would be rejected and not be loved, I am extremely grateful that I can share my perspectives with you on rejection and what I have learned that helped me to not only understand rejection more specifically, but to also to transform the fear.
In this course, you will learn:
How the fear of rejection is no bigger or different from any other fear we may have.
What is fear exactly? How do we create fear?
The importance of self-expression. How it can benefit others too. How it relates to unconditional self-love.
The origin of the fear of rejection. What we are actually afraid of.
Types of self rejection we do and what that means for the experience of our reality.
The true definition of rejection. What choices we have in it.
What it means for others to be a part of your moment and you a part of theirs.
What it means if we experience others rejecting our gifts.
How we don't need to resist what we do not prefer.
How a world of natural expression looks like and functions.
What it means to resist the moment.
What it means if the moment actually benefits us no matter what it is.
How the moment leads us to even more of ourselves.
What it means to use up the moment.
What if we saw life as a process made up of moments that can elevate you?
How our lives, relationships, and endeavors are never static, but always changing and expanding us.
How everything matters.
And more...
Let's breakdown the fear, expose it for what it actually is and in bringing this knowledge to light, it will allow us to free ourselves from patterns (and choices) of self-rejection. I have had a lifetime of experience with this subject and this understanding has helped to free me to express myself without hesitation and to do my part in the world, which is to be me as fully as possible, as is your part for you as well.
If you have any questions or need support as you are taking this course or after, please reach out to me and I'll be very happy to speak with you.
Much love, Adam
target_audience: Individuals who are afraid of expressing themselves from fear of rejection.
Those who want to share their gifts with the world but are afraid.
Those who would like to express themselves more fully in their lives.

courses.description:
So what is Imposter Syndrome exactly? Well, first of all, don’t let the term scare you. It’s not a mental illness or anything. It’s just become a popularized way of describing the discounting of any achievements and the experiences of major doubt some people have, which can get in the way of going after major goals. Some people, who experience imposter syndrome, often feel like a fraud, and they worry that they’ll be exposed as a fake. Also, some people are terrified of failing and worry about being discovered and seen as incompetent. So when the term imposter syndrome is used in this course, that’s the context.
The course is designed to do several things: 1. Help you identify and address the limiting beliefs that stops you from taking action; 2. Help you to understand how the inner critic became so powerful in your life; 3. Help you learn how to stop it from sabotaging your life; and 4. Help you replace negative beliefs with positive ones and discover ways to build the badass confidence you need to go after any goal you may have. You’re also welcomed to send in your specific challenges and get tailored responses to increase your confidence.
target_audience: Individuals who suffer from debilitating self-doubt that gets in the way of them achieving their goals.

This course deals with Empathy and Social Awareness.
It is the third level of four certification courses, which can be done in any order.
The four courses are:
Emotional Intelligence Certification: Self Awareness Level 1
Emotional Intelligence Certification Self Management Level 2
Empathy and Social Awareness EI Certification: Level 3
Relationship Management EI Certification - Level 4
Emotional Intelligence: A set of emotional, social and relational skills that guides the way we perceive, understand and express ourselves; connect with others; manage interpersonal exchange; cope with challenges; and apply emotional information in an effective, meaningful way.
Research indicates that emotional intelligence can be learned and be measurable differences directly associated with professional and personal success. Furthermore, it may be responsible for up to 80% of the success we experience in life.
The basic areas of emotional intelligence are self-awareness, self-management; empathy/social awareness and relationship management.
EIQ Self-Awareness
Self-awareness reflects understanding, personal acceptance & an overall understanding of personal psychology. Self-awareness is foundational to social awareness & self-management.
Factors Include:
Personality elements
Learning styles
Mental attitudes & states
Comfort & discomfort
Strengths &
weaknesses
Biofeedback
Self-acceptance
Self esteem
Temperament
Tension/stress levels
Spirituality
Conscience
Emotional Well-being
Assertiveness
Authenticity
Character
Confidence
Internal Empathy
Self-perception
Mindfulness
Self Recognition is comprised of 5 sub-categories:
Self-Awareness/Understanding: a conscious, deliberate reflection on personal identity, image, feelings, motives, desires & how these are associated with perceptions of self in the context of various situations. Empathy & understanding of self. Knowing why emotions occur. Being authentic.
Connections of Cause & Effect: recognition of the impact & consequence of behaviors on feelings & moods; separating external & internal factors effecting emotions. Knowing how feelings relate to performance.
Self-Appreciation, Acceptance & Confidence: development of self-esteem; personal worth & value; & coming to grips with personal attributes. Recognizing personal strengths, weaknesses, & limitations. Operating with realistic self-assurance.
Consciousness, Assertiveness: intentional establishment of personal boundaries & appropriate limits; choosing a path that expresses self-worth through personal care & outward presentation (presence).
Emotional Identification: ability to identify & name personal feelings; vocabulary & definition of emotions allowing choices, responses & performance; effective reflection on intrapersonal information.

courses.description:
Learn all the basic tips and tricks to make great, outstanding speeches every single time. You will be able to impress audiences, earn respect among your colleagues and friends with the simple, practical exercises in this course. Public Speaking is an invaluable skill for EVERYONE!                                                             Learning the basics of Public Speaking will help you shine out in your profession, class or even socially. Confidence is a great asset for any speaker and this course teaches you how to master it, in a very practical, project based manner.
I can personally vouch for all the benefits I have had due to my speech skills, which helped me shine out as the Marketing Manager of the biggest mall in my country. My confidence levels soared and I soon found myself getting offers to work as a Corporate Trainer in other organisations as well, leading to a satisfying career in speaking and training.


Content and Overview
This course is suitable for all levels of speakers; those who want to be slowly guided as they get comfortable speaking on stage, to those who just want to brush up on certain specific points.
You will be taught in a practical manner, by comparing yourself before and after the course, to map your progress.  The first practice project will require you to make a 'Before' video of yourself, which will help you understand your assets as a speaker and points that need some guidance and polishing.
Further, you will learn how to evaluate good speakers and specific qualities they have, so that you can learn, emulate and teach yourself from anyone you admire; simply by watching them. Awareness is the key!
Speech organisation will be taught in great detail, including speech Opening and Conclusion, which will help you maximize the impact as you make speeches that grab the attention of the audience and retain them till the end.
A lot of emphasis will be given on developing your speaking voice, and how you present yourself as you speak. Body language and voice modulation have a major impact on audience's perception of the speaker and you will learn how to use them to your benefit.
Finally, you will learn how to prepare speeches; how to practice, how to prepare yourself on D Day and how to walk up to that stage and impress them EVERY SINGLE TIME!


Enroll now, for there is a 30 day money back guarantee should you not be a 100% satisfied with the course.

This practical, step-by-step public speaking course helps you speak with confidence, structure a powerful message, and deliver compelling stories—in meetings, interviews, pitches, and on camera. Craft a clear structure that audiences can follow

requirements: A desire to feel better about yourself or help someone you love do the same.
courses.description: This course uses cognitive therapy techniques and therapeutic stories to help participants understand the origins of their self-esteem wounds and transform their perceptions of themselves. When children experience criticism, they learn to believe themselves to be inadequate or defective. When they experience neglect or abandonment, they learn to see themselves as unimportant or unlovable. When they are abused, they see themselves as broken or bad and feel shame. Without intervention, these perceptions last their entire lives. This course gives participants a new perception of their negative experiences and of themselves, helping them reclaim their positive self-esteem. The course includes video lecture, therapeutic stories, lecture summaries and written exercises. The video is of a six-hour live workshop given by Dr. Ledford, but broken down into thirteen lectures.
target_audience: Anyone age eleven and older who wants to heal self-esteem wounds and enjoy life with greater confidence and self-worth.

Welcome! Perhaps you are completely brand new to the bow drill. Maybe you've just experimented with it. Possibly you are a veteran who just wants to learn something new in order to take you to the next level. In every case, this course is just for you! I’m here to illustrate in an easy-to-follow process how to make three completely different types of functional bow-drill kits. Nothing will be left to the imagination. Every single detail from beginning to end will be demonstrated.

This course will cover
Making and sizing a bow
What strings work best to string your bow
Various options for your bearing block
Spindle material, length, and diameter
Hearth-board material, length, and diameter
Various options for your ember catch
Assorted bird-nest materials, and how to layer them
The function of each component
How a bow-drill kit is used to make a fire
A wild-crafted kit, a building-supply store kit, and an urban-scavenged kit

Instructor
Hi! My name is Nathan Machain, also known as The Urban Aboriginal. I'll be your guide during this course. I have over a decade of bow-drill experience and eight survival-related certifications and counting, ranging from primitive-living skills, to bushcraft, to urban survival. I have had the honor of training with some of the best that the survival industry has to offer. My diverse training has made this a diverse course. As an instructor I make it a point to not let your geographic location dictate your success or failure when it comes to being able to get a fire with the bow drill.

My Promise to You
I'll be here for you every step of the way! If you have any questions about the training content or anything related to this topic, you can always post a question in the course or send me a direct message.
By the end of this class your confidence with the bow drill will soar. You'll have a thorough understanding of how to make your own kit for fun or as a life-saving, self-reliance skill.


Go ahead and click the enroll button, and I'll see you in lesson 1!
Cheers,
Nathan

A 30-Day, "No Questions Asked," Money-Back Guarantee!

requirements: No requirements
courses.description:
Have you ever feared of being exposed as worthless and defective, an impostor without any real talent?
All of us at least once in life felt like:
an outsider or a loner
misunderstood
unpopular, unwelcome
left out, excluded
weird or strange
less important
overlooked, forgotten
ASHAMED
Every normal person experiences shame. Shame is the main reason we feel lonely and inferior, and strive for perfection. Sexual disorders, depression, addiction and many eating disorders are largely disorders of shame. Both physical abuse and sexual abuse also significantly involve shame.
The meaning of “shame” in this course is a sense of worthlessness and inadequacy many people feel. We feel unlovable, not good enough, defective and flawed. Feeling of shame is when you feel like a mistake, rather than a worthy human being. You feel inner chaos and undeserving of respect, love and caring.


When you experience shame, you wish a hole would open up and swallow you. We feel that all of our vulnerabilities become exposed and magnified. We believe that others view us with disdain or disgust. We think that perhaps we can be accepted if we can only become more lovable or perfect. We direct all of our actions towards accomplishing certain goals.
We feel exposed when we make mistakes, when we do or say something unintended in a public setting, or when we compare ourselves unfavorably with people around us. When we are doing well, we think it’s only a matter of time before we are discovered as useless. When we make mistakes, we expect a terrifying degree of anger from the people we disappoint.
Shame is related to self-contempt, a sense of inferiority, and low self-esteem. Paradoxically, people who are judgmental, arrogant and contemptuous toward others, are also driven by shame.


The problem is, people don’t like talking about shame. There is shame about shame. We will readily admit guilt, hurt or fear before we will admit shame.
That’s why we use other words to describe our experience of shame: embarrassed, shy, guilty, self-conscious, rejected or inferior.


If you feel:
bad about yourself
like a loser
insecure about your appearance
foolish and embarrassed
self-conscious
always guilty for something
hurt and left out
vulnerable and exposed
unworthy and unlovable -
then you have shame problems.


Topics covered in this course:
Why do we feel ashamed of ourselves?

Shame is a major destructive force in our life. It is at the root of all dysfunctions in families. In this course, you’ll learn how to deal with shame and how to develop resilience to shame.
The less we understand shame and how it influences us, the more power it has over our lives. You can overcome the feeling of shame by understanding why it occurs and how to deal with the experience.
This course will give you solutions and tools to address the shame you are feeling. After you implement the ideas, I hope you’ll be more confident to move forward, take chances, and create a better future.

courses.description:
Ready to learn a systematic method to increase your self-compassion while also achieving superior results in your life? Tired of being your own worst critic? Of holding yourself back with procrastination, self doubt and lack of confidence? Why wait? Make this investment in yourself now!
Self-Compassion is more helpful than self-esteem. It is a quality of your relationship with yourself best understood in contrast to the internal negativity that is the Inner Critic. Life is going to include successes and failure, easy and hard times. How you treat yourself in these situations determines your resilience. The reality is that we always do the best that we can at every given moment. However, we still can’t predict the future and what seems wise one second can backfire the next.
Most people cause themselves pain by using internally directed negativity to try to improve their lives. This is understandable as these habits were developed very young. However, it is possible to update these habits to reflect your best understanding of yourself and the world. Self-compassion and self-coaching not only feel much better, but they are also more effective motivators.
This course will help you understand the roots of your internally directed negativity and see your Inner-Critic as a misguided habitual strategy for improving your life. Bringing compassion to this well-intentioned but primitive habit eases the whole system. Then you’ll learn a couple tools to release some of the distress it has caused you over the years, making change easier. Next you’ll be guided through creating a personalized program to systematically change these patterns for the better.
Greater Self-Compassion makes the whole internal world more peaceful and kind which helps with motivation, self-worth, efficacy and resilience while reducing anxiety, depression and stress.
Just watch the videos to learn this life-changing perspective. Use the included exercises to apply this to your life and understand your own unique situation more clearly. Learn several techniques to reduce the emotional distress that has been holding you back around this issue. Develop realistic plans, including self-talk and behavior, to manage your inner-critic when it arises. Then do the practice and enjoy the results!
target_audience: People troubled by self-judgment and internal harshness.
Those wishing to build skills with mindfulness and self-compassion

courses.description:
If you could change anything about your life, what would it be?
Many of us today live with insecurities, self-doubts, and difficult experiences that have chipped away at our sense of who we really are. These can interrupt our progress towards our goals, affect our relationships negatively, and leave us with feelings of worthlessness or hopelessness. But what if you could find a way to rid yourself of those insecurities and self-doubts?
Feeling deeply confident requires an accurate sense of self-worth and a solid understanding of who you are as an individual. This course provides key lessons on how to restore that sense of self-worth. Throughout the lessons in this course, you will learn what self-worth is and where it comes from; how worth affects various aspects of your life, such as your relationships, education, career, confidence, fitness, nutrition; and how understanding yourself better can lead to an increased sense of confidence and worth.
Additionally, this course will provide you with numerous ways that you can re-discover your own worth. These lessons include topics such as replacing judgment with compassion, searching your family history, recognizing your influence on the world around you, and taking care of yourself as someone valuable. This course is geared towards those with a Christian background, but can be just as applicable to those of other backgrounds as well.
Many of the problems we face in our world today, including mental health challenges, difficult relationships, poor physical health, and chronic stress/anxiety, have their roots in a low sense of self-worth. This course is designed specifically to help you develop your sense of worth, so that you can have the resiliency and the capacity to resolve problems you may be facing in your life. At the end of the day, the stronger your sense of self-worth and self-confidence, the more consistently you will feel joy and satisfaction on a day-to-day basis.
target_audience: Individuals who are struggling with their self-confidence, and who have aspects of their life that they would like to change but aren't sure how.

requirements: Bring a desire for a better life!
courses.description:
Confidence comes from within. It is not about certain behaviors, tricks, or hacks. It’s not about just appearing more confident or acting more confidently. It's not a certain mindset. It’s about knowing who you are. When you possess confidence, you don’t have to try to appear confident. Your confidence simply shines through, whether you know it or not!
That is what this course is about. Every single person on this planet could use at least a little more confidence. Every single one.
True confidence, the kind we are talking about in this course and want to teach you, comes from within. It comes from a deeper knowledge of who you are as a human being. When you know who you are and are comfortable with that person, you naturally exude true confidence. You don’t have to think about it.
You become a better person when your confidence improves. As your confidence builds, you will find yourself kinder and more accepting of others. You will be less jealous and envious. You will naturally be more assertive, ensuring your needs are met through appropriate communication behaviors that support your own needs without harming others. Your relationships will automatically improve because you are a better, healthier, and stronger person. The little things won’t bother you so much. You will spend a lot less time in frustration, irritation, and anger, and a lot more time in peace and acceptance. When your inner core is stronger, your entire life improves.
At the same time, most of us suffer from at least some degree of low self-esteem. Our lives have brought difficulties that we have not had the strength or the tools to manage in a healthy way, so we have fallen victim to them. Our self-esteem has suffered. We have developed shortcomings and hang-ups. We have become insecure in some or many ways. Most of us go through our entire lives with the same low level of self-esteem we came out of childhood with—which is simply tragic. Some of us sink even further because of adult failures. We know we have low self-esteem, but we don’t know what to do about it! And it seems like strengthening our self-esteem is so much work and so difficult. We don’t want to trudge through our painful experiences to try to sort them out in order to build our self-esteem, so we just continue through life with low self-esteem. The problem with that is that low self-esteem actually harms us in so many ways. We choose the company of others with low self-esteem, both personal and professional, perpetuating our own low level and preventing us from improving. We try to climb out of the low self-esteem hole by seeking the company of those we admire, but they don’t want to be around us so they leave us behind. We are left to ourselves, in our own stinky pile of goo, aware that we have low self-esteem but helpless to improve it. We become comfortable in our low level of self-esteem, refusing to take real steps to build it because we don’t want to go through the pain that’s buried deep in our psyches, and we believe this is the only way out.
The good news that we present to you today is that you don’t have to endure the pain of reliving your most damaging experiences in order to strengthen your self-esteem! Just take this course! Listen to the lectures and if you really want to make the most of the course, do the exercises. Even if you do just a few exercises, your self-esteem and self-confidence will improve dramatically. The more exercises you do—and they are not difficult exercises—the stronger and healthier you will become! It really is that simple! Achieve your wildest dreams! Don’t let anything hold you back! These are the benefits of strong self-esteem and self-confidence.
This course comes directly from science. It is the result of many years of research and clinical psychology practice and findings. None of this information is just some random person’s ideas about what builds confidence. Instead, these techniques, tips, and strategies come from the very best scientific sources. This separates this course from every other course out there that claims to boost your confidence. These are tested strategies that have improved the lives of many many people by strengthening them from within. These strategies will help you too!
Improve your life starting right now. Start building your confidence from the inside. Start improving your self-esteem to build a better life for yourself. You are worth it.
For your viewing pleasure and to give you a sense of peace and ease while you work through the lessons of this course, we have filmed this course entirely in the tropics. Most videos were done on the beach and a few in the jungle. We hope you enjoy the relaxing natural vibe of these beautiful places as the methods and wisdoms seep into your mind and your soul. We want you to improve your self-esteem and self-confidence. We want you to be healthier! And we want you to start right now. Please join us!
Enroll now and start today!
P.S. The cover image is me, gaining the confidence to conquer my fears and learn how to surf!

You might even be guilty of abusing and also be a victim at the same time!
You'll discover the harmful coping mechanisms that have gone unchallenged by envious, insecure and traumatised individuals for far too long. Learn why you or your loved ones struggle at work. With dating or in social settings. With the help of this course, you'll reclaim your life and even enhance it! It's time to become more confident. Stop feeling so isolated and self conscious. You'll be equipped with the tools needed to celebrate your own beauty and stop feeling threatened or envious in the presence of others. Let's enjoy a more fulfilling life!
target_audience: Anyone who has trauma or has suffered in silence due to abuse.
People suffering from insecurity. Body dysmorphia. Anxiety or depression.
Anyone interested in any of the following topics : psychology, sociology. Body language, behaviour and communication.
Anyone seeking to live and promote a healthier, happier more peaceful life.
Anyone interested in any of  the following topics : beauty. Spirituality. Community. Misogyny. Sexism. Feminism. Justice. Racism. Phobias.
Those that struggle to keep friendships or date.
Anyone that wants to develop self confidence and self-love.
